SA10ksmadhlu:83_1: yadi nityaditaraṃ kimapyanityamiti nigadyeta? tadā nityasya vikalpātmakatvāttat [itaraṃ] tāvat sāmarthyānnirvikalpaṃ jñānamityatasyadavasthāyāṃ 'saṃvṛtisat' - iti kathanaṃ tu nirvikalpakajñānena tatpratīyata ityabhihitaṃ syāt /
SA10ksmadhlu:84_1: [tathātve ca] anumānakalpanāyā api tāvat parihāraḥ syāt savikalpakatvāttasyāḥ /
SA10ksmadhlu:85_0: [65] atha lokapratītyarthaḥ saṃvṛtyartha ityevaṃ cet? kastāvalloka iti? śāstrakārā vā prākṛtā vā janāḥ prathame vikalpe bhāvo hyanekaparasparaviruddhasvabhāvaḥ syāt,
SA10ksmadhlu:86_0: [66] atha māyārthaḥ saṃvṛtyartha iti cet tadā ko hi nāma māyārtha iti vaktavyam /
SA10ksmadhlu:86_1: yadi sarvamasaditi, tadā pūrvadoṣa eva samāpadyeta,
SA10ksmadhlu:86_3: atha bhrāntijñānena māyeti cet tadā ābhyantarikajñeyanayena ko hi viśeṣaḥ syāt /
SA10ksmadhlu:88_0: [68] atha śabdārtha iti cettadā kathabhedaḥ syāt,
SA10ksmadhlu:88_1: pratyātmādhigamyā ye sukhādayaste kutra saṃgṛhītāḥ syuḥ? na hi tāvat saṃvṛtau,
SA10ksmadhlu:88_3: sūtre 'pyevamuktamḥ "kiṃ nāma saṃvṛtisatyam? yāvanto lokavyavahārāḥ ye 'kṣarapadaniruktibhirnidiśyanta iti" /
SA10ksmadhlu:89_0: athaivaṃ manyate yadābhāsaparikalpyau vyāmiśrya sāmānyākārena gṛhyanta iti? tadā paramārthe 'pyeṣa prasaṅgaḥ syāt,
SA10ksmadhlu:89_3: tadvastusattayāḥ sattvāt / satyāntaraviśeṣapūrakākārā api te na bhavanti /
SA10ksmadhlu:89_6: tadā mudā tathā kuryuriti, kulmāṣamapi dātavyamiti, katipayenāvirpayayeṇāvivādaśceti /
SA10ksmadhlu:90_0: [69] atha kṣaṇamātrānantarānavasthānena asthirārthaḥ saṃvṛtyarthastadviparītaśca nityārthaḥ paramārtha iti siddhasādhanamevaitat,
SA10ksmadhlu:90_3: ato nāsti vivādaḥ tathā sāṃvṛtikānāṃ vastusāmānyalakṣaṇāmāṃ yā nairātmyarupā dharmatā sāsti paramārthataḥ /
SA10ksmadhlu:90_4: sāpi utpādād vā tathāganāmanutpadād vā sarvakālamavikāratayā nityābhyupeyate /
SA10ksmadhlu:91_0: [70] atha asatyārthaḥ saṃvṛtyartha iti tadā kathaṃ sā satyamiti parasparaviruddhayoḥ satyāsatyayoraikātmyānupapatteḥ bhāvasvabhāvaiva kācana saṃvṛtirabhyupagantavyā,
SA10ksmadhlu:91_1: anyathā kathaṃ jagat tathā satyaṃ sidhyet,
SA10ksmadhlu:92_0: [71] anyacca saṃvṛtiḥ pramāṇamapramāṇaṃ vā? yadi pramāṇaṃ kathaṃ sā saṃvṛtiḥ? athāpramāṇaṃ tadā kathaṃ nairātmyaṃ sādhayituṃ śakyeta?
SA10ksmadhlu:93_1: ṛte bījaṃ saṃvṛtyanutpatteḥ, yad bijaṃ tadeva vastutaḥ saditi /
SA10ksmadhlu:94_0: [73] api ca, yadi bhāvasvabhāvā abbhyupagamyante tadā teṣvāropito mithyāsvabhāvaḥ saṃvṛtisatyam,
SA10ksmadhlu:94_3: yadi nābhyupagamyante, tadā saṃvṛtirapi vitathā syāt paramārtho 'pyaśakyavyavasthānaḥ syāt,
SA10ksmadhlu:95_0: [74] yadi yathākathañcana kañcidekaḥ paramārthaḥ syāttadā kimarthaṃ sa sādhayate? sa naiva paramārthaḥ kathaṃ sa jñānenāvadhārayituṃ śakyate,
SA10ksmadhlu:95_1: na ca paramārthaśabdenāpyabhidhātumarhaḥ evaṃ tāvannāyaṃ paramārthaḥ,
SA10ksmadhlu:95_2: na cārtho 'pi paramaḥ, nāpi paramasya jñānasyāyamarthaḥ,
SA10ksmadhlu:95_3: sādhāraṇatvāt / yadi yathākathañcana kiścidekaḥ paramārthaḥ syāt tadā paramārthato 'sadbhāvasyaikasya yathākathañcana nirākaraṇād bhāvasattāyā evābhyupagamaḥ syāt /
SA10ksmadhlu:96_5: ataḥ pakṣo 'yam 'na bhinno nāpyabhinnaḥ' iti na yujyate,
SA10ksmadhlu:96_6: viruddhatvāt / evaṃ bhinnābhinnatvasya anyo 'nyaparihārasthitalakṣaṇatvena ekasya pratiṣedhe 'parasya vidhānaṃ na bhavettadā asattvameva /
SA10ksmadhlu:96_7: sa tadā pratiṣeddhumapi kathaṃ śaktaḥ ekasmin yugapatparyudāsaprasajyayorvirodhāt /
SA10ksmadhlu:97_0: [76] anyacca, bhavatāmanusāreṇa tu puṇyajñānasambhārau duṣparipūraṇau syātām,
SA10ksmadhlu:97_2: pūjānugrahakāmyayā yad dīyate tad dānaṃ tvatyantaṃ prasādamabhinirvartayati,
SA10ksmadhlu:97_4: sa cānupalambhaḥ kiṃ deyābhāvād vā viṣayābhāvād vā bhavati? prathame tāvat pakṣe na ko 'pi kimapi dadātīti puṇyasyaivābhāvaḥ prasajyate,
SA10ksmadhlu:97_5: sattvābhāvācca yo hi bodhisattvānāṃ sattvārthapariśramaḥ sa nirarthaka eva syāt,
SA10ksmadhlu:97_6: ato 'sattvaṃ tu nāstyeva / viṣayābhavo 'pi tāvannāsti, bhagavatā deyādivastūnāṃ paridṛṭatvāt /
SA10ksmadhlu:97_7: yadyevaṃ na syāuttadā bhagavatā bodhisattvāvasthāyāṃ kathamarthibhyaḥ putrādidānaṃ kṛtam? bhavantastvālambanāśritaṃ dānādikaṃ 'viśuddham' iti nābhyupagacchanti,
SA10ksmadhlu:98_0: [77] api ca, 'sarve dharmā niḥsvabhāvāḥ' ityettasya tāvat ko hyarthaḥ? yadi svayambhāvasya abhāvānniḥsvabhāvā ityabhidhīyante tadā siddhasādhanameva,
SA10ksmadhlu:98_3: yadyevaṃ na syāttadā nirapekṣatvānnityaṃ sattvamasattvaṃ vā syāt /
SA10ksmadhlu:98_4: yadyucyeta - vinaṣṭā bhāvāḥ svasvabhāvenānutpannatvāt svasvabhāvena na santīti niḥsvabhāvāḥ? ityetadapi siddhasādhanameva,
SA10ksmadhlu:98_8: kṣaṇikasya khalu vastuno dvitīye kṣaṇe 'vasthānaṃ nābhyupeyate /
SA10ksmadhlu:99_0: yadyucyeta yathā bālapṛthagjanaiḥ parikalpitasya grāhyagrāhakabhāvasya paramārthena svabhavato 'sattvād sasattvaṃ tathā niḥsvabhāvatvamiti tadapi siddhasādhanam,
SA10ksmadhlu:99_2: yadyevaṃ na syāttadā sarve 'pi tattvadarśinaḥ syuḥ /
SA10ksmadhlu:100_0: paramārthataḥ sarve bhāvā bālapṛthagjanaiḥ parikalpitena grāhyagrahakāreṇa virāhitā api āryajñānasya advaitātmanā gocaratvena sthitā eva /
SA10ksmadhlu:100_1: yadyevaṃ na sthitāḥ, tathāpyasattvena niḥsvabhāvāstadā saṅkleśavyavadānau na syātām /
SA10ksmadhlu:101_1: kiṃ tadanutpadatāyāstāvadarthaṃ manyase? yadyucyeta ādito 'nutpannatvāt sarve bhāvā anutpannā iti tadapi siddhasādhanameva,
SA10ksmadhlu:101_3: atha pūrvamutpannasya vastunaḥ punaranupattyā sarve dharmā anutpannā iti tadapi siddhasādhanameva,
SA10ksmadhlu:101_8: sarvadā ca pūrvavinaṣṭānāṃ sajātīyotpatteḥ atha bālapṛthagjanaparikalpitasya svalakṣaṇato 'nutpādādanutpāda ucyate,
SA10ksmadhlu:101_9: tadāpi nāsti virodhaḥ, kalpitasya svabhāvata utpettaranabhyupagamāt /
SA10ksmadhlu:102_0: atha svato 'nutpādād anutpāda ityucyeta tadāpi nāsti virodhaḥ,
SA10ksmadhlu:102_2: yathā pūrvamuktam / yadi sarvaśaḥ sarvānutpādād anutpāda ucyate tadā darśanādivirodho durnivāraḥ syāt /
SA10ksmadhlu:102_3: yadi parasparaviśeṣānutpādād anutpādo 'bhidhīyate tadā [yadi] tathatāsvabhavatāmupādāyocyate tadā nāsti doṣaḥ,
SA10ksmadhlu:102_4: [kintu] yadi lokaprasiddhasvabhāvatāmupādāyocyate tadā kena darśanādivirodho nivārayituṃ śakyate /
SA10ksmadhlu:102_5: yadi svabhāvetarakriyālakṣaṇaviyogād anupāda iti? tadāpi nāsti doṣaḥ,
SA10ksmadhlu:106_0: "kulaputra, bodhisattvaḥ dharmamayoniśaḥ śabdaśaḥ pravicayya mahāyānaprasadāyatano na bhavati /
SA10ksmadhlu:106_1: śabdaśo 'nabhipretya yoniśo manasi kṛtvā mahāyānaprasādāyatano bhavati /
SA10ksmadhlu:106_2: evaṃ kulaputra, bodhisattvo 'yoniśaḥ śabdaśo dharmān pravicayya aṣṭāviṃśatimasaddṛṣṭīrutpādayati,
SA10ksmadhlu:106_3: tadayathā - nimittadṛṣṭiḥ, adṛṣṭidarśanadṛṣṭiḥ, vyavahārāpavādadṛṭiḥ, saṃkleśāpavādadṛṣṭiḥ, tattvāpavādadṛṣṭiśceti" ityevamādikaṃ vistareṇābhidhāya ḥ
SA10ksmadhlu:107_0: "kulaputraṃ, kā hi tāvannimittadṛṭiḥ? sāṃyogikasya svabhāvamabhisandhāya mayā sarvadharmāṇāṃ yadasattvaṃ samprakāśitaṃ tacchabdaśo 'bhiniviśya [ye] sāṃkleśikadharmāṇāṃ vaiyavadānīkadharmāṇāṃ cāpyasattve 'bhiniviśante,
SA10ksmadhlu:107_3: [ataḥ] bodhisattvasya śabdaśo 'bhiniviṣṭāyāmasaddṛṣṭi saiva tasya mahatī dṛṣṭiriti,
SA10ksmadhlu:107_6: tato vyavahārāpavādadṛṣṭisaṃkleśāpavādadṛṣṭitattvāpavādadṛṣtayastāvajjāyante yadā nimittadṛṣṭyā sarvāpavādaḥ [yadā] kriyate tadā vyavahārāpavādadṛṣṭerapyabhiniveśo jāyate,
SA10ksmadhlu:111_0: na hyātmā vidyate skandhe skandhāścaiva hi nātmani /
SA10ksmadhlu:111_1: na te yathā vikalpyante na ca vai na santi ca //
SA10ksmadhlu:112_0: ābhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ pratiṣedhābhyāṃ skandhānāṃ sattaiva tāvannirdiṣṭā / mahāśūnyatāsūtre 'pi yaduktamḥ
SA10ksmadhlu:113_0: "asti karma asti vipākaḥ kārakastu nopalabhyate" anena tāvad vacanena virodho 'pi samupajāyate /
SA10ksmadhlu:113_1: evaṃ yadi paramārthataḥ karmāpyasti vipāko 'pyasti tadā sarve dharmā niḥsvabhāvā bhavituṃ nārhanti /
SA10ksmadhlu:113_2: yadi saṃvṛtau santīti cet tadā karturapi saṃvṛtau sadbhāvāt "kārakastu nopalabhyate" ityevaṃ na vaktavyam /
SA10ksmadhlu:114_1: yadi te bhaved yathā dṛṣṭāḥ sarve syustattvadarśinaḥ //
SA10ksmadhlu:114_3: na te tathā yathā dṛṣṭā na ca te vai na santi ca //
SA10ksmadhlu:115_0: anena yadi sarvadharmāṇāmasattvaṃ tadā saṃkleśavyadānayorapavādadoṣaḥ prasajyata iti nirdiṣṭam /
SA10ksmadhlu:117_0: bāhyo na vidyate hyartho yathā bālairvikalpyate /
SA10ksmadhlu:118_3: ataḥ sarve dharmā niḥsvabhāvatvena na sidhyanti /
SA10ksmadhlu:119_0: "astīti kāśyapa, ayameko 'nta, nāstīti kāśyapa, ayameko 'ntaḥ, yadenayorantayormadhyam, tadarupyanidarśanamapraṣṭhimanābhāsamaniketamavijñaptikam,
SA10ksmadhlu:119_1: iyamucyate kāśyapa, madhyatā pratipad bhūtapratyavekṣā" iti /
SA10ksmadhlu:120_0: anena tāvad vijñānameva paramārthasattvānidarśanatvādiguṇopetaṃ śāścatocchedāntadvayavinirmuktamiti nirdiṣṭam /
SA10ksmadhlu:122_0: "ye paramārthasato 'pi vijñānasyāpavādaṃ kṛtvā sarvadharmaśūnyatāyāmabhiniviśya śūnyatādṛṣṭikāste 'cikitsyāḥ" iti /
SA10ksmadhlu:124_0: "varaṃ khalu kāśyapa, sumerumātrā pudgaladṛṣṭirna tvevābhimānikasya śūnyatādṛṣṭiriti" /
SA10ksmadhlu:126_0: "paratantralakṣaṇaṃ maitreya, pariniṣpannalakṣaṇaṃ ca saṃkleśo vyavadānaṃ ca /
SA10ksmadhlu:126_1: sarvathātyantaviyuktaṃ parikalpitalakṣaṇaṃ yattanna tenopalabhyata idaṃ śūnyatālakṣanamuktaṃ bhavati" /
SA10ksmadhlu:127_2: yadyucyeta kiṃ khalu vastu? yadāryajñānena āryadarśanena vānirvacanīyatvena parijñātam /
SA10ksmadhlu:127_3: anirvacanīyadharmatāvabodhena saṃskārāsaṃskārābhyāṃ prajñaptamiti yaduktaṃ tena virodhaḥ syāditi /
SA10ksmadhlu:128_1: nāvaśiṣṭamiti yad bhavatābhihitaṃ tadapi yuktyāgamābhyāṃ viruddham,
SA10ksmadhlu:128_4: tathā hi kecana parahitāśayā eva pravartante /
SA10ksmadhlu:128_7: tathaivānye svasukhasampattisādhanatatparā anyavyāghātaṃ kṛtvā tadduḥkhavinivṛttito virajyate /
SA10ksmadhlu:128_9: tathaivetare tāvad bhavāntarakhecchato viramya svamuktyarthaṃ prayatante /
SA10ksmadhlu:128_10: aye tu kevalaṃ paravimuktimevānucintayanti saṃbodhinidānāṃ ca dānādipāramitāpravṛttimālambante /
SA10ksmadhlu:128_13: svābhilāṣadvāreṇaiva pravṛttidarśanād śraddhaiva hi pravṛttiheturiti niścitam /
SA10ksmadhlu:128_15: ato nānāgotratvāt sattvānāṃ tulyajātīyagotrakairvidhīyamānapratipattiviśeṣānurūpaṃ phalalakṣaṇayānamapi nānā bhavatīti yuktibhirnānāyānataiva niścīyate /
SA10ksmadhlu:129_6: evamevānekeṣu sūtreṣvapi śrāvakādiyānatrayanirdeśād āgamato 'pi tāvannānā yānāni sidhyantīti /
SA10ksmadhlu:130_0: āryasaddharmapuṇḍarīkādiṣu yaddhi ekaṃ hi yānamiti vyapadiṣṭam,
SA10ksmadhlu:130_2: dharmadhātulakṣaṇatayā yānānāṃ bhedābhāvād ekameva yānamiti tadabhiprāyaḥ /
SA10ksmadhlu:130_3: athavā yānīkṛtaṃ yānamiti yānikurvatāṃ śrāvakādipudgalānāṃ nairātmye 'tulyatvābhāvād ekameva yānam /
SA10ksmadhlu:130_5: athavā aniyatagotrakāṇāṃ śrāvakāṇāṃ mahāyānenaiva niryāṇād ekameva yānaṃ deśitam /
SA10ksmadhlu:130_9: athavā bhagavatā svayamanekadhā śrāvakayānādibhirniryāṇadvāraiḥ parinirvāṇasandarśanād ekameva yānam /
SA10ksmadhlu:130_10: athavā nāsti mahāyānād viśiṣṭataraṃ yānāntaramiti tadadhikārād ekameva yānamiti,
SA10ksmadhlu:132_0: anyacca, naikabhavaparamparāyāṃ sambhārān paripūrya bodhisattvā buddhatvapadamadhigamiṣyanti /
SA10ksmadhlu:132_1: śrāvakā aśeṣabhavasaṃyojanaṃ prajahantīti teṣāṃ naikajanmasādhyaṃ buddhātvadhigantuṃ ko 'pi bhavapratīsandhirnaiva sambhavati,
SA10ksmadhlu:132_2: tathā hi - mūlaṃ bhavasyānuśayāḥ yaduktaṃ so 'pyātmagrahaprabhava eveti niyatam abhīṣṭaṃ ca /
SA10ksmadhlu:132_4: tatsamucchedena teṣāṃ janmano 'pyādhārarasyābhāvāt tad [janma] api samucchidyate /
SA10ksmadhlu:132_6: āryāsaddharmapuṇḍarīke bhagavatā yacchrāvakebhyo buddhātvādhigatervyākaraṇaṃ kṛtaṃ tattu nirmitaśrāvakāṇāṃ nirmāṇasya,
SA10ksmadhlu:132_7: yairbodhau pariṇāmanā kṛtā, teṣāṃ vābhiprāyeṇa kṛtamiti draṣṭavyam /
SA10ksmadhlu:135_1: katipayeṣu [sūtreṣu] - "tathāgatagarbhāḥ sarve sattvāḥ" iti yaduktaṃ tadapi tathatālakṣaṇāyāstathatāyā abhiprāyeṇa vyapadiṣṭam /
SA10ksmadhlu:136_1: tatra tāvad 'nāgamataḥ sarve dharmā niḥsvabhāvatvena sādhayituṃ śakyāḥ,
SA10ksmadhlu:136_3: kiṃ kenāpyanabhyupetatvādāgama ekāntenānupādeya eva bhavatyuta utadeyo 'pīti? prathamastāvat pakṣo na yuktaḥ /
SA10ksmadhlu:136_7: anarthitayā vā, pāpamitrasaṃsargeṇa vā, vimūḍhacittatayā vā, sukalyāmitrānupalambhena vā, parapratyaneyatayā vā, śraddhendriyādivaikalyena vā? tadvidāṃ sudhiyāṃ viraheṇa bhagavata ādimadhyaparyavasānakalyāṇaṃ pravacanaratnamanāśritā api kiṃ tāvadadhigatasvaparahitasampādanonopāyaṃ tarkanipuṇaṃ vidvāṃsamapi nāśrayiṣyante?
SA10ksmadhlu:137_0: athavā, ajñā vaṇijo yathā vimugdhatayānarghaṃ ratnamapi parityajanti tathā suvijñāstarkanipuṇā api vaṇijastanna parigṛhṇantīti na /
SA10ksmadhlu:137_1: tāpāccedācca nikaṣāt suvarṇamiva pratyakṣānumānapūrvaparāviruddhāgamairaviruddhātvāt pareṣāñcāgamānāṃ tadviparītatvād ābhyudayikanaiḥśreyasikanaiḥśreyasikaphalamāptukāmā aśeṣasampadamadhigantukāmā vipaścitastaṃ [viparītāgamaṃ] parityajya yadekāntakuśalaṃ tatpravacanaratnamevāśrayantīti yaḥ pakṣaḥ,
SA10ksmadhlu:137_2: sa cet samyagiti tadā bhavanto 'pi yadi bhagavatpravacanaṃ suparīkṣyaivābhyupayantītyato bhagavatā prajñāpārāmitādiṣu yo hi madhyamo mārgaḥ suspaṣṭamādiṣṭastaṃ kinnāśrayiṣyantīti?
SA10ksmadhlu:138_0: yadi svayaṃ tamāśrayituṃ na śaktāstathāpyāryanāgātjunapādairyo hyanekayuktipradīpaprakāraiḥ suspaṣṭaṃ nirdiṣṭastadbalenāpi kimiva nābhyupagacchanti? yato hi sa ācāryastāvad bhagadvacananirdiṣṭatvena prathamāṃ bhūmimāsāditatvena cāryalaṅkāvatārādau vyākṛtaḥ /
SA10ksmadhlu:138_1: tasyāpi yadi nirdeśo viparyastaḥ syāttadā naiva tāvad bhagavatā tathā vyākṛtaḥ syāt /
SA10ksmadhlu:138_2: ato yadayācāryavacānaṃ tyajyate bhagavadvacanamapi nūnaṃ parityaktaṃ bhavet /
SA10ksmadhlu:138_3: phalata āryanāgārjunapādapratipadītaṃ mārgaṃ parityajya anāryapudgalapradarśitapathāśrayaṇaṃ tāvānnaiva yujyate /
SA10ksmadhlu:139_0: na vayaṃ śabdānāṃ bhāvikaḥ kaścana sambandha iti manyāmahe /

SA10ksmadhlu:295_0: vadanti ye vai tathatāmasaṃkṛtāṃ tathaiva cānye kṛtakāṃ yatastām /
SA10ksmadhlu:295_1: notsāhavanto hyubhaye bhavanti dharmasya jñāne sugatopadiṣṭe //
SA10ksmadhlu:296_0: atastaditthaṃ saṃskṛtāsaṃskṛtayorvastutvagrāhastāvad antagrāha iti athavā śrāvakapratyekabuddhanāṃ yad gocaraṃ tatsvalakṣaṇaṃ vastitvatyabhyupagacchātāṃ bālānāṃ kevalaṃ santrāsapadavivarjanārthameva āryajñānagocaraṃ vastusadityabhihitam /
SA10ksmadhlu:296_1: buddhabodhiattvānām atyantalokottarajñānasya viṣayastu pāramārthikaṃ vastusvalakṣaṇaṃ sarvathāsat,
SA10ksmadhlu:296_3: sūtre 'upuktam - "kiṃ lokottarajñānam? śrāvakapratyekabuddhānāṃ svasāmānyalakṣaṇapatitāśayānāṃ yo hyabhiniveśaḥ /
SA10ksmadhlu:296_4: kimatyantalokottarajñānam? buddhabodhisattvānāṃ nirābhāsadharpravicayena anutpādānirodhadarśanāt sadasatyakṣavivarjitaṃ taditi /
SA10ksmadhlu:298_0: yadi buddhabodhisattvānāṃ jñānasya viṣayaḥ paramārthalakṣaṇena sahaikībhūtaṃ tadā kathaṃ tajjñānaṃ satpakṣavivarjitaṃ syāt? ata eva hi bālānāṃ santrāsapadavivarjanārtham āryajñānagocaraṃ vastusadityupadiṣṭam,
SA10ksmadhlu:298_1: na tu paramārthato vastu svalakṣaṇasaditi kathanārtham /
SA10ksmadhlu:298_2: yadyevaṃ nāsti, tadā buddhāṃ bodhisattvāśca sadvikalpasambaddhā na bhavantīti? yathā bālānāṃ santrāapadavivarjanārthamityuktam,
SA10ksmadhlu:298_5: tathā hi āryakaṅkāvatārasūtre - "kimidaṃ bhagavan sattvānāṃ tvayā nāstyasidṛṣṭiṃ vinivārya vastusvabhāvābhiniveśena āryajñānagocaraviṣāabhiniveśānnāstitvadṛṣṭiḥ punarnāstitvadṛṣṭiḥ punarnipātyate,
SA10ksmadhlu:298_6: viviktadharmopadeśābhāvaśca kriyate āryajñānasvabhāvavastudeśanayā? bhagavānāha - na mayā mahamate,
SA10ksmadhlu:298_8: na ca na cāstītvadṛṣṭirnipātyate āryavastusvabhāvanirdeśenaḥ kintu uttrāsapadavivārjanārthaṃ sattvānāṃ mahāmate,
SA10ksmadhlu:298_11: kiṃ tu mahāmate svayamevādhigatayāthātathyaviviktadharmavihāriṇo bhaviṣyanti" - iti vistaraḥ /
SA10ksmadhlu:298_12: ato yadāryajñānagocaraviṣayo vastusvalakṣaṇatvena nirdiṣṭa nirdiṣṭaḥ sa tāvad bhagavata upāyenaiva deśanāmātram /
SA10ksmadhlu:298_13: ato bhagavato 'sandigdhaṃ pravacananayamanupādāya te mithyā [moṣadharmakaṃ] vastusvabhāvatvena vikalpayanti /
SA10ksmadhlu:298_14: te tāvābhimānino bhagavantamapi apavādya svayaṃ vinaśyanti parāṃścāpi nāśayanti /
SA10ksmadhlu:298_15: evamitthamasninneva sūtre vastusabhāvābhiniveśinaḥ ātmagrāhagṛhītatvānna muktā bhaviṣyantītyevaṃ samupadiṣṭam - "punaraparaṃ mahāmate,
SA10ksmadhlu:298_16: pramāṇatrayāvayavapratyavasthānaṃ kṛtyā āryajñānapratyātmādhigamyaṃ svabhāvadvayavinirmuktaṃ vastu svabhāvato vidyata iti vikalpayiṣyanti /
SA10ksmadhlu:298_17: na ca mahāmate, cittamano manovijñānacittaparāvṛttyāśrayāṇāṃ svacittadṛśyagrāhyagrāhakavikalpaprahīṇānāṃ tathāgatabhūmipratyātmāryajñānagatānaṃ yogināṃ bhāvābhāvasaṃjñā pravartate,
SA10ksmadhlu:298_18: sa evaiṣāmātmagrāhaḥ poṣagrāhaḥ puruṣagrāhaḥ pudgalagrāhaḥ syāt" /
SA10ksmadhlu:298_19: api ca, yadi paramārthataḥ syāt kimapi vastusat tadā tadavaśyaṃ nityaṃ vā anityaṃ vā syād,
SA10ksmadhlu:298_20: aparāyāḥ koṭerabhāvāt / tasmin vastūni nityānityatvacintayā pravṛttā yā prajñā,
SA10ksmadhlu:298_23: ata eva tathāgatena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ yaduktaṃ tenāpi virodhaḥ syāt /
SA10ksmadhlu:298_24: tathā hi - "kauśika, ye kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitāro vā yadā prajñāpāramitāmupadiśanti tadā prajñāpāramitāvadevopadiśanti /
SA10ksmadhlu:298_28: evameva vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārā vijñānaṃ skandhā dhātava āyatanāni dhyānāpramāṇārupānusmṛtisatmyakprahāṇārddhipādendriyabalabodhyaṅgāni tathāgatasya daśabalavaiśāradyapratisaṃvidāveṇīkā buddhadharmāḥ sarvākārajñatā ceti sarvaṃ duḥkhamanātmakaśucītyupadiśanti /
SA10ksmadhlu:298_31: tatra ye prajñāpāramitāvanna kaurvanti tatkathamiti cet? te itthumupadiśantikulaputrāḥ,
SA10ksmadhlu:298_35: rūpasya yo 'pi svabhāvaḥ, sa [sarvathā] asan / yaccāsat saiva prajñāpāramitā /
SA10ksmadhlu:298_37: yataśca yatrarūpameva nāsti tatra kuto nityamanityaṃ vāāa? sarvākārajñatāparyatantamitthameva /
SA10ksmadhlu:299_1: atrāgacchatha, prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāvayatha mā ca kamapi dharmaṃ samatikramatha,
SA10ksmadhlu:299_3: tat kimarthamiti cet? prajñāpāramitāyāṃ nāsti ko 'ma dharmaḥ,
SA10ksmadhlu:299_4: yaḥ samatikramitavyaḥ, yatra vā sthātavyamiti / yato hi sarve dharmā svabhāvataḥ śūnyāḥ /
SA10ksmadhlu:299_6: saiva prajñāpāramitā / yā ca prajñāpāramitā, tasyāṃ na ko 'pi grāhyo heya utyādyo nirodhyaśceti /
SA10ksmadhlu:299_8: yāpāramitāvadevopadiśanti / ataḥ sarve vastuvādinastāvad dharmatathatāṃ viparītatayā nirdiśantyataḥ [tannirdeśaḥ] prajñāpāramitopadeśa iva prativarṇika eva /
SA10ksmadhlu:299_9: sarvadharmaniḥsvabhāvatāvādinastvaviparītatayā nirdiśantyataḥ sopattikā eva ta iti bhagavatā suspaṣṭaṃ nirdiṣṭam /
SA10ksmadhlu:299_12: ata eva bhagavatā tāvadasandigdhaṃ samyakpravacananayamavadhāayitumaśaknuvatāṃ 'naiva tāvadāgamadvara sarve dharmā niḥsvabhāvatvena sādhayituṃ śakyāḥ' ityabhidadhatāṃ pratividhānamanuṣṭhitam /
SA10ksmadhlu:299_13: tatra yadyalpamatitayā evaṃvidhaṃ gambhīradharmatāṃ nādhimoktuṃ pārayanti tathāpi savikalpamātmano mandaprajñatvadosamavalokayadbhistatparityāgo naiva yujyate /
SA10ksmadhlu:299_14: ātmānaṃ vināśya pareṣāmapi mahārthavirahaṃ kṛtvā praṇāśo naiva samīcīnaḥ /
SA10ksmadhlu:299_15: evaṃ hi sati svaparadroha eva sa syāt /
SA10ksmadhlu:299_16: ataḥ prajñāvantaḥ śraddhāvantaśca gambhiradharmaparityādagṛṣṭiṃ parivarjya bhagavantaṃ pramāṇīkṛtya ātmano 'jñānadoṣakāraṇāt tadaparijñānaṃ sambhāvyata iti vicārya gambhīrasūtreṣu śraddhāmutpādya śravaṇacintābhāvanādiṣu yogaṃ kuryuḥ,
SA10ksmadhlu:299_19: ata eva āryaratnakūṭasūtre proktam - "ye 'sya gambhīradharmasya gāmbhīrya prajñayā avaboddhumaśaknuvānāste tathāgatameva pramāṇaṃ kurvanti,
SA10ksmadhlu:299_21: yataśca vividhādhimokṣānusāraṃ tathāgatā eva dharmopadeśe pravartante,
SA10ksmadhlu:299_22: atastathāgatā eva jānanti / nāsmādṛśairjñātuṃ śakyata iti vicārya tatparityāgo naiva yuktarūpaḥ" /
SA10ksmadhlu:300_0: ityuvamāgamamukhena sarve dharmā niḥsvabhāvā eveti siddhā bhavanti /
SA10ksmadhlu:301_2: na tu svasaṃvittimātreṇa, te dvayābhāsasya mithyātvena tadvyavasthāpitaḥ svabhāvo 'pi mithaivetyabhidadhate /
SA10ksmadhlu:302_1: tadā kathaṃ sā paramārthasatī bhavet? dvayābhāso 'pi yadi mithyaiva tadā katajjñānarūpamavaśiṣyate yat khalu paramārthasad bhavet? anyattad vijñānaṃ grāhakākārarahitaṃ tadarvāgdarśibhiḥ nānubhavituṃ yujyate,
SA10ksmadhlu:302_4: tathāvidhahetorevabhāvāt / tatra na tāvat svabhāvahetukamanumānaṃ sambhāvyate,
SA10ksmadhlu:302_6: na ca kāryaheturapi, yato hi kāmaṃ syāttadadvayaviruddhaṃ tathāpi tena kāryakāraṇabhāva eva na siddhaḥ,
SA10ksmadhlu:302_10: yo hi dvayābhāsaḥ, sa tāvad śaśaśṛṅgavannaiva kāryam /
SA10ksmadhlu:302_11: ataśca pratyakṣānupalambhābhyāṃ sādhyabhūtasya kāryakāraṇabhāvasya siddhaye paramārthe 'dvayajñānena gṛhyamāṇaṃ kimapi nāsti /
SA10ksmadhlu:302_13: yathocyate kaiścit - yo hi yatsvabhāvaviruddhaḥ sa tatsvabhāvaviviktaḥ,
SA10ksmadhlu:302_16: dvayasvabhāvaviruddhatvāt, vyāpakaviruddhopalabdheḥ / na cāpi hetorāśrayāsiddhiḥ sāamānyasukhaduḥkhākāravedakasya dharmiṇo jñānākhyapratītisvabhāvena siddhatvāt /
SA10ksmadhlu:302_17: na ca svabhāvo 'pyasiddhaḥ, grāhyākārasya ekānekasvabhāvaviyogena asattve tadāśritaḥ parikalpito grāhakākāro 'pi niḥsvabhāva eva /
SA10ksmadhlu:302_18: na cāpi sarvābhāvaprasaṅgaḥ, kevalena kartukarmasvabhāvena kalpitatvānmithyaiva /
SA10ksmadhlu:302_20: yadi sāmānyena paramārthato dvayaviviktastvaṃ sādhayitumiṣyate tadā siddhasādhanameva,
SA10ksmadhlu:302_21: yato hi vayamapi paramārthato dvayasya mithyātvād viviktatvamevābhyupagacchāmaḥ /
SA10ksmadhlu:302_22: yadi hyabhāvasvabhāvaḥ khalu paramārthata ākāravirahitavijñānatvena sādhayitumiṣyate,
SA10ksmadhlu:302_23: tadāpi siddhasādhanameva, yato hi vayamapi paramārthataḥ sarvadharmāṇāmanutpannatvāt sarvavijñānāni tāvat paramārthato 'siddhāni dvayākārasuviyuktānītyabhyupagacchāmaḥ /
SA10ksmadhlu:303_0: yadi vijñānākhyaṃ dharmiṇaṃ dvayaviyuktatvena vastusattvena ca sādhayitumiṣyate tadā dṛṣṭāntavayāsiddhatvādanaikāntikattvaṃ hetoḥ,
SA10ksmadhlu:303_2: ekasminneva jñāne jñānatadavabhāsayoravabhāsitatvena avirodho 'pi syādataḥ sādhyavikalaṃ dṛṣṭāntamapi syāditi /
SA10ksmadhlu:303_3: yadi vijñānaṃ dvayaviyuktaṃ sidhyati tadā tadbalena svabhāvasattvamapi sidhyatīti cet? durmatireṣā,
SA10ksmadhlu:303_4: sambandhābhāvāt / yaddhi dvayaviyuktaṃ tadavaśyaṃ samyag vastusaditi ko hyatra sambandhaḥ? yato hi yadi tannivartate tadānarthopasaṃhitaṃ pramāṇamapi nivartate /
SA10ksmadhlu:303_8: anavasthāprasaṅgāt / śītādisparśaviyuktānāmūṣmādīnāṃ svabhāvavat dvayasvabhāvātiriktaḥ tadviyuktasvabhāvatvena siddhaḥ pratītisvabhāvabhinnastatsamānasvabhāvaḥ kaścidapi dharmī nāstyeva,
SA10ksmadhlu:303_10: evaṃ hi anyavyaktinirapekṣaḥ san yaśca svayamevātmanābhivyajyate,
SA10ksmadhlu:303_11: sa pratītilakṣaṇaḥ / kāyabhūmiparvatanadī sāgarādayo vividhākārā ye pugato 'vabhāsamānā bāhyārthāste svayamevātmanā abhivyajyamānatvāt pratītisvabhāvātikrāntā eva pravartante /
SA10ksmadhlu:304_0: evamapi ye mithyatmanā kuleṣu gṛheṣu ca pravṛttimācaranti,
SA10ksmadhlu:304_1: teṣāṃ svakāyopagūḍhadayitayā pratītisvabhāvāliṅganamiva ācaraṇād asaddvayasamāyogo 'yaṃ dūṣitatvānna viśvāsayogyaḥ /
SA10ksmadhlu:304_2: tathā ca dvayasvabhāvātmakāt priyatamād viyoge sati kimiva nānyena saha samāyogaḥ syādataḥ kevalamasyaiva dharmitvāvasthā naivopapadyate /
SA10ksmadhlu:307_1: tathā sati ye nīlādivividhacittākārā bāhyārthatvena vijñāne 'vabhāsante te karmakartṛvyavahārānabhijñaiḥ kalpanādoṣavinirmukte citte spaṣṭato 'nubhūtā bhaviṣyantīti /
SA10ksmadhlu:307_2: vividhavastuviśeṣāpekṣayā ta upalakṣyanta iti cet? tasya tāvad viśeṣasya bālaparyantaṃ nāsti suspaṣṭāvabodhaḥ /
SA10ksmadhlu:307_3: yadi niyatadeśakālāvasthitasya tasyākārarāśeḥ tathāvidhaspaṣṭāvabhāsato bhinnānubhavo mithyaiveti bhavantaḥ svīrkunti tadā vimiktikāṃkṣiṇo bhavantaḥ tirobhūtadvayasvabhāvarahitātmakaṃ pratītisvabhāvaṃ viviktasvabhāvatvenābhiniviśya āsaktā eveti kimanyat /
SA10ksmadhlu:307_5: ataśca svatīkṣṇaprajñākhaḍgena tāmāsaktiṃ chittvā kaścana tādātmyalakṣaṇo vā tadutpattikṣaṇo vā sammbandhaḥ satyāsatyayoranyoparihārasthitalakṣaṇatvāt tādārmyavirodhaḥ asato 'pi na kutaścidapyutpattibhyupeyate /
SA10ksmadhlu:307_9: atiprasaṅgāt / ityevamavaśyaṃ kalpanābhinnasya asatsvabhāvākārāvabhāsasya svīkāraṇāt tallakṣaṇānvita evābhyupagantavyaḥ /
SA10ksmadhlu:307_11: yadyevaṃ na syāt kathaṃ nāma mithyākārakalpanāsvabhāvoyostādātmyenānubhavo jāyeta /
SA10ksmadhlu:307_14: sa na satyaṃ nāpi mṛṣā" iti /
SA10ksmadhlu:308_1: evaṃ katipayaiḥ pratyakṣaiḥ 'sarve dharmā viviktā' iti jñātumaśakyatvat /
SA10ksmadhlu:308_2: vastveva teṣāṃ viṣaya ityabhidadhānāstāvat praṣṭavyā kiṃ sarvesāṃ puruṣāṇāṃ yāni pratyakṣāṇi tāni sarvadharmanairātmyaṃ nāvaboddhauṃ samarthāni utāho ghanājñanatimiropahatamatiyanānāṃ bhavadṛśānāṃ pratyakṣāṇi nāvaboddhumiti /
SA10ksmadhlu:308_4: pramāṇābhāvāt / sarveṣāṃ puruṣāṇāṃ pratyakṣāṇi na pravartanta iti niścāyakasya pramāṇasyābhāvāt /
SA10ksmadhlu:309_3: tasmin apravṛttijñānāṃ sarveṣāṃ strīpurusāṇāṃ cittasantatau pravartamānā yā cittapravṛtiḥ sā tāvānnaiva arvāgdarśināmupalabdhilakṣaṇaprāptāḥ,
SA10ksmadhlu:309_5: ataḥ prekṣāvatāṃ pratyakṣeṇa tajjñānaṃ naiva bhavatīti yaduktaṃ tanna yuktamiti /
SA10ksmadhlu:310_1: vayamapi hi arvāgdarśibhistathāvidhasya tāvad gambhīradharmatattvasya pratyakṣato darśanaṃ naiva manyāmahe /
SA10ksmadhlu:310_3: ye kalpairanekairaprameyapuṇyagjñānasambhārārjanaṃ kṛtvā anurūpakṛtsnopāyasamanvitāḥ bhūtārthabhāvanāprakarṣaparyantajamyajñānaprabhābhirnirastasamastāvaraṇāndhakārāsteṣaṃ pratyakṣeṇa tāvat sarvadharmanairātmyabodho bhavatyeveti kasmātra sambhavati /
SA10ksmadhlu:311_1: evamarvāgdarśināṃ yāni pratyakṣāṇi tāni timiropahatapratyakṣavad rupādimithyāviṣayakatvād vastusvabhāvaviṣayatvena samyagviṣayatvena vā tāvannaiva yujyante,
SA10ksmadhlu:311_3: buddhānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāyogināṃ cāpi jñānāni naiva tāvad vastuviṣayakatvena prasidhyanti,
SA10ksmadhlu:311_4: yasmānna taiḥ kaścanāpi aviparīto vastusvabhāvaḥ paridṛṣṭaḥ /
SA10ksmadhlu:312_0: yaduta sarve tairdharmā nisvabhāvāḥ aniruddhāḥ prakṛtyopaśāntāḥ atyantamajātāḥ atyantamabhūtāḥ atyantaparinirvṛtā eva dṛṣṭāḥ /
SA10ksmadhlu:312_2: yato hi tat samyagdarśanaṃ yathāvad yena dṛṣṭaṃ tadapyanirdarśanamavidarśanaṃ ca,
SA10ksmadhlu:312_3: yato hi tat samyagdarśanaṃ yathāvad darśanaṃ ceti /
SA10ksmadhlu:312_4: kiṃ punaḥ sarvadharmāṇāṃ yathāvad darśanamiti cet? tadeva yadanidarśanamiti /
SA10ksmadhlu:314_1: iti / ataḥ pratyakṣaviṣayāṇāṃ samyagvastutvaṃ na sidhyati /
SA10ksmadhlu:315_0: yaddhi asad bhavati vastu, tanna kathamapi vijñānamutpādayituṃ kṣamamiti yaducyate,
SA10ksmadhlu:315_1: tadapi naiva yujyate / asmābhirapi tāvad śaśaśṛṅgasamebhyo 'vastubhyaḥ pratyakṣajñānotpādo naivābhyupagabhyate /
SA10ksmadhlu:315_2: tathāpi mahāyoginaḥ, ye marīcipratiśabdanibhān sarvadharmān yathāvad bhāvayanti,
SA10ksmadhlu:315_3: teṣu samyagarthabhāvanābalena prāntakoṭikadhyānāvāptito 'nuttarācintyaprabhāvasampannatayā tatpratyakṣeṣu sarvadharmanairātmyajñānaṃ bhavatyeva,
SA10ksmadhlu:316_0: atha yattāvat pratyakṣaṃ tat sasvabhāvamiti yaduktaṃ tat sarveṣāṃ dharmāṇāmanutpādaikarasatvat pratyakṣamapi paramārthato niḥsvabhāvameva,
SA10ksmadhlu:316_1: tathāpi yā saṃvṛtisatyāśritā pratyakṣavyavasthā sā sarvā tāvadavyāhayaiva /
SA10ksmadhlu:316_2: sarveṣāṃ dharmāṇāṃ paramārthato niḥsvabhāvatve 'pi mādhyakāḥ sarvavyavahārāṇāṃ vyāvahārikāṇāṃ yogijñānānāmapareṣāṃ pṛthagjanajñānānām āryapudgalādīnāṃ ye hetavastātānnaiva nābhyupagacchanti,
SA10ksmadhlu:316_3: kintuṃ ye tāvat saṃvṛtito 'pyahetukāste khalu vyavahārato 'pyanutpannā eva,
SA10ksmadhlu:316_4: śaśaśṛṅgavat / yat sat tat paramārthato niḥsvabhāvamapi tāvadutpadyate,
SA10ksmadhlu:316_5: māyāpratibinbādivat / māyādīnāṃ sarveṣāṃ pratītyasamutpannatve 'pi nāsti vastutāprasaṅgaḥ,
SA10ksmadhlu:317_0: tathaiva pratītyasamutpannatve 'pi sarvadharmāṇāṃ nāsti vastutāprasaṅgaḥ pramāṇabādhitatvāta /
SA10ksmadhlu:317_1: yathaiva hi mantroṣadhādiprabhāveṇa gajādivividhamāyāprādurbhāvastathaiva karmakleśādiprabhāveṇ sattvānāmutpādādayaḥ prādurbhavanti /
SA10ksmadhlu:317_3: yato hi vividhairhi pratyayaiḥ sā māyāpi vividhaivāvabhāsate /
SA10ksmadhlu:318_0: āryaprajñāpāramitāsūtre 'uyuktamḥ "kaścichrāvakanirmitaḥ [kaścit pratyekabuddhanirmitaḥ] kaścid bodhisattvanirmitaḥ kaścit tathāganitmitaḥ kaścit karmanirmitaḥ /
SA10ksmadhlu:318_1: anena subhūte, paryāyeṇa sarvadharmā nirmitotpannā iti" /
SA10ksmadhlu:319_0: bālapṛthagjanebhyastāvad yogināmetadeva vaiśiṣṭayaṃ yatte māyākāra iva yathāvanmāyāṃ parijānanti,
SA10ksmadhlu:321_1: na cāsya nirmite saṅgo jñātapūrvo yato 'sya saḥ //
SA10ksmadhlu:322_3: ataḥ saṃvṛtiyogahini yogipratyakṣe tathā sthitatvātteṣāṃ śaśaśṛṅga ivātyantābhāvo naiva bhavati /
SA10ksmadhlu:322_5: avirodho 'pi tata eveti / paramārthato niḥsvabhāvatve 'pi yoginaḥ pṛthagjana iva vyavahāratayā vyavasthāpayanti /
SA10ksmadhlu:324_0: "paramārthato 'tyantābhāvaśca saṃvṛtyā ca mārgaṃ bhāvayatīti kathanavat" 'yadarthāntaraviviktapākṣikena pratyakṣeṇa parigṛhya taditaraśūnyapratyakṣeṇa tāvadavabudhyate' - ityādikaṃ yaduktaṃ tadapi naiva yujyate,
SA10ksmadhlu:324_2: na tu lakṣaṇaśūnyatvāditi / lakṣanaśūnyatve u sarve dharmāstāvat paramārthato niḥsvabhāvatvenaivābhyupagamyante,
SA10ksmadhlu:325_0: yā hi vastūnāmitaretaraśūnyatā sā naiva paramārthaḥ,
SA10ksmadhlu:325_5: na tu paramārthatayā / yato hi svapnamāyādisadṛśavastūnāṃ svabhāvaḥ paramārthataḥ parasparamabhinnaḥ /
SA10ksmadhlu:327_0: "evaṃ mahāmate, itaretaraśūnyatā sarvajaghanyā, sā ca tvayā parivarjayitavyā" /
SA10ksmadhlu:328_2: sā upalabdhilakṣaṇaprāptāpi satī yogibhiḥ paramārthatayā anupalabdhākāraiva /
SA10ksmadhlu:328_3: ataḥ sarve dharmā nirābhāsajñānotpattyā jñātā bhavantīti vyavasthāpyate /
SA10ksmadhlu:328_4: ata eva ca itaretaraśūnyatā bālapṛthagjanānāṃ parikalpanāmaśrityaivābhihitā,
SA10ksmadhlu:329_0: [5] sā ca 'yogipratyakṣeṇa samyagavagamye' ti kathanaṃ naiva viduṣāṃ rucikaram /
SA10ksmadhlu:329_1: yuktyabhāvastatreti yat kathanaṃ tadapi nāsti yuktisaṅgatam,
SA10ksmadhlu:330_2: tathāhi - yathā kāmaśokabhayonmādādyupahateṣu asakṛdabhāsabalena pramadādyavabhāsi spaṣṭaṃ jñānamupajāyate yena te tān puraḥsthitaniva dṛṣṭvā sahasā vividhaśarīrakampādibhiśceṣṭamānā dṛśyante /
SA10ksmadhlu:331_0: ataśca yathoktatatvaṃ bhāvayatsu tajjñanamutpatsyata eveti sambhāvyate /
SA10ksmadhlu:332_0: prayogaḥ - ye tāvat kecinnirantaraṃ sādaraṃ bhāvanāmanutiṣṭhanti,
SA10ksmadhlu:332_3: yatra cirakālaṃ nirantaraṃ sādaraṃ sarvadharmanairātmyabhāvanaṃ svabhāvahetuḥ,
SA10ksmadhlu:333_1: spaṣṭāvabhāsamānaṃ sad yajjñānamavisaṃvādaṇaṃ janayati tat pratyakṣaṃ pramāṇam,
SA10ksmadhlu:333_3: sarvadharmanairātmyaviṣayakaṃ yogināṃ jñānamapi spaṣṭāvabhāsamānaṃ sad avisaṃvādakamiti svabhāvahetuḥ /
SA10ksmadhlu:333_4: yadyevaṃ sarvadharmanairātmyajñānaṃ yuktibhiḥ susādhyaṃ tadā kathamiva vidvāṃsastatra na pritāḥ? yadapi yogijñānaṃ tadasaditi yaducyate,
SA10ksmadhlu:333_9: na ca te 'smābhirnābhyupeyanta iti yaduktaṃ tattathā /
SA10ksmadhlu:334_3: sarvasāṃ yuktīnāṃ viṣayasya svabhāvasya cāsiddhatvāt" ietyavamuktam,
SA10ksmadhlu:335_0: itthamasmābhirniḥsvabhāvatvenābhyupete sati yadā bhavantaḥ prasaṅgamāpādayanti tadā sa prasaṅga eva nāsti /
SA10ksmadhlu:336_2: tadā sa prasaṅga eva na bhavati,
SA10ksmadhlu:337_0: vayaṃ tāvad bhavadbhiḥ prayuktaṃ dūṣṇamapi paramārthato 'nutpannamevābhyupagacchāmaḥ /
SA10ksmadhlu:339_0: ityaktam / yat paramārthato 'sat tad vyavahāre 'pi pravartituṃ na śakyata ityevaṃ yo hi prasaṅgaḥ,
SA10ksmadhlu:339_1: sa prasaṅga eva na bhavati, vyāptyasiddheḥ / yato hi yena kāraṇena yasyātmanivartanaṃ tena tasya vyavahāranivartanaṃ tu nāsti paramārthasvabhāvavyāptam,
SA10ksmadhlu:339_4: paramārthasvabhāvavirāhitā api svapnādayo vividhavyavahāreṣu pravartamānā dṛśyante /
SA10ksmadhlu:339_5: ataḥ sarve 'pi tāvad vyavahārā nirmāṇasvapnādivadaviruddhā eva /
SA10ksmadhlu:341_0: sarvatra sādhyadharmyādīnāṃ paramārthabhūtatvādeva anumānādivyavahārāḥ pravartanta iti hetoḥ paramārthato niḥsvabhāvatve sati nānumānādivyavahārāḥ pravartsyanta iti yo hi doṣa āropyate,
SA10ksmadhlu:341_1: so 'pi tāvad doṣābhāva eva / nirvivādarūpatayā saprasaṅgatvāt paramārtadharmyādibhiḥ anumānādivyavahārāḥ kutrāpi naiva siddhāḥ,
SA10ksmadhlu:341_2: tathāpi loke yathāprasiddha eva dharmiṇi vyavahārā bhavanti /
SA10ksmadhlu:341_3: yato hi pravādino hi tattvānirṇayārthameva anumānādivyavahārān prayuñjanti /
SA10ksmadhlu:343_1: pramāṇasya tāvat sarvāṇi lakṣaṇāni tattvapravṛtyarthameva bhavanti,
SA10ksmadhlu:343_3: pramāṇalakṣaṇaśāstrāṇyanadhīyānāsu gopālakāṅganāsu evamupadeśābhāve 'pi dhūmādiliṅgadarśanato 'gnyādīnāṃ jñānamutpadyata eva /
SA10ksmadhlu:343_4: ata eva vayamapi tattvapraveśāya tathatāvyavahārābhyāmanumānādipravartanād doṣarahitā eva /
SA10ksmadhlu:344_0: api ca, ye vyavahāreṇānumānādipravṛttau yatrānityādi vastudharmaṃ satsvabhāvaṃ sādhayanti,
SA10ksmadhlu:344_1: teṣāṃ niḥsaṃśayaṃ tatra vyavahāreṇa vastubhūtadharmādayaḥ syureva,
SA10ksmadhlu:344_2: yato hi tatra tathāvidhā āśrayahīnā sādhyadisthitirnaiva siddhā /
SA10ksmadhlu:345_0: yadi tatra tathāvidha āśrayo nāsti tadā sādhyaniṣedhanād āśrayā siddhyākhyo doṣo dīyate /
SA10ksmadhlu:345_1: so 'pi yadi yathābhūtadharmiṇo nivṛttiścettadā niḥsaṃśayaṃ sādhyādidharmiṇo 'vinābhāvasya niṣedhaṃ karoti,
SA10ksmadhlu:345_2: yato hi asiddhe sati hetvasiddhayādidoṣā dīyante /
SA10ksmadhlu:345_3: svayamupakalpitānāṃ katipayadharmiṇāṃ nivṛttāvapi sādhayādeḥ kasyāpi niṣedhasyābhāvād asiddhayādidoṣā naiva yujyante,
SA10ksmadhlu:346_2: bādhakābhāvāt / vādino 'bhīṣṭārthasiddhau prativādina upaghātakāmanayā dharmiṇaḥ sadasattvamanveṣayanti,
SA10ksmadhlu:346_3: na tu kāmacārataḥ / dharmiṇo 'sattvādicarcayāpi kim? yadi vādino 'bhiṣṭārthahānirna syāt /
SA10ksmadhlu:346_5: anyatrābhāvāt / ata eva sādhyadharmaṃ tadanukūladharmiṇaṃ cāvagantuṃ pakṣalakṣaṇavelāyāmeva yuktividbhirviśeṣeṇa 'svadharma' ityabhidhīyate /
SA10ksmadhlu:346_8: vandhyāputravat / parairiṣṭamākāśādikamapi śabdādikāryaṃ na sādhyatīti vyāpakānupalabdhi,
SA10ksmadhlu:346_10: sādhyasādhanayoriva ākāśādirnaiva vastubhūtaḥ svabhāvadharmīti sādhanabhūto 'yaṃ heturāśrayāsiddha ityapare /
SA10ksmadhlu:346_11: tatrāpi ākāśadidharmiṇāṃ vastutāyāḥ kṛte 'pyatra nirākaraṇe sādhyābhāvamātramabhyupagacchatāṃ nāsti ko 'pi doṣaḥ,
SA10ksmadhlu:346_14: ato vipratipattinirākaraṇāya svābhimatadharmyeva yadi bādhyate cettadā sādhya eva tāvanniṣedhyo bhavati,
SA10ksmadhlu:346_15: na tu dharmāntarayukto dharmītyevaṃ nirdeśakāle sveṣṭapratyakṣānumānāptaprasiddhidvārā niṣedhamavidhāya svabhāvasyaiva tāvanniṣedhaḥ svadharmī bhavatītyatra pakṣadharmatāvasthāyāmācāryeṇa svadharmī kathita iti vārtikakāraḥ /
SA10ksmadhlu:350_0: avaśyaṃ caitadavagantavyam / anyathā kramayaugapadyābhyāmabhivyaktena arthakriyāsāmarthyaviyogena paraparikalpitaḥ padārthāḥ kathamiva niṣeddhuṃ śakṣyante /
SA10ksmadhlu:350_2: āśrayāsiddhadoṣeṇa yadi asato 'pi naiva kartuṃ pāryate tadā niṣedha eva kasyāpi kathamapi kartuṃ naiva śakyate /
SA10ksmadhlu:351_1: nāsti tat kṣaṇikaṃ vāpi saccāpi na hi vidyate /
SA10ksmadhlu:353_0: tairthikaiḥparikalpiteṣu dravyaguṇakarmasāmānyādiṣu niṣeddhumiṣyamāṇeṣvapi kathaṃ tatra āśrayāsiddhādayo doṣā naiva pravartsyante? yadi prasaṅgasādhanamātreṇaiva niṣedhanātra pravartsyanta ityevaṃ brūyāttadā apramāṇaṃ hi tatra prasaṅgasādhanam /
SA10ksmadhlu:353_1: phalata ekāntenaiṣāmabhāvo vyavahāre kathaṃ siddhaḥ syāt,
SA10ksmadhlu:354_0: atha pramāṇameva prasaṅgasādhanamiti cettadā kimiva tatra āśrayāsiddhādayo doṣā na pravartante? yukttibalena āgantuśīleṣu doṣeṣu prekṣāvadbhiḥ svataḥ [svapakṣataḥ] siddhirnaiva yuktimatī atha bāhyārthādīn niṣeddhukāmānāṃ vidyata eva vastubhūto buddhilakṣaṇo dharmī,
SA10ksmadhlu:354_2: ataḥ āśrayāsiddhādayo doṣāstatra na pravartanta iti cettadā ekānekasvabhāvaviyuktatvakramayaupadyavyāptārthakriyāsāmarthyavirahitatvādo hetavastadā aprasiddhataddharmatvadharmiṇi abhīṣṭasādhyadharmaṃ sādhayiṣyantyeva /
SA10ksmadhlu:355_1: yadyevaṃ syāttadā cākṣuṣatvamapi śabdadharmaṇi kathamanityatvasādhane 'śaktam? yadi te tatprasiddhatvamabhyupagacchanti tadā bāhyapradhānādivat buddhireva śaktatvaikānekatvavyāptadharmaviyuktatvanniḥsvabhāvaiva tāvat setsyati,
SA10ksmadhlu:355_2: teṣāṃ taddharmatvāt / anye 'pi dharmā nānyasiddhāṃ bhavanti /
SA10ksmadhlu:356_0: anyathā [yadyevaṃ na syāttadā] tato bahyapradhānādayo na niḥsvabhāvāḥ setyanti /
SA10ksmadhlu:356_1: niḥsvabhāvatve khalu siddhe āśrayāsiddhadidoṣāṇāṃ tādavasthye 'pi nāsti svapakṣahāniprasaṅgaḥ /
SA10ksmadhlu:356_2: buddhau tāvat siddhe 'pi bāhyapradhānādibhirutpattiniṣedhe pradhānādīnāṃ parikalpitasvabhāvaniṣedhastu asiddha eva,
SA10ksmadhlu:356_3: ākārāntaratvāttasya / yadyasiddha eva saḥ, tadā parakalpitāḥ pradhānādayo 'santa eva /
SA10ksmadhlu:357_0: kecana tāvadajñāninastriṣu pratisaṃkhyānirodhāsaṃskṛteṣu kasyāpyutpattimattvābhāvaṃ paramārthavasturupeṇa parikalpayanti /
SA10ksmadhlu:357_1: tanniṣeghasādhane ca buddhestāvat kathaṃ nāma viṣayibhāvo bhaviṣyati,
SA10ksmadhlu:357_2: yato hyanye [vādinaḥ] teṣu tayā utpattimattvābhāvadharmaṃ nābhyupayanti /
SA10ksmadhlu:358_0: atha anādikālinasvabījaparipākapariniṣpannabālānāṃ buddhau vidyamāno bāhyavastuvikalpa eva dharmī,
SA10ksmadhlu:358_2: sa paramārthataḥ svabhāvavirahito 'pi bhrāntyā bāhyamiva pradhānādyabhinnamiva sarvasāmarthyaśūnyaṃ ca sarvadharmasamavetamiva kalpayati /
SA10ksmadhlu:358_4: yato hi sa bālairbāhyapadhānādyupagṛhītavādiprativādibhirapi taimirikairdvicandradarśanamiva tadabhinnatayaiva vyavahriyate /
SA10ksmadhlu:359_0: sa hi yadyapi [sarvathā] buddhayā parikalpitamātra eva,
SA10ksmadhlu:359_1: tathāpi tadākāratayā buddhirityevamupacaryate vastuto 'yaṃ nāsti [kathamapi] buddhisvabhāvaḥ,
SA10ksmadhlu:359_3: ataḥ siddhe 'pi tasya niḥsvabhāvatve buddhiniḥ svabhāvatāyā nāsti prasaṅgaḥ,
SA10ksmadhlu:359_4: yato hi bāhyapradhānādīnāṃ tāvanniṣedhastu pramāṇaiḥ sādhyate,
SA10ksmadhlu:360_0: vastusatāṃ śabdādibāhyadharmiṇām anityādidharmasiddhaye [te] bāhyaśabdādayastabhinnāśca buddhistha upacāradharmiṇyevāśrayante,
SA10ksmadhlu:360_1: yato hi te deśakālādibhīnnāvasthāniyatā bāhyaśabdādayo vādiprativādināṃ buddhau svasvabhāvena naiva pratyakṣībhavanti /
SA10ksmadhlu:360_3: niraṃśatvāt / ato 'numānāmeyādayaḥ sarve vyavahārā buddhistha eva dharmiṇyāśritāḥ pravartante,
SA10ksmadhlu:360_4: prakārāntarāsambhavat / yadyevaṃ tadā paramārthato niḥsvabhāvatve parikalpitadharmiṇaṃ niḥśritya niṣedhādisiddhayartham āśrayāsiddhādidoṣāṇāmapravṛttavapi kāmaṃ balenāsmāsu apālambhāḥ kriyante /
SA10ksmadhlu:361_0: yathā hi paramārthapravṛttyarthaṃ bhavantaḥ pradhānādiniṣedhye parikalpitadharmiṇyeva sādhyasādhanādīn manasikurvanti,
SA10ksmadhlu:361_1: tathaiva vayamapi prasiddheṣu rūpaśabdādiṣu ye tāvat sadasadādisvabhāvā āropyante,
SA10ksmadhlu:362_0: tatra yathā āropite dharmiṇi vastutvāropaṇaniṣedhae 'pi vādiprativādiṣu pratībhāsamānatvād asadādidoṣā na pravartante,
SA10ksmadhlu:362_3: avabhāso hi tatkāraṇanivṛttyā jāyamānena satyasvabhāvena tāvannasti vyāptaḥ,
SA10ksmadhlu:362_4: alīkasyāpyavabhāsamānatvāt / yadyevaṃ no cettadā sarve puruṣāstadarśinaḥ syuḥ,
SA10ksmadhlu:363_0: yathaiva hi tasmin parikalpitadharmiṇi sāmarthyaśūnyatvavyāptyupanyāsena niḥsvabhāvatvaṃ prasādhya pradhānādayaḥ sādhyante,
SA10ksmadhlu:363_1: tathaivāsmābhirapi parikalpitavastuni tat [niḥsvabhāvatvaṃ] samyaktāa sādhayituṃ yathoktaḥ sāmarthyābhāvādiḥ kathaṃ na siddhaḥ syāt /
SA10ksmadhlu:363_5: atatstannirṇayo na kṛtaḥ vicāro 'pi nirṇayārthaka eva /
SA10ksmadhlu:363_6: yataḥ pramāṇādvārā siddhāntanirṇayakāle ko 'pi siddhānto nābhyupagato bhavatītyatastasmin kāle kasmin āśrayāsiddhimukhena dharmyasiddhayādidoṣaḥ pradātuṃ śakyate /
SA10ksmadhlu:363_7: atha vādī pramāṇaistattvanirṇayaṃ kṛtvā parebhyastatpratipādayituṃ pravṛtaḥ,
SA10ksmadhlu:363_9: tadāpi tāvanna ujyate / svapratītikāle siddhānto nābhyupagamyata iti /
SA10ksmadhlu:364_0: pūrvata eva siddhāntamanabhyupagacchanto vādinaḥ svayaṃ pramāṇatastattvajñānaṃ kurvanti,
SA10ksmadhlu:364_1: taireva cāparānapi bodhayantīti kathaṃ siddhanto 'bhyupagataḥ syāt /
SA10ksmadhlu:364_2: pūrvaṃ svayaṃ pramāṇaistattvaściyaṃ kṛvā siddhāntena aparebhyo 'vabodhanamapi nāsti siddham /
SA10ksmadhlu:364_3: apare 'pi prekṣāvantastāvat tacchabdamātreṇaiva pramāṇairanupapanne 'rthe naiva viśvasanti /
SA10ksmadhlu:364_4: ataḥ svamirṇayavad aparebhyo 'pi nirdeśasamaye tādavasthyāt sarvatra pramāṇaireva tattvanirṇayaḥ kriyate /
SA10ksmadhlu:364_6: ata eva kathaṃ tena dharmiṇastāvadasiddhādayaḥ pratīpādyante /
SA10ksmadhlu:364_7: samyakpramāṇabalena vādināmabhīṣṭasādhyasiddhāvapi 'siddhāntābhyupagamāt tebhyo doṣā jāyante' iti ye vadanti kiṃ teṣāṃ yuktyantaramiti /
SA10ksmadhlu:364_12: yadi tathāvidho dharmi siddho na syāttadā na ko 'pi kutrāpi tatsādhanārthaṃ pratvarteta /
SA10ksmadhlu:364_13: yadi tathāvidho siddhastadā taddharmoṃ 'pi ubhayasammataḥ siddha eva /
SA10ksmadhlu:364_14: ato nāsti vivādāvasaraḥ / ata eva sarve tattvajijñāsavaḥ siddhāntaviśeṣasiddhaṃ dharmiṇamapahāya āgopālaprasiddhameva tamāśritya sādhyasādhanaviṣayakaṃ cintanaṃ parivardhayanti /
SA10ksmadhlu:366_0: [7] "yatkhalu paraprasiddhapramāṇaiḥ svapakṣaḥ sādhanīyaḥ" iti yaducyate tad dūṣaṇameva tāvanna bhavati,
SA10ksmadhlu:366_1: anabhyupagamāt / ato vyavahāre vayam ubhayasiddhairhetvādibhiḥ sādhyaṃ sādhayāma ityevaṃ paścānnirdekṣyāmaḥ /
SA10ksmadhlu:367_0: [8] "sarve dharmā viviktāḥ, na kenāpi samyagliṅgenāliṅgitā atiparokṣatvād" iti yaduktaṃ tadapi tāvannaiva yujyate,
SA10ksmadhlu:367_2: vivādābhāvācca tatra / tathāpi katipayeṣu dharmisu sa siddhaḥ,
SA10ksmadhlu:367_4: ataḥ avinābhāvaniyamanirdeśena sāmānyadharmiṇi sādhyadharmaṃ sādhayeyuriti kathanaṃ yujyata eva /
SA10ksmadhlu:368_0: tadvadatrāpi māyāmaricisvapnagandharvanagarādisadṛśeṣu katipayeṣveva dharmiṣu sa sidhyatītyataḥ paramārthato niḥsvabhāvatvād ekānekasvabhāvādidharmeṣu vyāptiḥ siddhaiva /
SA10ksmadhlu:368_1: api ca, asmābhiranyatra savivādeṣu rupādiṣu vyāptidharmopadarśanena sādhitatvānnāsti doṣa iti /
SA10ksmadhlu:369_0: [9-10] ye kecana - "kāryasvabhāvābhyāṃ hetubhyāṃ naiva sarve dharmā niḥsvabhāvā iti sādhayituṃ śakyante,
SA10ksmadhlu:369_2: tadapi naiva yujyate, paramārthato bhāvasvabhāvasādhanāvetāviti kutrāpyanullikhitatvāt /
SA10ksmadhlu:370_0: yadā sādhanasvarupāntaḥpraviṣṭatvādimau vastusādhanāvityucyete tadā niḥsvabhāvatāyāmapi prayogaviśeṣavaśena sādhanasvabhāvāveva /
SA10ksmadhlu:370_1: atastatsādhyāmānāyāṃ kathaṃ na tau [hetū] sambhavataḥ? svabhāvahetureva kāryādihetubhyaḥ prayogabhedena vividhākāreṣu prapañcitaḥ /
SA10ksmadhlu:370_2: ata eva vidvadbhiḥ "pakṣadharmastadaṃśena vyāpto hetuḥ" iti sāmānyena hetulakṣaṇaṃ nirdiṣṭam /
SA10ksmadhlu:371_1: tathāpi imau dvāvapi teṣu vyavahārasatyatvena vidyete eva /
SA10ksmadhlu:371_3: "kevalaṃ samyak kāryamātreṇa svabhāvamātreṇa vā hetunā bhavitavyam" iti yaduktam,
SA10ksmadhlu:371_6: "ādarśadigataḥ pratibimbo hi tāvadanyadekaṃ rūpam" iti yaduktam,
SA10ksmadhlu:371_7: tadapi na yucyate, sapratighatvasya ekasminneva viṣaye 'nupapannatvāt /
SA10ksmadhlu:371_8: "tadeva rūpaṃ tathaivālambyate" idamapi kathanaṃ naiva samīcīnam,
SA10ksmadhlu:372_4: atiprasaṅgāt / 'vijñānasyaiva pratibimbākāratayā pratibhāsanādasti sa [ākāraḥ] vijñāsvabhāvena vastusan' idi yaduktaṃ tadapi na yuktiyuktam,
SA10ksmadhlu:372_5: yato hi amūrtaṃ nīlādivijñānaṃ niraṃśatayā sthitaṃ vividhākārarahitameva bhavatītyucyate /
SA10ksmadhlu:372_6: pratibimbavastu tadvilakṣaṇatayā pratibhāsata ityataḥ kathaṃ sa [ākāraḥ] tatsvabhāvena san syāt /
SA10ksmadhlu:372_7: yathoktaṃ bhavatāpi triṃśikāyāṃ pudgalaniḥsvabhāvataṃ pratipādayatā yad yo hi parikalpitaḥ svabhāvaḥ sa sarvathā nithyaiva,
SA10ksmadhlu:373_1: tathaivānye 'pi paraparikalpitadharmā naivālambitā bhavantīti kathaṃ nocyate /
SA10ksmadhlu:373_2: yathācāryairnirdiṣṭaṃ tathā sarvadharmaniḥsvabhāvatāsādhanāyāṃ vyāpyānupalabdhikṣaṇā dharmāḥ kathaṃ noktāḥ /
SA10ksmadhlu:373_3: tathā paścānnirdekṣyāmaḥ / yatkhalu svabhāvānupalabdhirasambhavetyuktaṃ tattāvat pūrvaṃ kṛtottaramiti /
SA10ksmadhlu:374_0: [11-12] viruddhopalabdhyādayo 'sambhavā iti yaduktaṃ tā atyasambaddhā eveti /
SA10ksmadhlu:374_1: yato hi sarve dharmā viviktāḥ katipaye ca sahaviruddhā iti na sidhyanti,
SA10ksmadhlu:374_2: tathāpi māyākhapuṣpādayaśca sāmānyatayā niḥsvabhāvāḥ sahaviruddhāśceti sidhyantyeva /
SA10ksmadhlu:375_0: yadyevaṃ nāsti tadā katham bhavadbhiḥ paraparikalpitā īśvarādayo niḥsvabhāvatvena sādhayituṃ śakyante /
SA10ksmadhlu:375_1: ataḥ sāmānyena niḥsvabhāvatāmātreṇa yadi vyavahāre viruddhādayaḥ sidhyanti,
SA10ksmadhlu:375_2: tataḥ sarveṣāṃ dharmāṇāṃ paramārthataḥ sattvābhyupagame virusśādharmādīnupadarśaya niḥsvabhāvatvena teṣāṃ samyak sādhanāt kimatra tāvad virodha /
SA10ksmadhlu:375_4: yato hi paramārthato niḥsvabhāveṣu dharmeṣu bhūtarupābhivyaktistu,
SA10ksmadhlu:376_0: ato yadi sarve dharmā niḥsvabhāvāḥsahānavasthānaviruddhāśca sidhyantyatastadviruddheṣu vastutāprasaṅga iti na vaktavyam,
SA10ksmadhlu:376_2: na tu paramārthataḥ / evameva dīpakādau adṛḍhalakṣaṇe vastuni paricchinne sati dṛḍhākāraviviktataiva tāvat paricchidyate,
SA10ksmadhlu:376_5: yo yathā parichidyate, yatra ca tathā paricchedo nāsti,
SA10ksmadhlu:376_6: sa abhāva eva tāavat parasparaparihārasthitalakṣaṇo viradho vyavasthāpyate /
SA10ksmadhlu:376_8: nāstyāsanne deśe 'gni, avikalaśīlasparśadityādisthaleṣu sa virodhadhastāvat sahānavasthānalakṣaṇo vyavasthāpyate /
SA10ksmadhlu:377_0: prasiddhe 'pi tasmin virodhe dīpakādayo hi vasturupeṇātyantamanupapannāḥ,
SA10ksmadhlu:377_1: māyādimithyāvastuṣvapi jātivināśayoravabhāsamānatvāt ata eva ācāryaiḥ paramārthapravṛttyarthaṃ yathā dīpakādiṣu nityānityādivirodho 'vabhāsate,
SA10ksmadhlu:377_2: tathaiva vyavasthā kṛtā / dīpakādayo bāhyārthatvena vijñānarūpatvena vā paramārthato 'siddhāḥ,
SA10ksmadhlu:377_4: paramārthavastusvabhāvena sahānavasthānalakṣaṇavirodhasya sākṣātkāri jñānaṃ paramārthavastusvabhāve na kathañcit pravartate,
SA10ksmadhlu:378_0: virodhastāvat sāṃvṛtika eva, vastūnāṃ svayameva vinaśyamānatvānnānyakāraṇaiḥ /
SA10ksmadhlu:378_1: yadi pratyayāntarairvināśa iti tadā na vināśahetubhistatra kimapyupakriyate /
SA10ksmadhlu:378_2: pratyayāntaraiḥ kriyamāṇe 'pi vināśe sa svahetubhireva kriyate,
SA10ksmadhlu:379_0: yadyavastutvād vināśasya tattvena anyatvena vā tasya vijñaptirna yujyata iti cintyate tadā ātyantikatayā sa vināśakāraṇairna kriyate,
SA10ksmadhlu:379_1: niḥsvabhāvatvāt / ato 'kiñcitkarā agnyādayo hi kathaṃ nāma paramārthato viruddhāḥ setsyanti /
SA10ksmadhlu:379_2: tathāpyagnyādayaḥ śītādīn kramaśo niḥsāmarthalakṣaṇān anityān prakarṣatamān utpādayantyata eva te hyagnyādayo viruddhā iti kevalaṃ vyavahriyanta eva /
SA10ksmadhlu:379_3: ata ācāryairvirodhanayo 'yamityukto na tu virodha evetyuktaḥ /
SA10ksmadhlu:379_4: ataśca virodho 'yaṃ vyavahāramātrāśrita evokto na tu paramārthāśritaḥ agniśītādayaśca na paramārthato bāhyārthasvabhāvāḥ sidhyanti,
SA10ksmadhlu:380_1: yato hi vṛkṣādayo vyāpakāḥ vastutaḥ sāmānyātmakāḥ /
SA10ksmadhlu:381_2: tathāpyukṣitatattvarthā vidvāṃso gajāvalokanamiva svapnadṛṣṭakhadirādivividhamithyāviṣayāṇāmanubhūtivad vṛkṣādivastūnāṃ mṛṣātvamevāśritya tathatāyāṃ pravṛttyarthaṃ paramārthānukūlatayā vyāpyavyāpakādivyavasthāṃ kurvate /
SA10ksmadhlu:381_4: na tu paramārthasattayā, bījādīnāṃ paramārthato 'siddhatvād bitathānāmapi svapnādīnāṃ tathaivāvabhāsamānatvācca /
SA10ksmadhlu:382_1: atastāni vyāvahārikeṇa kāryakāraṇabhāvena vastusvabhāvatvena vyāptāni bhavanti /
SA10ksmadhlu:382_2: kintu tāvatā tāni paramārthasvabhāvatayā na samavatiṣṭhante /
SA10ksmadhlu:382_3: yato hi vyāpake vidyamāne 'pi sati vyāpyasya siddhirna niyatā /
SA10ksmadhlu:382_4: tathāpi vastusvabhāvatvena suvyāptāni kāryakāranavastūni yadi nivatante,
SA10ksmadhlu:382_5: tadā māyādivat paramārthataḥ parikalpito vastusvabhāva eva nivartate /
SA10ksmadhlu:382_8: tairthikaparikalpitatāni pramāṇādīnī tathātāyā ananukūlatvāt parītyājyānītī sanyakpramāṇalakṣaṇapratipādakasya śāstrasya praṇayanaṃ kṛtamiti /
SA10ksmadhlu:383_0: itthaṃ katipaye tairthikāḥ piṇḍātmādikaṃ mithyāvastutattvaṃ sisādhayiṣayā sarvajñatāvirāgitākarmaphalasambandhādīnāṃ sāṃvṛtikīṃ vyavasthāṃ nirākartuṃ pramāṇānāṃ viparītalakṣaṇāni kurvanti /
SA10ksmadhlu:383_1: ataḥ sudhiyastāvattanniṣidhya pudgaladharmanairātmyatathatāyāṃ praveśānukūlāṃ sāṃvṛtikīṃ karmaphalasambandhādivyāvasthāṃ pratiṣṭhāpayituṃ pratyakṣādīnāṃ viśuddhāni pramāṇalakṣaṇāni viracitavantaḥ /
SA10ksmadhlu:384_2: ato virodhādivyavahārāṇāṃ svīkṛtiātreṇa yo hi bhāvasvabhāvābhyupagamaprasaṅgaḥ,
SA10ksmadhlu:385_0: [20] nanvevamanumānena saha sambandhaprasidhyarthaṃ pratyakṣapramāṇaṃ yadyabhyupagamyate tadā vastunastāvat siddhireva,
SA10ksmadhlu:385_2: abhrāntajñānenādhyavasitaḥ khalu vastusvabhāvaḥ kathaṃ nāmānumānena nirākartuṃ śakyate? yadi nirakriyate tadā pratyakṣameva tāvad bādhitaṃ syāt /
SA10ksmadhlu:385_3: yadi tad bādhitaṃ syāttadānumānameva tāvanna syāt sisthitam /
SA10ksmadhlu:385_4: pratyakṣasambaddhenāpyunumānena pratyakṣaṃ bādhyata iti kathanato naivācitamanyat /
SA10ksmadhlu:385_5: yadi pratyakṣasiddho 'rtho 'numānena naiva bādhyate tadā prāpyasya prāptyā susthita eva tāvad vastuvādīti kathanamapi samyaṅnirākṛtameveti /
SA10ksmadhlu:386_1: tatra yaddhi sādharaṇaṃ pratyakṣaṃ tat paramārthamadhikṛtya nāstyabhrāntam /
SA10ksmadhlu:386_2: anyathā sarvaṃ yogipratyakṣameva syānna ca syuḥ kecanāpyarvāgdarśinaḥ /
SA10ksmadhlu:386_3: yogipratyakṣātiriktaṃ sāmānya pratyakṣaṃ yadyapi [abhrāntaṃ] nāsti tathāpi vyavahāre svapnādivad yathāprasiddhenārthena sahāvisaṃvādāttadabhrāntamucyate /
SA10ksmadhlu:386_8: phalato yadeva sarvākāratattvamadhikṛtyābhrāntaṃ tadeva sarvākāratattvāvisaṃvādād yathārthamabhrāntamiti /
SA10ksmadhlu:386_9: ata eva bhagavadbhireva tāvat sarvadharmalakṣaṇarahitatā parijñātā /
SA10ksmadhlu:388_5: na cānumānabāghitamiti / yaśca paramārthatvenāropaḥ sa eva bādhyate,
SA10ksmadhlu:389_2: yato hi arvāgdarśibhirvāstavikaḥ paramārśasvabhāvaḥ pratyakṣatayā pṛthak pṛthak nānubhūyate /
SA10ksmadhlu:389_3: ato naiva vastusvabhāvaḥ saṃvṛtimapi bādhate kintu yo hi tatra satyākāratvāropastannirākṛtireva sādhyate /
SA10ksmadhlu:389_4: phalano vastuvādino arthābhāve 'pi arthābhiniveśinaste kathaṃ susthitā iti /
SA10ksmadhlu:390_0: ekato 'numānaṃ vyavahāreṇa pratyakṣasambaddhaṃ sat sthitiṃ pratnoti,
SA10ksmadhlu:390_1: aparataśca pratyakṣaṃ kāṣṭhadvayagharṣaṇajatitāgniriva tadbādhāṃ karotīti bādhitameva taditi cennaitāvatāsmāsvaniṣṭāpattiriti /
SA10ksmadhlu:390_3: sa ca mithyendhanāni bhasmīkṛtya svayamapyupaśāntaḥ praśāntavikalpalakṣaṇamuttamaṃ nirvāṇamavabodhayatīti /
SA10ksmadhlu:391_2: / ato yadi tattvajñānamutyadyate tadānumānalakṣṇā kalpanā nivṛttā satī nirāśrayāpi nānabhyupagatā [bhavatī] /
SA10ksmadhlu:391_3: ata eva bhagavatā ratnakūṭe savikalpāpi sampratyavekṣaṇā nirvikalpajñānaphalotpatteḥ kāraṇamiti [matvā] mahāphalābhinirvṛttaye kāṣṭhadvayagharṣaṇajanitāgnerdṛṣṭāntena nirdiṣṭā /
SA10ksmadhlu:392_0: [21] api ca, sarvadharmāṇāṃ niḥsvabhāvatvasādhane yadyeko hetubhūto dharmo nīrdiśyate tadā nivṛtisādhakaḥ sa dharmo viruddho jāyate /
SA10ksmadhlu:393_0: [22] yadyasan sa dharmastadā asato 'bhāvenāsambaddhatvāt kathaṃ hi sa [abhāvaṃ] sādhayediti /
SA10ksmadhlu:394_2: yato hyanena tāvat sadasadubhayadharmāṇāṃ paramārthatvasādhane hetorasambhavatvavocyate yuktijñaiḥ na tu niḥsvabhāvatādisāmānyadharmāṇāṃ lakṣaṇasādhane [sambhavatvamiti],
SA10ksmadhlu:394_3: yadi tathaiva syāttadā paraparikalpitānāmīśvarādīnāmapi niḥsvabhāvatvasādhane kathaṃ nāma te sarve codyā nābatariṣyantītī?
SA10ksmadhlu:395_0: tad yathā īśvarādiṣu sāmarthyavyāpyavastutvaniṣedhārthaṃ vastusvabhāve samāropaṃ ca nisedhārthaṃ asaddharmā na bhavantyasambaddhāḥ /
SA10ksmadhlu:395_1: evameva paramārthataḥ kāryakārāṇādivastudharmeṣu vyāpakaniṣedhena samāropaniṣedhaṃ sādhayituṃ kathaṃ nāsmāsu sādhyasādhanasambandhaḥ /
SA10ksmadhlu:395_3: yato hi vastusati svabhāve na tathā kartuṃ śakyate /
SA10ksmadhlu:395_4: yadi asatā asambaddhatayā asāmarthaṃ tadā kutra sāmarthyaṃ syāt /
SA10ksmadhlu:395_5: paramarthato 'sadvastuni na bhavati kaścana sambandho nāma /
SA10ksmadhlu:395_7: yathā sadvastuni dharmadharmibhāvādisarvāṇi vastujātāni kalpitānīti vyavasthāpyante tathā asadvastunyapi kathaṃ tāni naiva vyavasthāpyante?
SA10ksmadhlu:396_0: api ca, yadā ko 'pi kadācidapi svalakṣaṇatayā bhāvatvena paramārthato naiva sidhyati,
SA10ksmadhlu:396_3: atasteṣāṃ prativādo vā parīkṣaṇaṃ vā kathaṃ yujyeta,
SA10ksmadhlu:396_5: sattvasya tadabhāvasya cāpi hetorānukūlyena vādiprativādinoryathāprasiddhatvena te prasiddhayavinābhūtā evoktāḥ /
SA10ksmadhlu:396_6: atasteṣu dharmadharmitvaṃ viruddhatvaṃ vyāpyavyāpakatvaṃ svabhāvaḥ kāryatvādīni ca yathā ābhāsante tathaiva sarvā api vyavasthā aviruddhā eva /
SA10ksmadhlu:396_7: kaiścid vidvadbhiryadi darśanasyāsya dharmadharmiviruddhādyādhāreṇa prativādaḥ kriyate tadā tatra paramārthavyavahāranayānavabodha eva kāranaṃ bhavatīti /
SA10ksmadhlu:397_0: [24] tadapi na śabdamātreṇa sidhyatīti yaduktaṃ tanna duṣanamanabhyupagamāt /
SA10ksmadhlu:398_1: [25] na ca prasaṅgamātreṇa, api tu samyakprāmāṇenaiveti /
SA10ksmadhlu:398_2: ityevaṃ yadi vastuṣu paramārthasvabhāva eko bhavati tadā prakāradvayameva tatra bhavet hetupratyayāpekṣitatvāt sarveṣām,
SA10ksmadhlu:398_7: svabhāve 'smin ubhayamapi prakādvayaṃ paramārthatayā na sambhavati,
SA10ksmadhlu:398_9: yadi pratyakṣamanumānaṃ vā tatra sādhakapramāṇaṃ tadā vastusvabhāva eva pūrvaṃ tāvadubhābhyāṃ na siddhaḥ,
SA10ksmadhlu:398_11: kintu kāryakāraṇabhāva eva tāvat pratyakṣeṇa na paramārthataḥ siddhaḥ /
SA10ksmadhlu:398_14: nāpi ca tanmānasapratyakṣaṃ kutrāpi sidhyatīti tatrāmāṇyamaṅgīkriyate /
SA10ksmadhlu:399_2: kintu kāryakāranabhūtasya tasyānyārthasya paramārthato jñānagrāhyatvaṃ naiva yujyate /
SA10ksmadhlu:399_3: vijñāne svapratibhāsa iva yo hi jñānetarasvabhāvo 'nyāvabhāsaḥ [pratīyate],
SA10ksmadhlu:399_4: sa naiva [jñānād] anyaḥ / anyānanyau hi parasparaviruddhau /
SA10ksmadhlu:400_2: yo 'pi tadākārastajjñānākārameveti viśeṣābhidhāne satyapi vijñānasadṛśyenaivānyāvabodhaḥ saṃjāyate,
SA10ksmadhlu:400_5: yadi nāsti viśeṣastadārthakriyārthinaḥ svato vastvanudhānena samprayujyate,
SA10ksmadhlu:401_1: jñānasvabhāvasāmyena ca teṣāmapi parasparaṃ pratyakṣatvaṃ prasajyeta /
SA10ksmadhlu:401_2: tadudbhūtatve satīti viśeṣāntaropādāne 'pi anyārthasya pratyakṣatvena pratyatirasambhavaiva,
SA10ksmadhlu:401_3: yato hi abhyupagamamātreṇopacaritatvād viśeṣo na prasidhyatīti /
SA10ksmadhlu:402_0: anayacca, anyārtho yadi pratyakṣatvena prasidhyati tadā jñānaviśeṣastāvattatsadṛśastadudbhūto vā sādhanīyaḥ /
SA10ksmadhlu:402_1: kathaṃ jñānenānyārtho gṛhyata ityevaṃ vicāryamāṇe 'nyārtho yadi pratyakṣato 'siddhastadā kathaṃ tāvadasiddhena svabhāvabiśeṣeṇa siddhā mārgaviśeṣāḥ setsyanta iti yāvat /
SA10ksmadhlu:403_0: tadvijñānakṣaṇikatvasyāpi samanantarapratyayārthānubalenopapannatvād yathā jñānāni pūrvakṣaṇasāpekṣatayā samudbhavanti tathā janmāntarāṇyapi sambhavanti /
SA10ksmadhlu:404_1: svasiddhāntānusāraṃ ca yathā taddarśanopacāraṃ kurvanti tathā pratyakṣatayāvabhāso nāstyeva /
SA10ksmadhlu:405_2: ariṣṭanīlākṣapītākṣatimirādyapahatanetreṣu dūrasamīpasthita ekasminnapi vastuni vibhinnāni viṣamākārāṇi jñānānyutpadyante,
SA10ksmadhlu:405_3: ato bāhyāvayaviviṣayakaṃ kalpanājālaṃ citte nāstyeva vidyamānam,
SA10ksmadhlu:406_1: svapnādiṣu tathānīlādiguvatāmarthāntarāṇāṃ vidyamānatve 'pi nīlādyābhāsijñānānāṃ pṛthaganubhavo bhrānta evaṃ,
SA10ksmadhlu:406_3: ye khalu paramāṇvātmakalīādyarthānāṃ pratyakṣatvamāmanvate teṣvapi tāvat samānadoṣatāprasaṅgaḥ,
SA10ksmadhlu:408_0: yasthūle bhrāntaṃ tattathāgrahaṇataḥ pūrvamapi na [abhrāntaṃ] sidhyati,
SA10ksmadhlu:408_2: purataḥ pramāṇairyadi pramāṇyaṃ sidhyati tadā yā sthule bhrāntiḥ sā grahaṇapūrvikaivaikā sidhyati,
SA10ksmadhlu:408_3: yadi na tathā sidhyati tadā sā bhrāntirgṛhītetyeva na sambhavati /
SA10ksmadhlu:409_0: api ca, yādyākārā yāthātathyenābhyupagamyante tadā yathā vividhānāṃ rekhādīnāṃ vistārastathā jñānākārāṇāmapi ākāravat pṛthaktvam prasajyeta /
SA10ksmadhlu:409_1: siddhāntavaividhyasthāpanārtham anekajñānānāmutpādamavagacchato vijñānasya viṣayeṣu yathā prasārastathābhāso 'sambhāva eva /
SA10ksmadhlu:409_3: yadi [ākārāḥ] bhinnāstadā arthasadṛśjñānena teṣāṃ grahaṇaṃ nopapadyate,
SA10ksmadhlu:410_0: api ca, yadi jñānasādṛśayaṃ sarvātmanā bhavati,
SA10ksmadhlu:410_6: yadi viparyaye hyupacārat karturekadeśa eva tadā sarvatra vastusādṛśyasambhāvanayā sarvajñātṛtvaṃ syāt /
SA10ksmadhlu:411_6: yadi sa eva [anubhavaḥ] tadarthākārānubhavatvena gṛhyata iti cet? kalpanāmātramevaitat /
SA10ksmadhlu:411_8: atiprasaṅgāt / 'agnirmāṇavakaḥ [bāhmaṇavaṭuḥ]' iti kṛte 'pyupacāre naiva [tamin] dāhapākādiḥ prayujyate /
SA10ksmadhlu:412_2: atyantaparokṣatvādarthāntarāṇāṃ te [arthāntarāḥ] tadīyajñānākāravantaḥ santīti naiva sidhyati /
SA10ksmadhlu:412_7: nāpyanābhāsibhiḥ. teṣu bhedābhāvāt / tadā yadi sāmīpyād vijñānenārthāntaragrahaṇaṃ bhavatīti kalpyate tadā sarvāṇyapi vijñānāni sarvasamīpaviṣayakāṇi syuḥ sarveṣu tatsattāyā bhedābhāvāt /
SA10ksmadhlu:412_10: tataśca 'idaṃ nīlaṃ pītamidam' iti vibhāgo naiva syāt,
SA10ksmadhlu:413_0: kalpanāsvarūpamātre jñānābhinnātmake sādṛśyātiriktatayā na kaścanāpi bhedo bhaviturmahati,
SA10ksmadhlu:413_1: taddoṣāṇāmabhihitatvāt / sāmīpyavaśājjñānasya yadi nārthāntarādanubhavastadā kathamiti praśne tadutpattyaiveti vaktavyaṃ syāt /
SA10ksmadhlu:414_3: viṣayatvābhāvādevendriyaṃ na gṛhyata iti cennaitāvatā tadaviṣāyatvam ,
SA10ksmadhlu:414_5: ataḥ aviṣayatvānnāsti tadviṣaya iti kathamiva vaktuṃ śakyate /
SA10ksmadhlu:417_0: iti yaduktaṃ tadapyasiddham sākārabuddhayā arthāntaraparicchedābhāvāt kāryakāraṇabhāvaniśrcāyakapramāṇābhāve,
SA10ksmadhlu:417_2: anayā tāvad yuktyā sarveṣāṃ dharmāṇāṃ cittamātratākāyapramukhatvāt /
SA10ksmadhlu:418_2: kāryakāranabhāvastu pratyakṣasiddha iti cennaiva tad yuktimat,
SA10ksmadhlu:418_5: evaṃ yadi vijñānasya grāhyagrāhakākārarahitatve 'pi tasya vastusattvamabhyupagamyate tadā tatra tathānubhūterabhāvaḥ,
SA10ksmadhlu:418_7: yadyevaṃ na syāttadā sarvasyaiva tathatādarśanaṃ syāditi /
SA10ksmadhlu:418_8: tajjñānamapi yathānubhūyate na tathā sthitaṃ bhavati,
SA10ksmadhlu:418_10: yadi bhrāntatvāt tattathā jñānamiti cet? kā nāma bhrāntiḥ? yadi jñānaṃ tadā naiva sā pratyakṣam,
SA10ksmadhlu:419_3: yadi pratyakṣaṃ kalpanāsvabhāvaṃ tadā na tat svalakṣaṇaviṣayakam,
SA10ksmadhlu:420_0: api ca, yaḥ kalpanāsvabhāva ucyate, tena svatastadātmano 'bhivyaktirucyate,
SA10ksmadhlu:420_3: yadi sa [grāhyagrāhakākāraḥ] mithyā tadā tadabhinnaḥ kalpanāsvabhāvo 'pi tathaiva mithyā,
SA10ksmadhlu:420_4: tathātve kathaṃ sa pratyakṣapramāṇena bhāvasvabhāvaḥ prasidhyet /
SA10ksmadhlu:421_0: yadi viśeṣo [viśeṣyaḥ] mithyā tadā kalpanāsvabhāvasya sāmānyasya vastutā asambhavinī,
SA10ksmadhlu:421_2: tadevaṃ tattvajñānasya yathāvadanubhavābhāvānnaiva tasya svasaṃvedanapratyakṣatvaṃ yuktam /
SA10ksmadhlu:421_3: svasaṃvedanapratyakṣatve 'pi na hi tena jñānena kāryakāraṇabhāvasiddhiḥ,
SA10ksmadhlu:421_5: apekṣāviśeṣeṇa tayoḥ svabhāvaḥ parikalpyeta tathāpyarthāntaratvādapekṣāyāḥ svasaṃvedanapratyakṣābhāve sā naiva sidhyati /
SA10ksmadhlu:421_6: phalatastadapekṣayā vyavasthitasya tatsvabhāvasyāpi pratyakṣatvaṃ na yuktiyuktam /
SA10ksmadhlu:421_7: kāryātmakasya kāraṇātmakasya ca svabhāvasya arthāntarabhūtaṃ jñānamapi bhinnaṃ bhinnam,
SA10ksmadhlu:422_0: yadyekasmin jñāne nānubhavastadā na kenāpi sambandhagrahaṇam /
SA10ksmadhlu:422_1: ekajñānāvabhāse 'pi 'idaṃ kāraṇaṃ kāryaṃ cedam' iti pratyakṣe na śakyamubhayoḥ sattāsambandhagrahaṇam,
SA10ksmadhlu:422_4: tatpṛṣṭhabhāvinā niścayākarṣiṇā jñānenāpi paramārthatastad dvayaṃ naiva yujyate,
SA10ksmadhlu:422_5: tena tadanubhavasyābhāvāt / anyānubhavasyānyena niścayo 'pi naiva śakyate kartum,
SA10ksmadhlu:422_6: atiprasaṅgādeva / ekasantāne ekānubhavasya prajñaptirapi naiva yuktimatī,
SA10ksmadhlu:423_0: yadi pratyakṣeṇa kāryakāraṇabhāvo nānubhūyate kathaṃ tadā smṛtisvabhāvo 'pyutpadyeteti cenna,
SA10ksmadhlu:423_3: yathoktaṃ prāk / itthaṃ pratyakṣeṇa tāvanna tasya [kāryakāranabhāvasya] siddhiḥ /
SA10ksmadhlu:425_0: api ca, kāryahetunāpi sa vastutvena sādhayituṃ na śakyate,
SA10ksmadhlu:425_5: dharmiṇaḥ siddhāvapi paramārthataḥ kāryakāraṇabhāvasiddhaye nāstyeva kutrāpi hetovyārptiḥ,
SA10ksmadhlu:426_1: tadāpyetad bhrāntameva / taddhetukāle cāśeṣajagato vidyamānatvād 'asmin satī'ti tasya kāraṇatā naiva sarvathā sambhāvyate /
SA10ksmadhlu:426_3: na kṣaṇikatve, yadyevamucyate tathāpi paramārthakāryakāraṇabhāvasādhanasyaivātrāvasthitatvānnaiva tad yujyate /
SA10ksmadhlu:427_0: kasyāpi kāryakṣaṇasya sattvaṃ kasyāpi karaṇakṣaṇasattvād yadi kalpyate tadā tatsamakālaṃ sarvasattvāntargaśeṣavidyamānakṣaṇānāmapi sattvaṃ syāt /
SA10ksmadhlu:427_2: yadi dṛśyante, na vidyamānā yadi na dṛśyante,
SA10ksmadhlu:427_3: tathaiva taddhetukṣāsamākālaṃ sarvasattvāntargatāśeṣakṣaṇā vidyamānā yadi dṛśyante,
SA10ksmadhlu:427_5: evaṃ sati teṣāṃ kathaṃ na hetutvam /
SA10ksmadhlu:428_0: api ca, 'yadasti tat sat' ityuktau tacchabdena yadyanyo hetubhūto dharmītyevaṃ gṛhyate tadā so 'pi paramārthataḥ pratyakṣe naiva sidhyati,
SA10ksmadhlu:429_2: yadi dharmī tāvadasiddhastadā sato dharmasya hetutvaṃ naiva sambhavi nāpi cāsato dharmasya yaktam,
SA10ksmadhlu:429_5: yadi dharmī tāvadasiddhastadāparasyāpi sattvaṃ naiva sidhyati,
SA10ksmadhlu:431_0: api ca, yā khalu upalabdhilakṣaṇaprāptasyānupalabdhiḥ sā samupalabdhiphalā,
SA10ksmadhlu:431_1: īdṛśonānvayena yā karyakāraṇabhāvasiddhiḥ tatrāpi paramārthataḥ sandehaḥ /
SA10ksmadhlu:431_2: kiṃ tattvataḥ sadityataḥ sat atavā adṛśyānāṃ piśācādīnāṃ samīpavartitvāt athavā dūredeśasthitasya vastvantarasya samīpavartino balādevaṃvidhaḥ samdehaḥ /
SA10ksmadhlu:431_3: upalabdhilakṣaṇaprāptasyānupalabdhyā deśāntarāt tadāgamanasya pūrvato vā tatsattvasya niṣedhaḥ kriyate,
SA10ksmadhlu:432_0: yadi tat sattadā tatsattvaṃ yādṛcchikaṃ syāt /
SA10ksmadhlu:432_2: ye cānye tatsamarthahetavaḥ teṣāṃ nivṛttau tatphalasyāpi nivṛttau vyatirekena yā tatsiddhiruktā,
SA10ksmadhlu:432_6: yathā mātṛvivāhasaṃskāravati deśe janmādānam yatra ca nāsti mātṛvivāhastatrāsat /
SA10ksmadhlu:432_7: tatsamarthakāraṇāntarāṇi santītyevaṃ viśeṣābhāvānna syāt sandeha iti cet? na,
SA10ksmadhlu:433_0: kāryakāraṇayoḥ sandehe sati tannaiyatyārthaṃ yadyapi tatkāraṇaṃ samarthaṃ tathāpi prajñākṣetre viśeṣatastadasiddhivacanāni kathaṃ vidvadbhirnirākriyantām /
SA10ksmadhlu:433_1: anvayavyatirekau vyatīricya vastuni tatsiddhiniścāyakahetūnāmabhāvāt tatrānavasthādoṣaḥ syāt /
SA10ksmadhlu:433_2: yadi tat sattadā tatsattvaṃ sādhayituṃ śakyate,
SA10ksmadhlu:433_3: kintu sahakārivastūnāṃ pṛthaksvabhāva iva anyebhyastadutpattyāśaṅkā kathaṃ nivarteta /
SA10ksmadhlu:434_0: nārvagdarśināṃ parebhya utpattiniścayasya spaṣṭaṃ darśanaṃ bhavatīti /
SA10ksmadhlu:434_1: yadi parebhyo 'pi tadutpattistadā na bhaved hetubhedād bheda iti cet? na,
SA10ksmadhlu:434_3: yadi pṛthak tadviśeṣeṣveva te sahakāripratyayā upayujyante,
SA10ksmadhlu:434_4: na tu kāryamātre iti cet? na,
SA10ksmadhlu:435_0: yadi viśeṣasya pṛthagviśeṣe upacaryamāṇatvāt sa tattvānyatvābhyāṃ cintayituṃ na yujyata iti vyāharanto naiva viśeṣān vyāharanti,
SA10ksmadhlu:435_1: prājñaptikasya kadācidapi hetāvayujyamānatvāt samūhamātreṇaiva tāvadutpattirvibhaktiścāpi vidhīyate,
SA10ksmadhlu:435_2: na tvekaikeneti cet, tadapi naiva yujyate, na ca kāyaṃ vyatiricya samūho bhavati /
SA10ksmadhlu:435_4: phalataḥ paramārthataḥ kāryakāraṇabhāvasiddhau nāsti kimapi pramāṇam,
SA10ksmadhlu:435_6: ata ācāryaiḥ kāryakāraṇabhāvo yathāprasiddhi siddha ityuktaḥ /
SA10ksmadhlu:435_8: ityevaṃ paramārthato 'nityasvabhāvam sādhayituṃ nāsti kimapi pramāṇam,
SA10ksmadhlu:435_11: nityasvabhāvamapi tāvat paramārthataḥ sādhayituṃ nāsti pramāṇam,
SA10ksmadhlu:436_0: ātmādinityavastūnyapi yathā svasiddhanteṣu vijñapyante tathā pratyakṣajñāne naivāvabhāsante /
SA10ksmadhlu:436_3: na cātra parāpekṣā yujyate, anādheyātiśayatvād apekṣāyā ayogāt,
SA10ksmadhlu:437_1: tasya [vijñānasya] vijñeyasvabhāvānusaraṇāt saḥ [vijñeyaḥ] api tad [vijñānaṃ] anusarati,
SA10ksmadhlu:437_2: anyathā tena jñeyasvabhāvānusaraṇamapi na kṛtaṃ syāt,
SA10ksmadhlu:438_0: nānumānenāpi tat sidhyati, kenāpi hetunā saha tasyāsambaddhatvāt /
SA10ksmadhlu:438_5: ata ātmādīnāṃ sukhādiphalena saha kutrāpyanvayo na sidhyati avikalakāraṇatvena na tataḥ kādācitkasukhotpatiriti /
SA10ksmadhlu:438_6: vyatireko 'pi tāvānnāstyeva, nityatvādavyatireka eva / nāpi svabhāvahetostatsattvasiddhiḥ sambhavati,
SA10ksmadhlu:438_8: ye tāvad rupādayaḥ prasiddhadharmiṇaste 'pi paramārthato 'siddhā eva /
SA10ksmadhlu:438_10: anupalabdhyāpi tāvannaiva tatsattvasiddhiḥ pratiṣedhasiddhau samarthatvāt pratiṣedhamātraṃ sā sādhayatīti /
SA10ksmadhlu:439_4: phalataḥ vastusvabhāvaparīkṣaṇārthaṃ nāsti kimapi sādhakaṃ pramāṇamiti /
SA10ksmadhlu:439_5: ataḥ prekṣāvadbhiḥ paramārthataḥ sattvena sa naiva vyavaharttavyaḥ /
SA10ksmadhlu:439_6: tatra tāvadayaṃ payogaḥ - yasya paramārthaḥ sādhane nasti kimapi pramāṇam,
SA10ksmadhlu:439_7: kalpanānirmitatvāttasya tathaiva samyaktāyā grahaṇaṃ naiva karttavyam,
SA10ksmadhlu:440_0: uparyuktayorubhayoḥ samyaksvabhāvayoḥ prasiddhayarthaṃ nāsti kimapi pramāṇam /
SA10ksmadhlu:440_3: nāsti hetorasiddhatvamiti yaduktaṃ tat pūrvaṃ vistareṇa vicāritam /
SA10ksmadhlu:441_3: tādṛśasya khalu vyāpyavyāpakabhāvasya kutrāpyanvayaṃ vihāya vyatirekamātrena siddherasambhavāt /
SA10ksmadhlu:442_1: yat sat tat kathamasaditi tannivṛttyā vyatirekī bhavituṃ śaknoti,
SA10ksmadhlu:442_2: sambandhābhāvāt / ato niyatameva pramāṇābhivyaktānvayaḥ sadbhāvavyavahāraśca svīkarttavyaḥ /
SA10ksmadhlu:443_0: yadi sa svīkriyate tadā kvacittadeva saditi sadavyavahārapramāṇaṃ yat yat sattānuvidhāne prasiddhaṃ tadevāsmākaṃ vastuni prasiddhamiti cet? tannaiva yujyate /
SA10ksmadhlu:443_1: evaṃ sadvyavahārapramāṇavyāptamapi pramāṇamātreṇa paramārthatayā naiyatyena sadviṣayitvena naiva setsyati,
SA10ksmadhlu:443_3: anyathā vṛkṣeṇāpi śiṃśapādiviśeṣā niścayeṇa jñāsyanta iti,
SA10ksmadhlu:443_4: kimatenāsti pratikūlam? evaṃ tāvad vṛkṣastvaśeṣaviśeṣasādhāraṇatvānna tena devalādiviśeṣā nirṇetuṃ śakyāḥ /
SA10ksmadhlu:443_5: pramāṇaṃ hi naiva tāvad bhāvātikrānte 'parasminnapi sambhavati /
SA10ksmadhlu:444_1: sarvapramāṇāni bhāvābhivyañjakāni tadvyāptapramāṇabalabhāvivyavahārapravartakānyapi pramāṇāvajñātavastumātre pravṛttatvād vṛkṣādivat kutaḥ sādhāraṇānīti cet? naitad yujyate,
SA10ksmadhlu:444_2: saṃvṛtikajagadarthaviṣayīṇyapi pramāṇani bhavantītyetad bahudhā pūrvaṃ carcitam /
SA10ksmadhlu:444_6: vaktṛṇāmapi tattvaviṣeye kaścana vivādo na syāt,
SA10ksmadhlu:444_9: mohanivartanaphalatvāteṣām, tattvajñānārthameva taiḥ sarveṣāṃ mohāvakāśo dūrīkriyata iti /
SA10ksmadhlu:445_0: lakṣaṇakārairlakṣaṇeṣu parasparavirodho bhinnasiddhāntapraveśo vā na kariṣyate,
SA10ksmadhlu:445_1: tattvasyaikasvabhāvatvāt / ato vyavahārapramāṇaṃ yannaiva paramārthaviṣayi tadapi vyavahārapramāṇaṃ sambhavatyeva /
SA10ksmadhlu:445_5: dehadhāriṇo ye vastusvabhāvasya yathāvat parijñānena saṃsārakārāto mumukṣavasteṣāmavidyā viṣayebhyo vinivṛttavabhāvā,
SA10ksmadhlu:445_7: abhīṣṭārthakriyāsādhakarthaprāptimātreṇa puruṣā naiva muktāḥ syuḥ sarvasya muktiprasaṅgāt /
SA10ksmadhlu:445_8: ataḥ avisaṃvādi jñānaṃ pramāṇamiti yaduktaṃ tat pramāṇasādhāraṇalakṣaṇam /
SA10ksmadhlu:445_10: ataḥ kathaṃ tasmin samyag vastu aviparītatayā setsyati /
SA10ksmadhlu:446_0: [26-29] ye tāvat paramārthataḥ svaparobhayāhetukato 'nutpannāsteṣāṃ samyaktayā niḥsvabhāvatvāt,
SA10ksmadhlu:446_1: khapuṣpavat / yāni tāvat svato vā parato vā aviparītayā sadvastūni,
SA10ksmadhlu:446_2: tāni sarvāṇyapi tathaiva / atra nāsti pramāṇāsiddhatvamapi,
SA10ksmadhlu:446_3: yato ye tāvat sāṃkhyādayaste hetuṃ satkāryaṃ vyavasthāpayanti /
SA10ksmadhlu:446_4: svata eva vastūni jāyanta iti bruvāṇā naiva yuktisaṅgatāḥ /
SA10ksmadhlu:446_5: na hi sad vā asad vā vastu svataḥ svahetau niṣpadyate /
SA10ksmadhlu:446_8: tadānīṃ tasyāsiddhatvādeva / phalataḥ ko hi nāma kasyotpādakaḥ syāt /
SA10ksmadhlu:447_1: tadātmanā siddho 'pi viśeṣābhāvāt kastāvat kasyotpādakaḥ syāt /
SA10ksmadhlu:447_3: atiprasaṅgāt / upakāryopakārakatvaṃ tāvadutpādyotpādakasvabhāva eva vastuni yujyate /
SA10ksmadhlu:447_4: yadi sa svabhāvena siddhastadā tasmin aṇumātramapi upakāryasvabhāvasyābhāvāt kathaṃ sa utpādyaḥ syāt /
SA10ksmadhlu:447_5: aviśeṣaṇīyatve 'pi yadyutpādyatvamahetukatāyāmupakalpyate tadā sajjñānamapi tathaiva kiṃ na parikalpyate /
SA10ksmadhlu:447_7: ata eva vidvadbhiḥ "ābhyātmikāyatanāni na svata utpannāni,
SA10ksmadhlu:447_8: sattvāt, sajjñānavat" ityasmin prasaṅge prāṅgārthamaviditvā kecana [prayoge] asmin dṛṣṭāntāsiddhiṃ,
SA10ksmadhlu:447_11: ityaṃ pareṣu parasparavirodhaṃ pratipādayiṣayā pareṣu siddhāni sajjñānādīni tāvadudāhriyante /
SA10ksmadhlu:448_7: pariniṣpannabhāvātmakatve 'pi yadi tadupakāraḥ svīkriyate tadā tadbhinnaḥ sa upakāro na svata utpadyate,
SA10ksmadhlu:448_9: yadyabhinnastadopakārasyāpi tathaiva siddhatvāt sa kathamiva setsyati /
SA10ksmadhlu:449_0: api ca, yadi kāryakāraṇabhāvo 'yaṃ vṛkṣadrumavat paryāyatayocyate tadā na tathā lokaprasiddhiriti /
SA10ksmadhlu:449_3: yadi hetvabhivyaktau vipariṇāme vā sati phalaṃ bhavatīti nirdiśyate tadā evamayaṃ pṛthagvyasthitaḥ saddhetureva /
SA10ksmadhlu:449_4: naivaṃ cintanaṃ yujyate, yato hi sa yadi abhivyaktervipariṇāmasya vāvabhāso niścayena tadbhinnastadā kevalādanyasmādutpattirevābhyupagatā syāt /
SA10ksmadhlu:449_5: yadi nāsti bhinnastadā kāryakāraṇaviplavadoṣaḥ prasaktaḥ syāt /
SA10ksmadhlu:450_2: parasparaparihārasthitalakṣaṇadharmasya itarapratiṣedhakatvād anyatrāsiddhatvācca anubhayapakṣakalpanamapi naiva yuktīmat /
SA10ksmadhlu:451_0: api ca, yadyabhīṣṭe taddhetau abhīṣṭaṃ vastu ātmanaḥ purvasvabhāvamaparityajya abhivyaktādyavasthāṃ prāpnoti tadā avasthāvikṛtiprasaṅgaḥ /
SA10ksmadhlu:451_3: yadi parityajyeti pakṣastadā niraṃśasvabhāvatvāt kaścidapyanvayasvabhāvo na syāt /
SA10ksmadhlu:452_0: api ca, vyaktamapyanābhāsitaṃ saditaralakṣaṇatvād itarābhyāmabhivyaktipariṇāmābhyāṃ prabhāvitatvāt parikalpitameva /
SA10ksmadhlu:452_2: viruddhatvāt / ekameva vastu tattvaparicchedakāle taditaravyāvṛttyā paricchidyate /
SA10ksmadhlu:452_4: etadaviparītatvena paricchede sati na tat paricchedayogyaṃ syāt /
SA10ksmadhlu:452_5: yasya paricchedakāle yo vicchedyo na bhavati,
SA10ksmadhlu:452_7: ye parasparaparihārasthitalakṣaṇāste ekasmin dharmiṇi naiva yuktarupāḥ,
SA10ksmadhlu:452_13: nāstyatra kaścana vivādaḥ / ataḥ yo hi vastubhedaḥ prāgavasthāvilakṣaṇaḥ parikalpyate,
SA10ksmadhlu:453_1: sa pūrvamapi paramārthato vidyata iti? tadā sa tadānīṃ kathaṃ nopalabhyate /
SA10ksmadhlu:453_2: athānābhāsasvabhāvatvāt pūrvaṃ nopalabhyata iti cet? tadā haitāvapi tasya tathaivānupalabdhiprasaṅgaḥ /
SA10ksmadhlu:453_3: iṣyamāṇe 'pi copalabdhisvabhāve prāgvat paścādapi anupalabdhaḥ syāt /
SA10ksmadhlu:453_4: yadi tadanīṃmāvṛtatvādanupalabdha iti cet? tadā paścādapi āvaraṇaśaṅkāsadbhāvāt tathaivānupalabdhiprasaṅgaḥ /
SA10ksmadhlu:453_5: dugdhādīnāṃ śatadhā vināśe 'pi yā hi dadhyādirupeṇa upalabdhilakṣaṇaprāptiḥ,
SA10ksmadhlu:453_6: sā nāstyupalabdhibādhikā / api ca, yaḥ kaścid dṛḍharupeṇa bhāvasvabhāvastatsya kathamanyathā vikārānubhavaḥ syāt /
SA10ksmadhlu:453_7: yadi sa tāavadadṛḍhasvabhāvastadāpi bhaṅguratvānniranvayaṃ vinaṣṭaṃ syāditi tasyāpyanyathā vikārānubhavo naiva syāt /
SA10ksmadhlu:454_0: ato 'bhivyakteḥ pariṇāmasya cāyujyamānatvād yā hi tābhyāṃ svata utpattiparikalpanā,
SA10ksmadhlu:454_1: sāpi tāvannaiva yujyate / yadi ākasmikī tavat svata utpattistathāpi yaddhi vastūnāṃ deśakālasvabhāvaniyatattvam,
SA10ksmadhlu:454_2: tasya kiṃ kāraṇaṃ syāt / nirapekṣeṣu tāvad vastuṣu tathāvidhā naiyatyāmbhāvanā naiva yuktimatī /
SA10ksmadhlu:454_3: yadi hi parasāpekṣatvaṃ tadā parata utpattiḥ syāt,
SA10ksmadhlu:454_4: na hi upakārābhāve apekṣā nomopapadyate sāpi paścānniṣetsyata iti /
SA10ksmadhlu:454_5: apekṣāyā api tāvat sadā saṃnihitasvabhāvatvāt sarvadaivotpattiprasaṅgaḥ /
SA10ksmadhlu:454_6: ityevaṃ vyavahāre 'pi tāvat svata utpādo 'sambhava eva /
SA10ksmadhlu:455_1: tadā sa [parākhyaḥ pratyayaḥ] nityo vā bhaved,
SA10ksmadhlu:455_2: anityo va / nityāttāvad vyavahāre 'pi notpādo yuktiyuktaḥ,
SA10ksmadhlu:455_6: phalataḥ kathaṃ nāma tasmāt kramaśo 'rthakriyā sampasyate? parairanādheyaviśeṣasya [kvacidapi] apekṣāyā anupapannatvāt /
SA10ksmadhlu:455_11: asattvāt / asattve 'pi tatpratibaddhātmabhāvasya prāpyamāṇatvād buddhiparikalpitā apekṣā tāvad vyavasthāpyate,
SA10ksmadhlu:455_12: kintu tadabhinirhārāya yo hi apratisāmarthyavān hetuḥ,
SA10ksmadhlu:456_0: ato nityatvena yadabhīṣṭaṃ vastu sadaivopakaroti tadapratihatasamarthyaṃ hetuṃ parityajya kathamanyān apekṣiṣyate? kāryāṇi hi sahakārikāraṇānyapekṣante,
SA10ksmadhlu:456_3: yena tebhya utpattimasvīkurvadbhirbalena "naivotpādyante" ityevam ātmabalopadarśanaṃ kariṣyate,
SA10ksmadhlu:456_4: nānyatra / ato naiva tāvad akrameṇa kramotpattiriti /
SA10ksmadhlu:456_5: evameva kāryāṇi yadi hetudharmān nānusaranti tadā tadabhinnatvaprasaṅgaḥ syādeveti /
SA10ksmadhlu:457_0: akramādapi hetoḥ kramiṇaḥ kāryasyotpādo na virudhyatīti cet? naitad yujyate,
SA10ksmadhlu:457_1: yataḥ 'kāryāṇi sarvān hetudharmān nānuvidadhate' ityevaṃ tatkathanaṃ syāt /
SA10ksmadhlu:457_4: kimapi kāryaṃ nityasya vastano vyatirekaṃ naivānuvidhatte,
SA10ksmadhlu:458_0: nāpi anvayānuvidhānamapi / avikale 'pi kadācit kāryotpādābhāvāt yad yatra anvayavyatirekau nānuvidhatte,
SA10ksmadhlu:459_0: sataḥ kāryasya tāvat [kvacidapi] apekṣā naiva yujyate,
SA10ksmadhlu:459_1: sarvātmanā siddhatvāttasya / ato nākāṅkṣata eva sarvānapi /
SA10ksmadhlu:459_2: itthaṃ nitye tāvat kramaśo 'rthakriyā na yujyate,
SA10ksmadhlu:459_3: nāpi ca yugapadapi, yato hi tasya tathāvidhārthakriyāyā vinaṣṭasvabhāvamanusṛtya kāryotpattirvā tadviyogo vā na yujyate /
SA10ksmadhlu:459_4: yadi tatsāmarthyasvabhāvaṃ paścatkāle 'pi anusarati tadāpi tena sarvāṇi kāryāṇi yāni pūrvotpannani tāni naiva punarutpādayituṃ śakyante,
SA10ksmadhlu:460_0: yadanyat tatsadṛśaṃ tatkathaṃ notpadyata iti virodhaparīkṣāpi tāvannaiva yujyate,
SA10ksmadhlu:460_2: sāmarthye sati pūrvotpannameva syāditi cet? naiva tāvattad yujyate /
SA10ksmadhlu:460_3: tata utpādyasya kāryasya anutpattāvapi tadutpattisāmarthyasvabhāvānusaraṇaṃ pratihataṃ syāt /
SA10ksmadhlu:460_4: yo yadā yadutpādayati tadā tasmin apratihatasāmarthyaṃ bhavatīti kathanaṃ naiva yuktimattaram /
SA10ksmadhlu:460_5: tasmādayaṃ pūrvamapi paścātkāla iva anutpādaka eva syāt,
SA10ksmadhlu:460_7: tataśca paścātkāle 'pi pūrvavad utpādaka eva syāt /
SA10ksmadhlu:460_8: yadyevaṃ nāsti tadā viruddhadharmayogād asmaikatvahāniḥ syāt /
SA10ksmadhlu:461_2: [ataḥ] asanneva saḥ / ato parasparaparihārasthitalakṣaṇo virodhāntaro na sidhyatīti cet? asanneva tadā sa iti /
SA10ksmadhlu:462_1: ataḥ kalpakalpāntareṣu aviśeṣatayā sthitatvāt pūrvavat paścādapi tasya vināśo naiva yujyate /
SA10ksmadhlu:462_3: yathā te atītādapi vipākahetoḥ kāryotpattiṃ varṇayanti,
SA10ksmadhlu:462_4: anāgatāṃ vā, yathā tata eva anāgatajāterutpādaḥ /
SA10ksmadhlu:462_5: evaṃvidha upacāro vā vartamānakriyākramo vā atītāddhetorbhavatīti vādo naiva sarvathā yuktaḥ,
SA10ksmadhlu:462_6: atītasyāsattvāt / yadi tata utpattiraṅgīkriyate tadā ahetuta eva syāt /
SA10ksmadhlu:463_1: yadyevaṃ nāsti tadā vartamāna iva anupahatasvabhāvātmakatvāt kathaṃ hi sa atīta iti /
SA10ksmadhlu:463_6: evaṃ sati vinaṣṭāyāḥ kriyātaḥ kāryotpattirnaiva yujyate /
SA10ksmadhlu:463_7: evaṃ na bhavati / kathaṃ hi kāryotpattau kriyamāṇāyāṃ kriyāvināśa iti /
SA10ksmadhlu:463_8: ekasvabhāvātmake vastuni kriyāvanti akriyāvanti ca kāryāṇi na yujyate,
SA10ksmadhlu:464_0: ākṣepamātrā hi kriyā, na cānādhāyikā, abhinnatvāt sa ākṣepakāla evādhānaṃ kariṣyati /
SA10ksmadhlu:464_1: anyathā pūrvavat paścādapi sā tathā bhavituṃ na śaktā syāt /
SA10ksmadhlu:465_0: api ca, kriyā nāma sā kiṃ samarthasvabhāvā yaduta karmasvabhāvā? yadi tat svabhāvadvayaṃ vastunaḥ sakāśād bhinnaṃ tadā kathaṃ nāma tad [vastu] vinaṣṭamityabhidhātuṃ śakyate /
SA10ksmadhlu:465_1: yadi tadupahatasvabhāvaṃ tadā samastavastuno nityasattāvādasya hāniḥ prasajyate /
SA10ksmadhlu:465_2: arthāntaravināśe satyapi vastuno hyacalasvabhāvasya vināśo naiva sidhyati /
SA10ksmadhlu:465_3: yathā mṛte 'pi devadatte yajñadattasya anupahatasvabhāvātmakatvānmṛta sa iti vaktuṃ na śakyate /
SA10ksmadhlu:466_1: tadaitannaiva yujyate, anavasthānāt, yato hi kriyāyāṃ kriyāntarasadbhāvo nāstyet /
SA10ksmadhlu:466_2: tasyāmapi tulya eva virodhaḥ parīkṣā ca /
SA10ksmadhlu:466_4: anyārthatve sati kriyāyāḥ vastu tāvad ahetukameva syāt,
SA10ksmadhlu:466_8: anyārthakriyāntarobhayasvabhāvātmakatvād yadi vastuna utpattirabhyupagamyate tadā kriyā yadā vastuna utpattirabhyupagamyate tadā kriyā yadā svabhāvata evotpādayati tadā vastvapi tathaivotpādakaṃ syāt /
SA10ksmadhlu:466_9: phalato 'nyārthapratītyā kim? arthāntarasya pakṣatve anyārthakalpanāyām anavasthādoṣānnaiva [kadāpi] hetutvaṃ sidhyet /
SA10ksmadhlu:466_10: vastūpakārābhāvād 'asyeyaṃ kriyā' - iti sambandha eva na siddhaḥ syād,
SA10ksmadhlu:467_0: upakārakatvameva yadi vastutvenāṅgīkriyate tadā kriyātmakatvād vastunaḥ,
SA10ksmadhlu:467_1: kriyāmupakarotīti cettadā kāryamapi kathaṃ na tathaivopakaroti? kena tāvat kāraṇena kriyāntaratvenopakalpyate? yadi kriyā hi sanmātravastusāpekṣaiva tadā avikalahetutvāt sadā talsamīpavartinī eva,
SA10ksmadhlu:467_3: yadi sā arthantarabhūtā tadā sambandhastāvadasiddha eva /
SA10ksmadhlu:467_4: kriyāṇāmeva parasparayogād vastu tāavad gauṇameva sthāsyapi /
SA10ksmadhlu:467_5: kṣaṇikasya [vastunaḥ] utpādasamanantarameva asthāyitvāt [tasya kasyāmapi] kriyāyāṃ karmasvabhāvatvaṃ naiva yujyate ye tāvadakṣaṇikāste sadā ekasvabhāvatvenāvasthitvānnaiva kriyāvanta ākāśavat /
SA10ksmadhlu:467_6: ataḥ keṣvapi 'karma kriyate' iti na sidhyati /
SA10ksmadhlu:468_3: ataḥ kathamatītasya sattvaṃ setsyatītī? vastunaḥ svasvabhāva iva kriyāyā api avināśaprasaṅge sati kriyāyā naiva [kadāpi] vināśaḥ sidhyati /
SA10ksmadhlu:468_4: saiva kriyā punaryadi anyatve 'nabhidheyeti sati kriyāyā naiva [kadāpi] vināśaḥ sidhyati /
SA10ksmadhlu:468_5: saiva kriyā punaryadi anyatve 'nabhidheyeti kalpyate tadā prajñaptisattvāt sā avastveva /
SA10ksmadhlu:469_0: nāpyanāgatāt / atīta iva tasyāpyasattvāt / evamasattvād ākāśakamalasadṛśād anāgatādapi kāryotpattirnaiva yujyate /
SA10ksmadhlu:469_1: yadi aprāptakriyastāvadanāgata ityucyate tadā tadānīṃ tasmādapi kāryotpattiḥ ātyantikatayā naiva yuktimatī,
SA10ksmadhlu:469_2: aprāptakriyatvādeva / yadi vastu sarvadā vidyamānaṃ tadā tasyāḥ prāpteravikalakāraṇānāṃ sadbhāve 'pi kimiva kriyā naiva prāpyate /
SA10ksmadhlu:469_3: nāpi kriyā vastunaḥ sakāśādarthāntarabhūteti pūrvameva nirdiṣṭatvāt /
SA10ksmadhlu:469_4: yadi nāsti arthāntarabhūtā tadā kriyāvat svabhāvo 'pi naiva aprāptaḥ syādabhinnatvāt /
SA10ksmadhlu:469_6: vastunaḥ svabhāva iva tadabhinnā kriyāpi sarvadā sadeva,
SA10ksmadhlu:470_1: yadi tataḥ [vartamanāt] kāryaṃ samutpadyate tadā samakālaṃ vā samutpadyatām,
SA10ksmadhlu:470_3: na tāvat kadācit samakālam / kāryotpattitaḥ pūrvaṃ śaśaśṛṅganibhād asatkāraṇād utpādo naiva yuktaḥ /
SA10ksmadhlu:470_4: yasmin kāle ca hetorātmabhāvaḥ [kāryotpadane] samarthastasmin kāle kāryasyāpi samakālaṃ sattvāt siddhameva tat [kāryam] iti /
SA10ksmadhlu:470_5: atastasmin [karye] sa hetuḥ kamapi vyāpāraṃ naiva karoti /
SA10ksmadhlu:470_8: yadyevaṃ na syāttadā kāryakāraṇabhāvasyaiva bhaṅgaḥ syāditi /
SA10ksmadhlu:470_9: viṣama [bhinna] kālamiti pakṣo 'pi naiva sambhavati evameva yadi kāryaṃ [utpādāt] pūrvameva sat syāt tadānāgatotpādaḥ syāt /
SA10ksmadhlu:471_0: yadi [kāryaṃ] kṣaṇāntaravyavadhānenotpadyate tadā tadatītādevotpadyata iti naiva yuktamityuktapūrvam /
SA10ksmadhlu:471_3: athāpi syāt, yadyapi avyavahitatvena kāryasyotpādastathāpi nāsti samakālikatāprasaṅgaḥ,
SA10ksmadhlu:471_6: atra bhagavatāpi - "asmin satīdaṃ bhavati" iti kāryakaraṇabhāvasya nirdeśāt kalpanātrayaṃ vivarjya caturthī svīkriyate /
SA10ksmadhlu:471_7: tāḥ kalpanāḥ punaḥ - kāraṇat pūrvaṃ kāryaṃ vā,
SA10ksmadhlu:471_8: samakālike kāryakāraṇe vā, kṣaṇāntaravyavahitatvaṃ vā, avyavahitatve sati dvitīyakṣaṇe 'vasthānaṃ vā - ityevaṃvidhāḥ syuḥ /
SA10ksmadhlu:472_0: tatra yattavat pūrvameva sthitaṃ bhavati na tad hetau sati jāyate,
SA10ksmadhlu:472_10: ityaṃ dvitīyakṣaṇe vidyamānaṃ kāryameva hetoḥ samutpadyate,
SA10ksmadhlu:472_12: tato 'vyavahite dvitīye kṣaṇe kāryasattāyā anubhavārtham - "asmin satīdaṃ bhavatī" tyuktam /
SA10ksmadhlu:472_16: prathame kṣaṇe kāraṇasya avinaṣṭātvāt tadavyavadhānenaiva ca kāryasyotpādāt /
SA10ksmadhlu:472_17: tṛtīye kṣaṇe tāvat kāryotpādo 'sviti cet? naitadapi yujyate,
SA10ksmadhlu:472_19: vidyamānaṃ kāraṇaṃ kālāntarāvyavahitaṃ ca kāryaṃ yadyabhyupagamyate,
SA10ksmadhlu:472_22: niraṃśe tāvad vastuni kālāntareṇāvyavahite ca sati samakālikatvaṃ muktvā nānyā gatiḥ sambhavati,
SA10ksmadhlu:472_24: yadi nāsti madhye kālāntarāstitvaṃ tadā avaśyaṃ pūrvāparatoḥ kṣaṇayoḥ saṃsparśaḥ syāt /
SA10ksmadhlu:472_25: tathā ca sati sarveṣāṃ [kṣaṇānāṃ] ekasminneva kṣaṇe samanupraveśaḥ syāt /
SA10ksmadhlu:472_26: [phalataḥ] yathā paramāṇoḥ sarvātmanā saṃyoge piṇḍasya aṇumātratāprasaṅgaḥ,
SA10ksmadhlu:473_0: yathā khalu deśakramaḥ pramāṇairavabhāsamānatvāt saṃvṛtau svīkriyata tathā kālakramo 'pio tatsadṛśa eva,
SA10ksmadhlu:473_2: tatra prayogaḥ - ye sarvātmanā kālāntareṇāvyavahitāsteṣu pūrvāparakālabhedo na sambhavati,
SA10ksmadhlu:473_4: athaikadeśenāvyavahitatvam, naiva sarvātmaneti cet? tadā kṣaṇasyāpi sāvayavatvaprasaṅgaḥ /
SA10ksmadhlu:473_7: abhāvena ca saha sarvātmanā vā ekadeśena vā avyavahitatvamiti cintā na pravartata iti cet? tadapi naiva yujyate,
