SA10ksmadhlu:473_8: tayormadhye kasyā api kālāntarasadbhāvasambhāvanāyā abhāvānnaiva tadā hetvabhāvayogaḥ sambhavati /
SA10ksmadhlu:474_5: yadi tad vartamānaṃ tadā [tasya] asattven saha virodha āpadyate /
SA10ksmadhlu:474_6: yadi tat sadityabhyupeyate tadā avyavahitatvadicintā kathaṃ na pravṛtā syāt /
SA10ksmadhlu:474_8: kintu kāryasattākāle tadasaditi hetoḥ avyavahitatvādicintā naiva kāryeti cet? naitadapi yujyate,
SA10ksmadhlu:474_10: itthaṃ tu bhavantaḥ kāraṇasya nirantaratve satkāryasyotpattiṃ varṇayanti /
SA10ksmadhlu:474_13: nirantaratvam avyavahitvaṃ saṃspṛṣṭatvamityādīnāmabhinnārthakatvāt tadabhyupagamasāmarthyena kāryakāraṇaikatvamapyabhyupagataṃ syāt /
SA10ksmadhlu:475_0: api ca, vinaṣṭahetoḥ kāryotpattiprasaṅgasya ayujyamānatvād bhavantastaṃ [pakṣaṃ] parityajya vartamānahetoravyavadhānena kāryotpattimabhyupagacchanti /
SA10ksmadhlu:475_1: tatra tāvat kiṃ sarvātmanā kāryotpattiṃ svīkurvanti yaduta ekadeśeneti cintā pravṛttaiva syāt,
SA10ksmadhlu:475_3: tatra ca ye nāpyekadeśena na ca sarvātmaneti bruvanti,
SA10ksmadhlu:475_4: tena taiḥ kimucyata iti vicāryamāṇe avyavahitamapi nāpyavyavahitamiti kathanaṃ paryavasyet /
SA10ksmadhlu:476_0: api ca, yadi vidyamānakāryakāle kāraṇaṃ nāstyeva,
SA10ksmadhlu:476_1: tadā 'avinaṣṭāt kāraṇāt kāryamutpadyata' iti naiva kathanīyam,
SA10ksmadhlu:476_3: yasmin kāle kāraṇam avinaṣṭaṃ tasmin kāle kāryamapi nāsti,
SA10ksmadhlu:477_0: evaṃ cintyate - svayaṃ vināśavyavahite 'pi vastuni nāsti samakālikatvam,
SA10ksmadhlu:477_2: tathaivātrāpi kāryakāranayorasamīcīnarūpatve 'pi samakālikatvaṃ nāstītyayaṃ vicāraprakāro na yujyate,
SA10ksmadhlu:478_0: evaṃ tatra sadasadbhāve yadyekadeśenāvyavahitatvaṃ tadā avayavisadbhāvaprasaṅgaḥ /
SA10ksmadhlu:478_2: tathaiva chāyātapayorudakadharāyāṃ cāpi yadi sarvātmanāvyavahitatvaṃ tadaikadeśatvameva syāt /
SA10ksmadhlu:478_4: asmākaṃ tu [mate] sarva evāyaṃ sadasadbhāvaḥ paramārthato 'siddhaḥ,
SA10ksmadhlu:478_6: avyavahitatvādisamudbhūto 'sadbhāva iti nāsti kaścana vyavahārastathāpi dvipīye kṣaṇe vastūni svasvabhāvanirodhamātraṃ prajñapayanti /
SA10ksmadhlu:479_0: nirodhamātraṃ tāvanna kiñcit, atastena saha paramārthato 'vyavahitatvādicintanaṃ naiva pravartate /
SA10ksmadhlu:479_1: kāryakāraṇayostu paramārthataḥ sattvabhyupagamād ekadeśenāvyavahitatvādicintā tāvat pravartata eva /
SA10ksmadhlu:479_2: āryaśālistambasūtre yo hi bhagavatā tulādaṇḍopamayā avyavahitatvena kāryakāraṇabhāvo 'bhihitaḥ,
SA10ksmadhlu:479_6: tadā sa khallavasiddha eva / parasparaviruddhayorunnāmāvanāmādikṛtyayorekasmin yugapadbhāvo naiva samīcīnaḥ /
SA10ksmadhlu:480_0: laṅkāvatārādisūtreṣu bhagavatā kāryakāraṇabhāvaniṣedhastāvat sāṃvṛtakāryakāraṇeṣvevāvagantavyaḥ yadapi bhagavatā 'asmin satīdaṃ bhavati' ityuktaṃ tena vikalpatrayaṃ parihatya caturthaṃ eva vikalpo 'bhyupagamyata iti yaduktaṃ tad vakṣyate kiṃ 'asmin satīdaṃ bhavati' iti vacanena vikalpatrayaṃ niṣidhya caturthavikalpābhyupagam āgamena nirdiṣṭo yaduta yuktyā? āgameneti cet,
SA10ksmadhlu:480_1: tannaiva yujyate / yato hi yau chāyāṅkurau dīpaprakāśau vā samakālavidyamānau tāvapi dīpe sati prakāśo bhavatīti na vyavahāraviruddhau /
SA10ksmadhlu:480_4: yadi hi vastutvaṃ pramāṇāntaraiḥ paramārthataḥ kṣaṇikatvena sādhyate tadā tadapi parikalpitamātrameva,
SA10ksmadhlu:480_5: na tvāgamena [siddhaḥ] / itthaṃ tu loke 'pi samakālikaṃ chāyāṅkurādikamapi kāryakāraṇabhāvena jñāyata eva /
SA10ksmadhlu:481_0: atha yuktyeti pakṣaḥ, tadā bhagavato vacanāni [pramāṇatvena] naivoddhartavyāni,
SA10ksmadhlu:481_2: atha kevalayā yuktyaivaikayā kathanīyamiti cet? etadapi naiva vaktuṃ śakyate,
SA10ksmadhlu:481_3: yato hi yathā yuktyā vikalpatrayaṃ na sambhavati tathā caturtho 'pi vikalpaḥ paramārthato naiva sambhavatīti [pūrvaṃ] vistarena nirdiṣṭam /
SA10ksmadhlu:482_0: lokaprasiddhimatikramya nityatvadravyatva svātantryādiguṇopetamātmānamabhyupetamātmānamabhyupetya karmafāsambandhādisaṃvṛtiṃ nirākurvatāṃ dṛṣṭiparihārārthaṃ bhagavaduktena idampratyayatāmātreṇevāvasthiteṣu saṃvṛtimāśritya asmin satīdaṃ bhavatītyuktam,
SA10ksmadhlu:482_1: na tvāgamena vikalpatrayaṃ parihatya caturthavikalpāśrayaṇaṃ kalpanīyam /
SA10ksmadhlu:482_3: phalataśca sarveṣāṃ vastūnāṃ māyeva prajñāptyā utpādādibhya eva santuṣyatām ,
SA10ksmadhlu:484_0: ato ye ācāryāḥ "na paramārthata adhyātmikānyāyatanāni praratyayataḥ samutpadyante,
SA10ksmadhlu:484_1: paratvāt" ityādyabhidadhate, [teṣāmapi] te hetavo naiva sandigdhavipakṣavyāvṛttikāḥ,
SA10ksmadhlu:484_7: vyavahāre parataḥ siddhatvānnastyasiddhatvaṃ pramāṇasyāpi [bhavanmate paramārthataḥ] samyagvastutvāddhetvādīnāṃ na vyavahāraḥ kutrāpi sidhyatīti nirdiṣṭaṃ pūrvam /
SA10ksmadhlu:485_0: tairthikāḥ ye hi parādivyavahāravaśāt parādīni santīti kathayanti tān ācārya āha -
SA10ksmadhlu:487_0: ityādinā dūṣayatītyucyate / ataḥ śāstraistāvadasiddhatvāt parata utpattirnāstīti nirdiṣṭam /
SA10ksmadhlu:487_1: parādayaḥ śabdā ye tāvatprajñāptigocarāstānapi paramparayā vastusaṃsargiṇa ityabhidadhatāṃ teṣāṃ 'vastusabhāvaḥ pratyayeṣvastītyutpadyate' ityumamabhiprāyamādāya dūṣaṇaṃ pradattam,
SA10ksmadhlu:487_2: pratyayādiṣu sattve paramārthato vastusvabhāvasyānutpādāditi vistareṇa khalvabhihitam /
SA10ksmadhlu:488_0: ato yadā sarveṣāṃ vastūnāṃ paramārthataḥ parata utpādo naivopapadyate tadā pratyayādibhyo 'pi anutpādādasiddha eva /
SA10ksmadhlu:488_1: ato nāstyeva paramārthataḥ śabdasaṃsargi kimapi vastu /
SA10ksmadhlu:488_2: phalato 'siddhe 'pyevaṃvidhe vyavahāre vastu tāvadabādhitameveti yaduktaṃ tanna yujyate /
SA10ksmadhlu:489_0: [30] ye sāṃkhyādayaḥ pradhāneśvarādikaṃ manvānāḥ pradhāneśvarādibhyo vastūnāmutpādamabhyupagacchanti,
SA10ksmadhlu:489_1: teṣāmapi mataṃ svato vā parato vā utpādapakṣe pṛthakpṛtham doṣābhidhānānnaiva yuktarūpamiti /
SA10ksmadhlu:490_0: anye ye kadācit svātantryena ubhayata utpattiṃ varṇayanti ,
SA10ksmadhlu:490_2: apare ca ye tāvat - 'ubhayātmakasya vastunaḥ pramāṇaviruddhatvānna ko 'pi tadabhyupagacchatīti hetoḥ ubhayata utpattiṃ dūṣayitvā bhavantaḥ kevalamātmānameva mohayanti,
SA10ksmadhlu:490_4: te tāvad vidvāṃsaḥ svayaṃ śāstrāṇāmaparijñānāt śabdārthayośca samyaganavagamāt [kevalaṃ] śabdaśa upahasanti /
SA10ksmadhlu:490_5: kecana tāvat kaṇṭakāditīkṣṇatādṛṣṭāntena sarvāṇi vastūni paramārthato 'hetuta utpadyanta iti kathayanti,
SA10ksmadhlu:490_6: tatra vastūnāṃ paramārthato 'hetuta utpattiṃ sādhayatāṃ teṣāṃ dṛṣṭāntastāvannaiva siddhaḥ,
SA10ksmadhlu:490_8: saṃvṛtau suddha iti cenna, tatrāpyasiddha eva, kaṇṭādīnāṃ svabījata utpādaḥ pratyakṣato niścitatvāt /
SA10ksmadhlu:490_9: anenaiva teṣāṃ taikṣṇyādīnāmapi niścitatvānna ko 'pi [dharmaḥ] ahetuta utpadyate /
SA10ksmadhlu:490_10: evaṃ kādācitkatvāt sarveṣāmeteṣāṃ vastūnāṃ sāpekṣatvaṃ niścitameva anapekṣitasya tu sadā aviśeṣāttasya kādācitkatvaṃ nopapadyata eveti /
SA10ksmadhlu:491_4: ahetukatve sati sarvatra abhinnatvāt kaṇkādiṣvapi tīkṣṇatāyā nirdhāraṇaṃ na syāt /
SA10ksmadhlu:491_6: ye bījādayaste loke kāryakāraṇātmakatvena pratyakṣataḥ siddhāḥ /
SA10ksmadhlu:491_8: api ca, hetutaḥ sādyasya sādhanāvasare anyataḥ [hetataḥ] utpatteḥ [siddheḥ,
SA10ksmadhlu:491_13: ato 'hetuvādī khalu vyavahāre pratyakṣādibhirbādhitatvād vidvadbhiḥ sāvadhānatayā pariharttavya eva /
SA10ksmadhlu:492_1: te yathā avicāraramaṇīyatvena prasiddhāstathā teṣāmaniṣedhād anutpattirityucyate,
SA10ksmadhlu:492_7: atasteṣu vyāpterutpatteḥ samyaṅ nivṛttyā tasyāpi [sasvabhāvatvasya] nivṛttiḥ /
SA10ksmadhlu:492_11: sā khalu [utpattiḥ] tadvijñāne tathaivāvabhāsata ityapi kathanamyuktam,
SA10ksmadhlu:492_12: kathanamayuktam, tatrāpi paramārthatastathākāro naiva sambhavīti pūrvaṃ nirdiṣṭam /
SA10ksmadhlu:493_0: tadutpattyā sasvabhāvatvādīnāṃ vyaptatve 'pi utpattau satyāṃ samyaksvabhāvo naiva niyatarūpeṇa sidhyati,
SA10ksmadhlu:493_1: vyāpakasāmīpye sarvavyāpyāṇāṃ sāmīpyaṃ navaśyaṃbhāvīti niścitamityuktameva pūrvam /
SA10ksmadhlu:493_2: ataḥ sādhāraṇamevaitad / paramarthato na kasminnapyutpattiḥ pravartata iti sādhitameva /
SA10ksmadhlu:494_0: yanna kaiścidapi pratyayaiḥ samutpadyate tad vastu kutaḥ prādurbhavatīti kathayadbhirabhivyaktimātrameva ato 'naikāntika eva heturiti cet tatasyāpi pūrvaṃ nirākṛtatvāt tyājyamevaitaditi /
SA10ksmadhlu:494_1: atha pratyayairvastu abhivyajyata eveti cettadā ki sā abhivyaktiḥ svalakṣaṇopacayasvabhāvā vā tadāvaraṇasaṃkṣayātmiokā vā indriyaiḥ sukṛtā vā tadviṣayakavijñānotpattilakṣaṇā veti vicāraḥ samupajāyante /
SA10ksmadhlu:495_0: tatra naiva tāvat prathamaḥ pakṣaḥ kathamapi yujyate, nityatāyā hāniprasaṅgat /
SA10ksmadhlu:496_0: yadā anupacayasvabhāvaḥ svato vinaśya abhivyañcakapratyayairutpadyate tadā ekasyāparasyānupacayasvabhāvasyotpādavaśāt svalakṣaṇopacayo bhavatīti cet? na,
SA10ksmadhlu:496_1: tatpūrvasvabhāvo yadi na nirudhyeta tadā dvau parasparāvirudhau upacayāpacayasvabhāvau niryuktitayā ekasminneva svīkāryau syātām /
SA10ksmadhlu:496_2: yadyapūrvaḥ kaścana svabhāvo notpadyate tadā abhivyañcakāḥ pratyayāstāvannirarthakaḥ syuḥ /
SA10ksmadhlu:497_1: yadyasti ekā kriyā, tadā sarve te pratyayā ye yadā arthamabhivyañcinti tadā ananyārthabhūtā kriyā tatra naiva sambhavati,
SA10ksmadhlu:497_3: nityasya bhāvasya tvāvaraṇaṃ tadviśeṣāṇāmavināśād anutpādācca kadāpi na yujyate,
SA10ksmadhlu:497_7: yadi nāsti sa samartho vā svavijñānavijñeyo vā tadā svahetuvikalatayā tadvijñānotpattireva na syāt /
SA10ksmadhlu:498_0: yathā āvaraṇasaṃkṣaye tathā vijñānotpattāvapi avighnāpādanasvabhāvo 'pi kriyāyāṃ naiva yujyate /
SA10ksmadhlu:498_1: asāmarthyāt tadvijñānavijñeyasvabhāvābhāvācca abhivyañjakaiḥ pratyayairāvaraṇaṃ kriyata ityasyāpi nirākaraṇaṃ kṛtameva [pūrvam] /
SA10ksmadhlu:498_3: yadi sāmarthayamabhyupagamyate tadā āvaraṇakārake satyapi avikalahetoḥ sadbhāvāt sadaiva vijñānotpattisambhavād vyañjakānāṃ bhāvānāṃ kriyā nirarthikaiva syāt /
SA10ksmadhlu:498_4: ato nityasya tāvadakiñcikaratvāt kathamapyāvaraṇaṃ na yujyate /
SA10ksmadhlu:498_5: anityatā tu kadāpi kenāpi hetuviśeṣeṇa vijñānānutpādakasyānyasya kṣaṇasyotpādād āvriyata eva /
SA10ksmadhlu:499_2: pūrvasadṛśatvāttasya / yadi tadanyārthabhūtaṃ tadā sukṛtatvaṃ naiva yuktiyuktam,
SA10ksmadhlu:499_4: kasminnapi vastuni kenāpi kimapi karaṇaṃ tāvannaiva sambhavamiti [pūrvaṃ] nirdiṣṭam /
SA10ksmadhlu:499_5: indriyaiḥ sukṛtatve 'pi yadi abhivyañcakairbhāvaiḥ tadindriyavijñānotpādāsāmarthyam athavā tadvijñānavijñeyasvabhāvāsattvaṃ tadā tadvijñānotpattirasambhavinī,
SA10ksmadhlu:500_0: yadi vidyata eva sāmarthyaṃ tadvijñeyasvabhāvo vā tadā indriyaiḥ sukṛtakatvataḥ pūrvameva tasmin [viṣaye] vijñānotpādasya prasañgaḥ syāt,
SA10ksmadhlu:500_2: atastamin viṣaye vijñānotpādalakṣaṇamapi na saṅgataṃ syāt /
SA10ksmadhlu:500_3: yato hyevaṃ tad vyaṅgyaṃ vastvapi yadi asamarthaṃ vā tadvijñānavijñeyavabhāvaṃ vāpi nāsti tadā vijñānotpāde 'pi na pad [vastu] tasya [vijñānasya] viṣayaḥ syāt /
SA10ksmadhlu:500_4: yadi [tad vastu] samarthaṃ vā tadvijñānavijñeyasvabhāvaṃ vā syāt tadā svasvabhāvavat sāmīpyāt tatsattāmatreṇaiva vijñānasya samutpādo bhaviṣyatītyato na tena vyañjakavijñānotpādaḥ kriyata iti [sidhyati] /
SA10ksmadhlu:501_0: api ca, bhavatāṃ tāvanmate sarvesāṃ vastūnāṃ jāyataḥ sadaivāvatiṣṭhanta iti hetostatra [vastuṣu] vyaṅgyavyañjakādīnāmapi sadā avasthitatvāt /
SA10ksmadhlu:501_6: nityasya ca sarvasāmarthyavirahiotatvānnaiva hi vastutvaṃ kathamapyupapadyate /
SA10ksmadhlu:501_9: yathā - vandhyāputra iti / ye tāvadīśvarādayaḥ [paraiḥ] abhyupagamyante,
SA10ksmadhlu:501_10: te 'pi tathaiva / te 'pi kramayogapadyābhyāmarthakriyāvirodhāt sarvasāmarthyaśūnyā eveti pūrvamapi [bahudhā] nirdiṣṭam /
SA10ksmadhlu:502_0: asaṃskṛteṣvapi tathātvāt kathaṃ tāni vastūnīti? ityevaṃ pratisaṃkhyānirodhādayo ye sarvasāmarthyaśūnyāsteṣāṃ vandhyāputrādyabhinnatve 'pi ye khalu tān vastutvena parikalpayanti ,
SA10ksmadhlu:503_0: pratisaṃkhyānirodhādayo yadi kasyāpi jñānasya viṣayāstadā avaśyaṃ te hetutvenaṅgīkaraṇīyāḥ,
SA10ksmadhlu:503_5: anupakāritve 'pi yadi vijñānena vijñeyasvabhāvasya abhāvād viṣayatvaṃ kalpyate,
SA10ksmadhlu:503_6: tathā sati yadi vijñānaṃ vijñeyasvabhāvamanusaratīti tadā tadvijñānasyāpi tadanusaraṇena nityatāyāḥ prasaṅgaḥ /
SA10ksmadhlu:503_8: yadi sarvajñajñānaṃ taditi na kasyāpi vastunaḥ sāmīpyamiti kalpyate,
SA10ksmadhlu:504_0: yena kāraṇena tato vibhaktaṃ śaśaśṛṅgādiṃ ye jñeyatvenopacaranti,
SA10ksmadhlu:505_3: vandhyāputrādisadṛśe tadabhitnne 'pi yadi vastviti nāma prajñapyate,
SA10ksmadhlu:505_4: tadā nāsti vivādaḥ, kintuṃ kathaṃ vandhyāputrādayo 'hetukā iti nocyata ityucyate /
SA10ksmadhlu:508_3: yadi tāni kramaśa ekasiddhinisedhāmyām aparaniṣedhasiddhibhāñji na syustadā asadeva syuḥ /
SA10ksmadhlu:508_4: phalata ekasya niṣedha evāparasya siddhiriti hetoḥ kathaṃ tāvadanabhidheyaṃ vastvityabhidhīyate /
SA10ksmadhlu:509_0: anyathā [yadyevaṃ nāsti tadā] anabhidheyatvāt sarvāṇyeva vastunyanabhidheyāni syuḥ /
SA10ksmadhlu:509_1: phalataḥ svaparoditānām aśeṣavastuviśeṣāṇāṃ vilopasambhavād mahātmabhirvajrakaṇādiyukticatuṣṭayasyābhidhād ebhyo mārgebhyo
SA10ksmadhlu:511_0: na svato nāpi parato na dvābhyāṃ nāpyahetutaḥ /
SA10ksmadhlu:511_1: utpannā jātu vidyante bhāvāḥ kvacana kecana //
SA10ksmadhlu:512_0: ityevaṃ sarve dharmā nirātmāna iti sādhyante /
SA10ksmadhlu:512_1: ata eva bhagavatā prajñāpāramitāsūtre vastuṣu nityānityagrāhasya tāvanniṣedhaḥ kṛtaḥ /
SA10ksmadhlu:512_5: kathamiti cet? yadā tad rūpaṃ sadeva nāsti tadā tannityābhidhānasya tu kathaiva kā? ityuktam /
SA10ksmadhlu:513_0: ata evātrāpi parataḥ kāryotpāde tāvat ko virodhaḥ,
SA10ksmadhlu:513_1: kathaṃ hi tato 'pi [parato 'pi] kāryotpādaniṣedhaḥ kriyate? nātra [kānicit] bādhakapramāṇānyapītyādi yaduktam,
SA10ksmadhlu:514_0: satkāryotpādaniṣedhāryamapi bhavatāṃ savidhe nāsti ubhayasiddho heturdṛṣṭāntaścetyādi yaduktam,
SA10ksmadhlu:514_1: tāpi naiva yujyate / tathā hi - kiṃ tat yat sadityucyate? aṃśaistāvanniraṃśasya siddhirasambhavinīti yasya svabhāvaḥ sarvātmanā niṣpannaḥ,
SA10ksmadhlu:514_2: yaśca niṣpannasvabhāva iti tasya paraiḥ[hetupratyayaiḥ] apūrva ityākhyaṃ bhedaṃ kartuṃ naiva śakyate /
SA10ksmadhlu:515_0: vicchinnamātre sādhye tathaiva ca hetornideśe na te abhūtadharmito viruddhāḥ /
SA10ksmadhlu:515_2: pūrvameva tannirdiṣṭatvāt / sādhyasādhanayoḥ sapakṣe 'nugamānnaiva viruddhakhyo 'pi hetudoṣaḥ /
SA10ksmadhlu:515_6: yasya kenāpi bhavati bhedaḥ, sa tasya prakṛtiḥ / ato yastāvadanyaḥ, sa kathaṃ tasyeti? yaśca svabhāvataḥ pūrvameva sthitaḥ,
SA10ksmadhlu:515_7: sa hetusannidhānāt pūrvamapi tathaiva bhāvāt kathaṃ 'hetubhirutpannaḥ' iti kathayituṃ śakyate? ato nāstyanaikāntikatvamiti /
SA10ksmadhlu:516_0: bhedayogyatvādutpattau vyāpakatvamityato 'sadutpadyata iti ced? vyavahāramātreṇaivaitat syāt,
SA10ksmadhlu:516_1: paramārthato 'sattvāt / evameva yadi savabhāvato 'bhāva ekaprakṛtika eva,
SA10ksmadhlu:516_2: tadā paścādapi kathaṃ sa satsvabhāvaḥ syāt,
SA10ksmadhlu:516_4: yaśca parasparaparihārasthitalakṣaṇo dharmaḥ sa tadviruddhadharmiṇi kathaṃ nāma yuktaḥ syāt,
SA10ksmadhlu:516_5: yathā amūrtadhārmāntarbhūtaṃ tāvadākāśaṃ kathaṃ nāma mūrtaṃ syāditi /
SA10ksmadhlu:516_6: utpattyākhyo hi prasiddhaḥ satsvabhāvastāvad asatsvabhāvaparihārasthitalakṣaṇatvāt kathaṃ hi nāma paramārthato 'bhāvena samprayuktaḥ syāt /
SA10ksmadhlu:517_0: evaṃ vicāryamāṇe yadsat, tasya utpattikriyāvatyāmutpatau kimapyupadeśanaṃ nāma nāsti /
SA10ksmadhlu:517_1: pṛthaksāmarthyavataḥ kasyāpi bhāvātmakasya hetoranantaraṃ prādurbhāvasya sampratibhāsābhāvāt taddhetorasadutpadyata iti loke utpattiviśeṣaviṣayikāyāḥ kalpanāyāḥ abhidhānasya ca vyavahāraḥ pravartate /
SA10ksmadhlu:517_2: vyavahāramātreṇa tu vastusattve bādhāleśo 'pi naiva sambhavati /
SA10ksmadhlu:517_4: yadi tat sat, tadā naiva tadasat / yo hi paścādapi utpattisvabhāvaḥ,
SA10ksmadhlu:517_5: sa tāvadanya eva / yaścānyaḥ, sa na tasyetyabhidhātuṃ śakyate /
SA10ksmadhlu:517_6: ataḥ 'asadutpadyate' iti yadktaṃ tadabhāvato bhāvasiddhiriti naiva yujyate /
SA10ksmadhlu:518_0: yadyetad vastu hetoḥ sāmīpyāt pūrvamudbhūtaṃ nāsti,
SA10ksmadhlu:518_2: yadi tadā kiñcidapi nāsti tadā tat kadācid vastutvenābhidhāsyata iticintā naiva yujyate /
SA10ksmadhlu:518_3: yadi nāsti vastunaḥ kimapi bhāvātmakamastitvaṃ tadā tasya svabhāvo 'sadeveti suspaṣtamabhidhāsyate /
SA10ksmadhlu:518_5: evaṃ yo hi pūrvamasan, sa paścādbhāvī kaścana bhāvasvabhāva eva /
SA10ksmadhlu:519_1: pūrvaṃ nāsīdityasadutpattervyavahārasyāpi hetupratyayābhāsāḥ kathaṃ samyagityabhidhātuṃ śakyāḥ? evamabhūtasya bhūtasiddhistāvadasataḥ satsiddhireva syāt /
SA10ksmadhlu:519_2: yato hi yadi nāstyanyastadā abhūtādanyo bhūto nāsti satsamīpavarttyapi /
SA10ksmadhlu:520_2: ekasmin krameṇa sattvāsattve aviruddheityabhidhānamapi naiva yujyate /
SA10ksmadhlu:520_4: yadi samakāle te aviruddhe tadā krameṇāpi kathaṃ te na tathā,
SA10ksmadhlu:521_0: bhinnadharmiṇi viruddhalakṣaṇasyāviruddhatve 'pi ekasmin dharmiṇi naiva krameṇāpi tad bhavituṃ śakroti /
SA10ksmadhlu:521_3: anyathā parairapi pradhānādīnāṃ kramaśo mahadādigaṇe parivartanam abhivyaktim vā upakalpayatāṃ vyaktāvyaktādidharmavirodhaḥ kathamabhidhīyate /
SA10ksmadhlu:521_4: krameṇa vastūnāmutpādakeṣu īśvarādiṣu kathaṃ nāma samarthāsamarthādivirodhodbhāvanaṃ yujyate /
SA10ksmadhlu:521_5: ye kecana parvatakāyavajrādīn dṛḍhasvabhāvān teṣāṃ śītoṣmādyavasthābhedena kramaśo bhedaṃ vyavasthāpayanti,
SA10ksmadhlu:521_6: te 'pi teṣāṃ kṣaṇikatvaṃ sisādhayiṣavaḥ kathaṃ krameṇa prādurbhavatsu teṣu śītoṣmādiviruddhatvamabhidhātuṃ śaknuvanti /
SA10ksmadhlu:521_8: bhūtvā cābhāvatvenāvabhāsanta iti vicāraṇād ekasmin kramaśaḥ sadasattvaviruddhatvena vyavasthāpayituṃ śakyata iti kathayantīti cennedaṃ yujyate /
SA10ksmadhlu:521_9: yato hi tāmrādiṣvevaṃ dāḍharyamārdavaśaityauṣṇyādīni krameṇa dṛśyanta eva /
SA10ksmadhlu:522_1: yato hi māyāsvapnādisamā alīkā api [padārthāḥ] abhūtvā bhavanti,
SA10ksmadhlu:522_3: kintu svabhāvataḥ sadasatostu krameṇāpi tayoḥ sadasatorvirodha eva /
SA10ksmadhlu:526_0: āryakaṅkāvatārasūtre 'pi pūrvaṃ rāgādīn sattvenābhyupagamya punarasattvenāṅgīkaraṇaṃ vaināśikataiva /
SA10ksmadhlu:526_1: kāryakāraṇabhāvo yadi paramārthata syāttadā evamabhidadhānānāṃ [sā] dṛṣṭistāvat samyag mārgānusaraṇād muktimārgānukūlaiva strānnatvananukūlā /
SA10ksmadhlu:529_0: abhūtvā yasya cotpādo bhūtvā cāpi vinaśyati /
SA10ksmadhlu:529_1: pratyayaiḥ sadasaccāpi na te me śāsane sthitāḥ //
SA10ksmadhlu:530_2: pratiniyatasāmarthyato viruddhamapi svabhāvaṃ kartuṃ naiva pāryate,
SA10ksmadhlu:530_3: tathā sati śaśaśṛṃṅgādīnāmapyutpādaprasaṅgaḥ syāditi vidvāṃso bruvanti /
SA10ksmadhlu:530_4: ato hetūnāṃ niyatasāmarthyena vyavasthāpi niyatā bhavedityabhidhānamapi tāvadasambaddhameva /
SA10ksmadhlu:530_5: saṃvṛtāvapi khalvasata utpattiḥ kathaṃ na vitudhyata iti vicāraṇāpi tāvannaiva yujyate,
SA10ksmadhlu:531_0: api ca, yā khalu vastūnāmutpattiḥ saṃvṛtimāyāvadavasthitā,
SA10ksmadhlu:531_6: ata eva sarvāṇi khalu vastūni māyāvadeva vyavasthitāni /
SA10ksmadhlu:531_7: ataśca bhagavatā - mahāmate, sato 'sataścānutpannatvāt sarve dharmā anutpannā evetyanekadhā sadasatorniṣedhaṃ kṛtvā anutpāda eva nirdiṣṭaḥ /
SA10ksmadhlu:532_0: bhagavata 'pi parikalpisvabhāvamabhipretya sadasatorutpattivirodho vyavasthāpitaḥ na tu tattvata ityevaṃ yeṣāṃ kathanaṃ tadapyagre 'bhidhāsyate /
SA10ksmadhlu:532_1: yo hi vastvātmā paramārthato 'nupanna so 'pi tattvata utpanna ityevaṃbhūto yo parikalpitaḥ svabhāvastamapi ye parikalpitasvabhāvatvenābhyupagacchanti,
SA10ksmadhlu:532_2: tadā tannaiva yuktarūpam / vastūnāmasya svabhāvasya paramārthato 'nutpannatve 'pi grāhyagrāhakārasvabhāvenānuppannatvāt sa parikalpitasvabhāva iti cintyate tadā parikalpitātmakayoḥ sadastoryathā utpattivirodhastathaiva paramārthātmakasyāpi kathaṃ notpattivirodhaḥ /

SA10ksmadhlu:549_0: [31] yadi vināśādayo hi vikalpāḥ paramārthata utpāttau bādhitā ityucyate,

SA10ksmadhlu:551_0: api ca, antarjñeyavādināṃ matānusāraṃ yadadvayajñāne ākāradvayaṃ sāgaraparvatabhūmijalādikaṃ tadaṃśatayopacaryate,

SA10ksmadhlu:551_8: na hi bhavatāṃ mate virodho dṛśyata ityataḥ sarveṣāṃ pratyakṣatastattvadarśitvasambhavād muktyatthināṃ kṛte tattvabhāvānāyāḥ pratyatno nirarthaka eva syāt /
SA10ksmadhlu:552_0: yadyevaṃ cintyate yad 'bhrānte vijñāne vividhāvabhāsānāṃ viruddhatve 'pi virodho naiva vyavasthāpyate,
SA10ksmadhlu:552_3: yadyevaṃ na syāt tadā tadanumānaṃ vastubalapravṛttameva na syāt /
SA10ksmadhlu:552_5: tatra tāvattattvānyatvādivirodho 'pi nābhidhīyate ' - yadyevaṃ vicāryate tadā sāṃvṛtakāryakāraṇabhāvasya kathaṃ virodhaḥ pratipādyate,
SA10ksmadhlu:552_6: mithyābhūte tasmin vastubalapravṛttānumānaviṣayatvāsambhavāt sa viruddha iti nābhidheya eva /
SA10ksmadhlu:553_1: na tu yuṣmākam / yato hi bhavatāṃ tathāvidhena virodhena mithyātvasiddhireva syānnatvavabhāsanirākṛtiḥ,
SA10ksmadhlu:553_3: yadi sa mithyātvena prasādhyate tadāsmākameva pakṣaḥ sthāpitaḥ syād,
SA10ksmadhlu:553_4: yato vayamapi kāryakāraṇadeśakālahetupratyayaviśeṣāṇāṃ satyāmapyapekṣāyāṃ [taṃ] pramāṇabādhitaṃ ca mithyā caiva manyāmahe,
SA10ksmadhlu:553_6: tathāvidhavirodhakaraṇena bhavadbhiranyeṣāṃ vastugrahanivṛttiḥ kathaṃ nāma na svīkriyate,
SA10ksmadhlu:553_7: kintu nirdoṣābhidhānāttāvad bhavatāmeva bādhā syāt asmākaṃ tu pramāṇānāmapravṛttirapi nāsti,

SA10ksmadhlu:554_10: phalata ekānekasvabhāvavirahitatve 'pi na sa niḥsvabhāvaḥ sidhyatītiḥ sidhyatīti syāt /

SA10ksmadhlu:566_0: paramārthato niḥsvabhāvatve 'pi vastuno yadi niyatadeśakālādyavabhāso bhavatīti kathaṃ na śaśaśṛṅgādayo 'pyavabhāsanta iti cet? bhavadbirapyasyottaraṃ dātavyaṃ syāt,
SA10ksmadhlu:566_1: yato hi keśādivanmithyāvabhāse 'pi kimiti keśādīnāmeva mithyāvabhāsaḥ,

SA10ksmadhlu:566_3: yadi taddarśanena tathā bhavatīti cet? tadā tathaiva apareṣvapi pratiniyatahetupratyayatvena pratiniyatasāmarthye 'pi kimiti naiva tathā vyavasthā svīkriyate /

SA10ksmadhlu:567_1: taimirikakeśādīnāṃ jñānasvabhāvenāpi satyatvaṃ naiva yujyata iti pūrvameva nirdiṣṭam /

SA10ksmadhlu:568_3: ato jñānamapi keśādimithyāsvabhāvenābhinnatvāt tathaiva mithyāmātramiti kathaṃ keśādīnāṃ tatsvabhāvatvena satyatvaṃ syāditi /
SA10ksmadhlu:569_0: yathā sarvaṇi vastūni paramārthato 'nutpannāni tathaiva saṃvṛtāvapyutpannāni bhavituṃ na śaknuvanti,
SA10ksmadhlu:569_1: tathā hi - ye tāvat paramārthato 'nutpannāsteṣāṃ saṃvṛtāvapi notpādaḥ,
SA10ksmadhlu:569_2: yathā - śaśaśṛṅgādaya iti ye bruvanti teṣāṃ māyādibhiranaikāntikatvam,
SA10ksmadhlu:569_6: ataḥ paramārthato 'sato yadi saṃvṛtāvapyasattvaṃ tadā saṃvṛtisatyasyaiva vināśaprasaṅgaḥ,
SA10ksmadhlu:570_1: saṃvṛtāvapi adṛṣṭotpadāḥ śaśaśṛṅgādayo na tathāvidhakarmaṇāṃ sañcayābhāvāna tu paramārthasvabhāvarahitatvād,
SA10ksmadhlu:570_3: na hetupratyayanirbharatāmātreṇa vastutvaprasaṅgaḥ māyādimithyāvastūnāṃ hetupratyayasamūhabhāvābhāvābhyāṃ pravṛttinivṛttidarśanāt /

SA10ksmadhlu:570_6: ato niḥsvabhāvatāyāṃ spaṣṭataḥ siddhatve 'pi pramāṇamārgasya jñānābhāvad ye 'nyato dūṣitān nirākartumabhilaṣante,

SA10ksmadhlu:571_5: yadyekamādekasyotpattiriti tadā sā nityād vā anityād vā bhavet /
SA10ksmadhlu:571_6: na nityāt, tasya anutpannāvasthāto 'bhinnatvāt pūrvāparakālavad madhye 'pi utpādakatvavirodhāt /
SA10ksmadhlu:571_7: yadi sa utpādayatīti cet? pūrvāparakāle 'pi tadvadutpattiprasaṅga,
SA10ksmadhlu:571_9: nānusaratīti ced? nityatāyā hānisadbhāvāt kramayaugapadyābhyāṃ tasyotpādakatvaṃ vistareṇa nirākriyate /

SA10ksmadhlu:573_5: na hi īśśvarādayo hetutvena astitvabhājo bhavanti,
SA10ksmadhlu:573_7: nityastāvat sarvasāmarthyaśūnya iti ca pūrvameva prasādhitatatvāt /
SA10ksmadhlu:574_2: yato hi tato yadi bhinnasantānavartināṃ phalānāmutpattirbhavati,
SA10ksmadhlu:574_3: tadā tasya anyasajātīyakṣaṇasya pratisandhānābhāvād dvitīya eva kṣaṇe samucchedaḥ syāt /
SA10ksmadhlu:574_4: yadyevaṃ tadā tataḥ sadā vijātīyaphalānāmutpattikāle sarveṣāṃ pūrvasajātīyakṣaṇānāṃ paścādvartini kṣaṇe pratisandhānābhāvād ye tāvadanityasvabhāvā īśvarādisaṃjñakā jagato hetutvenopajñāpyante,
SA10ksmadhlu:575_1: tadapi naiva yuktam, hetorabhāvena tasyotpatterasambhavāt athavā sampūrnameva jagat tadvadahetukameva syāt /
SA10ksmadhlu:575_2: yato hi pūrvamapi paścādapi taddhetutvena [sarvathā] kimapi nāstīti /
SA10ksmadhlu:576_1: tadā sa eva kathaṃ na tasya phalaṃ vā tadutpanno veti kalpyate /
SA10ksmadhlu:576_3: kimarthaṃ sa kalpyata iti / abhinnasantāne vidyamāno sa heturanādikālāt tasyāmeva santatau pravṛtta eveti,
SA10ksmadhlu:576_4: naivānyasantāne vidyamānaḥ sannutpattikāraka iti kalpyate tadā tasmin paramārthato 'samakālatvam,
SA10ksmadhlu:576_5: anyatra ca sajātīyakṣaṇotpattirapi naiva yujyata iti pūrvaṃ bahuśo nirdiṣṭam /
SA10ksmadhlu:576_6: ataccāpi hetubhedasya abhinnakārake prasaṅgaśca paścāt pratipādayiṣyate /
SA10ksmadhlu:577_0: yadyante cakṣurādayastāvat phalasyaikasya niyatotpādakā iti manyante,
SA10ksmadhlu:577_2: yato hi cakṣurādīnīndriyāṇi yadā svavijñānamutpadayanti tadā sajātīyānyakṣaṇāni notpādayanti /
SA10ksmadhlu:577_7: yadyevaṃ tadā hetubhedo bhedaniyāmako naiva syāt /
SA10ksmadhlu:577_8: yo hi ghaṭādīnāṃ paṭādibhyo bhinnaḥ svabhāvaḥ,
SA10ksmadhlu:577_10: na tu prakṛtyā janita iti / yadyevaṃ na syāttadā ahetukānyeva tāvad vastūni syuḥ /
SA10ksmadhlu:577_11: tatra hetubhede 'pi yadi phalabhedo na syāttadā hetorbhedābhedābhyāṃ phalasya bhedābhedau na kṛtau syātām,
SA10ksmadhlu:577_13: itthaṃ naiva te samūhād vyatiriktāḥ sidhyanti,
SA10ksmadhlu:577_14: naiva ca te samūhāt pṛtham kartuṃ śakyante /
SA10ksmadhlu:577_15: parantu parasparabhinnasvabhāvāt pratyekasmādutpattisāmarthayavato yadi phalamudbhuyate tadā abhinnameva kathaṃ nāmodbhūyate /
SA10ksmadhlu:577_17: na tvanekaphalotpādana ityevaṃ cettadapi na yuktam /
SA10ksmadhlu:577_18: yadyevaṃ tadā sajātīyaphalapratīsandhānābhāvād dvītiye tāvat kṣaṇe cakṣurādisantānānoccheda eva syāt /
SA10ksmadhlu:577_19: yadi teṣu sajātīyakṣaṇotpāde sāmarthyamityucyate tadā tadanyadeva tāvad vastu syāttataśca sāmarthyameva hetuḥ syānna na khalu vastu /
SA10ksmadhlu:578_1: samarthasyopakārābhāvāt / upakurvantyeveti cet, samarthāntarasya tatrāpekṣitatvādanavasthākhyastāvad doṣa eva syāt /
SA10ksmadhlu:578_2: yadi te svabhāvabhūtaṃ samarthamuparkurvantīti manyate tadā phalamapi tathaiva kiṃ na kurvantīti /
SA10ksmadhlu:578_6: ataḥ kathaṃ nāma phalaṃ bhinnaṃ syāt /
SA10ksmadhlu:579_2: tadapi naiva yuktam / samūho 'pi tāvadekaikahetusāpekṣa iti samūhanirbhratvamapi [vastutaḥ] ekaikanirbharatvameva /
SA10ksmadhlu:579_3: ataḥ phalasya sajātīya vijātīyatayorbhedo naiva syāt /
SA10ksmadhlu:580_0: hetubhedastrāvat [phalasya] bhedako na bhaviṣyatītyevaṃvidhasya prasaṅgasya ko hyarthaḥ? yadi khaṇḍaśo notpādayatītyarthastadā vastusvabhāvasya niraṃśatvād aśaṃtaścotpādasyāsvīkṛtatvāt kathaṃ nāma prasaṅgaḥ syāt,
SA10ksmadhlu:581_0: yadi viśeṣako [bhedako] na bhavatītyevamartho gṛhyate tadā asiddhamevaitat /
SA10ksmadhlu:581_1: hetubhistāvadanekebhyo vijātīyaphalebhyo viparītameva jantaya ityabhidhānamapi naiva yuktam,
SA10ksmadhlu:581_2: yato hyekasya aṃśata utpatterasambhavāditi prasaṅgo naivocyate,
SA10ksmadhlu:581_3: parantu bhavanto ye vastuṣu parasparaṃ vyatirekaṃ viśeṣaṃ vā manvate,
SA10ksmadhlu:581_5: yadi vividhahetūnaṅgīkṛtyāpi phalamekavidhameva svīkṛyate tadā bhrāntisadbhāvād vastūnāṃ tāvad bhedo vividhahetubhirakṛta eva syādityevaṃ prasaṅgo nūnamabhidhānīyaḥ syāt /
SA10ksmadhlu:581_7: so 'pyasambaddha eva, yato hi ye viśeṣātmakatvena viśeṣaphalamutpādayanti,
SA10ksmadhlu:581_9: tadā tebhya utpadyaṃ sajātīyaṃ phalaṃ vijātīyaṃ ca naiva parasparanivṛttaṃ syād,
SA10ksmadhlu:582_0: yadi hetavaste nivṛttisvabhāvatvāt svayaṃ sajātīyaphalanāṃ bhedakā api bhaviṣyantītyucyate,
SA10ksmadhlu:582_1: tadā tathaiva te sāmānyaphale 'pi kathaṃ na bhedakāḥ? yato hi tatra sarve ekaikā hetavo bhavanti /
SA10ksmadhlu:582_2: ye tāvadekotpādakasvabhāvā eva te tato viparītaṃ kamapyanyaṃ notpādayituṃ śaktāḥ,
SA10ksmadhlu:582_3: yato hi te utpādakasvabhāvanivṛttyā anyārtha iva bhavanti,
SA10ksmadhlu:582_4: nānye utpādakasvabhāvā iti / punaste parasparanivṛttasvabhāvāḥ kintu naiva te utpādakasvabhāvanivṛttāḥ /
SA10ksmadhlu:583_1: na tvanyasvabhāvena, atadātmakatvāt, te ca yathāsvaṃ bhinnā api / svasvabhāvenotpādayantītyasmin kathane ko virodhaḥ? ekasvabhāvasyābhāvo naiva tasya svabhāvo bhavituṃ śaknoti,
SA10ksmadhlu:584_0: tenaiva tatphalaṃ niṣpādanīyamiti yaduktaṃ tatra kā yuktiriti cet sāṃkhyaireva tatsamādhānaṃ vidheyamiti śobhanaṃ pratibhāti /
SA10ksmadhlu:584_1: yato hi te khalu bhinnabhinnasvabhāvaṃ jagaditi pratipādayanti /
SA10ksmadhlu:584_2: atasteṣāṃ yattatra grahaṇaṃ tannivṛtyarthameva ācāryeṇa bhinnavastunirdeśakānāṃ kṛte vyavahāravaśāduktam tāni [vastūni] pratītyasamutpannatayā naiva paramārthata ekārthāni nāpi ca bhinnarthānīti manvānāṃ kṛte naiva kimapyuktamiti /
SA10ksmadhlu:584_3: teṣāṃ tāvadanusāraṃ tu māyāsadṛśatvāt sarveṣu teṣu na kimapyekaṃ vastu bhinnamabhinnaṃ vā sidhyati /
SA10ksmadhlu:585_0: api ca, yadi vastuṣu paramārthataḥ svabhavadvayam,
SA10ksmadhlu:585_1: ekaścotpādakalakṣaṇaḥ, aparaśca svabhāvalakṣaṇastadā nivṛtte 'pyasmin svabhāvenaivotpādakalakṣaṇastāvannivartata ityuttaraṃ khalu samīcīnaṃ syāditi /
SA10ksmadhlu:586_0: yasmin samaye sarva evotpādakasvabhāvastasmin samaye yadi te parasparanivṛttasvabhāvā api tadā utpādakasvabhāvato nivṛttatvāt kathaṃ nāmotpādakāḥ syuḥ /
SA10ksmadhlu:586_1: teṣāmayameva svabhāvo yat svabhāvabhede 'pi ekamutpādayanti viruddhasvabhāve 'pi ca sati naiva parīkṣāyogyā iti yadi bhavadbhirucyate tadā pādau prasārya tathātāparīkṣātaḥ parāṅmukhabuddhayo ye vyavahāramātramanusaranti te sukhenāsituṃ śaknuvanti /
SA10ksmadhlu:586_2: ye tu tathātāparīkṣāyāṃ pravṛtabuddhayasteṣāṃ kṛte tathaiva sukhāsanaṃ naiva yuktarūpam /
SA10ksmadhlu:586_3: yadyevaṃ na syāttadā īśvarādistāvadekaḥ sannapi svabhāvabhede 'pi ca sati krameṇa yugapad vā vicitrasyāsya jagato heturupeṇa naiva kathamapi viruddho bhaviṣyati,
SA10ksmadhlu:586_5: svabhāvabhede 'pi nāsti parīkṣāyogya ityabhidadhatāṃ kṛte kiṃ nāmottaraṃ dattaṃ syāt? tenaiva phalamutpādanīyamiti pratipādayatāṃ tatra kā yuktiriti ye kathayanti teṣāṃ kṛte agnyādikamapekṣyotpadyamāno dhūmastāvad śakramūrdhato 'uputpadyata iti kathanaṃ yathā ahetukatve yuktyā prasaṅgatayocyate,
SA10ksmadhlu:586_6: tathaivātra kimiti nocyate? vyavahāre 'pi ekasamūhāntargato yadyekaphalasyotpādako bhavettadā naiva viruddhaḥ,
SA10ksmadhlu:586_7: kintu samūhāntargatastu viruddha evetyevaṃ kathayadbhiḥ saha nāsti kaścana bhedaḥ /
SA10ksmadhlu:587_2: tatra kā yuktiḥ / samuho 'pi bhinnaḥ svabhāvataścotpanna ityevamabhidadhānaiḥ saha ko virodha iti vaktavyaṃ syāt /
SA10ksmadhlu:587_3: tatra yathā ekasamūhamāśrityotpadyamānaṃ phalaṃ samūhāntareṇāpyutpadyate tadā tenotpādyasya svabhāvasyāniyatatvād ahetuka ityucyate,
SA10ksmadhlu:587_4: tathaiva ekasminneva samūhe vijñānādayo yadā ekahetumapekṣyāpi tadvilakṣaṇahetuta utpadyante tadā kimityahetukatāyāḥ prasaṅgo noktaḥ syāt /
SA10ksmadhlu:588_0: hetoryathātmakena prayogeṇa nirduṣṭāt svabhāvaviśeṣād hetubhedo bhedakaśca viruddhāveva syātām /
SA10ksmadhlu:588_1: yato hi cakṣurādinā bhinnasvabhāvena cakṣurvijñānādīnāṃ phalānāmutpattikāle sākṣād bhedābhāve 'pi pratītisvabhāvād rūpādayaḥ pṛthagviṣayatvena niyatā bhavanti,
SA10ksmadhlu:588_3: te cānvayavyatirekābhyāṃ samantarapratyayena ca pratītisvabhāvāḥ syuḥ,
SA10ksmadhlu:588_5: viśeṣeturapi tatsadṛśa eva / indriyeṇa ca viṣayagrahaṇaṃ pṛthaktayā niyatam /
SA10ksmadhlu:588_8: viṣayeṇa ca samantarapratyayena cāpi pṛthaktayā viṣayagrahaṇaṃ naiva niyatam /
SA10ksmadhlu:588_9: evaṃvidhayā niyatavyavasthayā niścayena hetubhedo bhedaka eva syāt /
SA10ksmadhlu:588_10: bheda eva bhinnaviśeṣa ityasau vicāro yadi vyavahāratayā bālapṛthagjanānāṃ pravṛttyarthamevocyate tadā tu sutarāṃ yajyate,
SA10ksmadhlu:589_0: atha ye tāvad bhedāstee aprajñaptimātrātmakā vā nivṛttiviśeṣeṇa prajñaptisvabhāvātmakā vā? yadi prathamaḥ pakṣastadā vijñānasya ālambanādasvabhāvādabhinnatvena tathaivānekatvaprasaṅgaḥ /
SA10ksmadhlu:590_0: tathaivābhinne 'pi rūpādibhya utpadyata ityucyata iti cedekasmin ekadā parasparaviruddhāvutpādānutpādau kathaṃ nāma na viruddhau syātāmityayaṃ doṣo naiva yujyatāmiti vicārya ye viśeṣān vijñānato bhinnārthatvena kalpayanti teṣāṃ tadā vijñānamahetukaṃ syād anyasminneva tadā cakṣurādīnāṃ yogāt /
SA10ksmadhlu:591_0: yadi prajñaptisvabhāva iti dvitīyapakṣaḥ svīkriyate tadāpi vijñānasyāhetukatvaṃ prasajyata eva,
SA10ksmadhlu:591_2: prajñaptyātmakatve kasyāpi yogo naiva bhavatītyataḥ sarveṣāmahetukatvaprasaṅgaḥ /
SA10ksmadhlu:591_3: phalataḥ paramārthato 'nekebhya ekasya phalasyotpattirnaiva sarvathā yujayata iti /
SA10ksmadhlu:592_3: tadā hetubhedābhāve 'pi phalasya bhinnatvāt phalasya tāvad bhedābhedau kathaṃ nāhetukāviti /
SA10ksmadhlu:592_4: yena khalu kāraṇena tatra phalāntarotpattimattve nāstyanyaḥ [kaścana] viśeṣaḥ,
SA10ksmadhlu:592_5: niraṃśatvāt sarvavastūnām, ato hettuatāvat svabhāvapracyuto bhūtvā phalaṃ notpādayatīti,
SA10ksmadhlu:592_6: tathāpi tasmin hetvātmakatve bhedābhāvāt tannirvṛte phale 'pi tāvad bhedo na syāt /
SA10ksmadhlu:593_1: kiṃ sā naiva dṛśyate? [arthāt dṛśyata eva],
SA10ksmadhlu:593_2: atastasyāḥ parihāraṃ kartuṃ śakyata ityabhidhānaṃ tāvannaiva yujyate /
SA10ksmadhlu:593_6: yad yathā dṛśyate tattathaiva sadityabhiniviśamānānāṃ kevalaṃ mithyākalpanānāṃ nirākaraṇāya svapna iva sādhyamānatvānnāsti tāvad virodho 'pīti /
SA10ksmadhlu:594_0: api ca, cakṣurvijñānādīnāṃ vastūnāṃ yānyanekasmādutyadyamānāni dṛśyante,
SA10ksmadhlu:594_1: teṣāṃ pāramārthikaḥ svabhāvastāvadekatvena naiva kathamapi siddhaḥ,
SA10ksmadhlu:594_3: vividho 'pi svabhāvo yadyekaḥ syāttadā sarveṣāmevaikadravyatāprasaṅgaḥ syāt /
SA10ksmadhlu:594_5: ekasya cānekaṣāṃ ca vastūnāṃ paramārthata utpattistāvat kutra samavalokyate?
SA10ksmadhlu:594_7: ekaikasya phalasya stāvadanaikairhetubhiḥ kriyamāṇatvādayamapi pakṣastāvadanekasmādekasyaivotpattipakṣaḥ syāt /
SA10ksmadhlu:595_3: ato nāstyayamasiddho heturapi koṭīnāṃ catuṣkaṃ vihāya nāstyanyo 'pi kaścanotpattipakṣaḥ /
SA10ksmadhlu:595_7: ācāryo 'pi saṃvṛtau kāryakāraṇabhāvasthitiṃ svīkṛtya yathā vyavahāre ekasmādanekasya cānekasmādekasya cotpattiḥ prasidhyati tathā dṛśyata eveti kathayāgāsa /
SA10ksmadhlu:595_8: cakṣurādibhiranvayavyatirekābhyāṃ cakṣurvijñānādīnāmutpattiviśeṣaṃ jñātvā bālāpṛthagjanānāṃ pravṛttyarthaṃ kāryahetvorbhedakāle yadi heturbhinnastadā kāryabhedo 'pi sutarāṃ syādityuktavān,
SA10ksmadhlu:595_10: yathā vicāritaṃ prāgeva / ekasmād hetoranekaphalānāmutpattirayuktetyādikaṃ yaduktam,
SA10ksmadhlu:595_11: teṣāṃ sameṣāṃ samādhānamapi pṛthakpṛthasmāmiḥ pūrvameva kṛtam /
SA10ksmadhlu:596_1: sa anaikāntika iti ye kathitavantasteṣāmapyuttaraṃ dattapūrvameva /
SA10ksmadhlu:597_1: tadā naiva tāni saṃvṛtāvapi bhavituṃ śakyānīti yaduktam,
SA10ksmadhlu:597_4: teṣāṃ sarveṣāmapi samādhānaṃ pūrvācāryaiḥ pūrvaṃ samyaktayā kṛtameva /
SA10ksmadhlu:597_5: tathāpi ye tāvat kecana dveṣavaśād dūṣaṇāni prayuñjate,
SA10ksmadhlu:598_1: tadā naiva hetorasiddhiḥ, vastūnāmekānekasvabhāvarahitatvahetoḥ paraiḥ svīkṛtatvāt /
SA10ksmadhlu:599_0: tatra yaistāvat kadācid īśvarādayo nityaikatvasvabhāvena parikalpitāstaisteṣu kramotpādadharmayogo 'pi yataḥ svīkriyate,
SA10ksmadhlu:599_2: yato hyekasvabhāvatāyāmanutpādāsthāto 'bhinnatvāt pūrvakālavat paścātkāle 'pyutpādakasvabhāvatā naiva yujyate /
SA10ksmadhlu:599_3: yadyutpādaka eva svabhāvaḥ syāttadā pūrvāvasthātaḥ svabhāvasya bhinnalakṣaṇatvādekatvahānireva syāditi /
SA10ksmadhlu:600_1: yato hi tattvatāyāṃ samakālikatvamaparasmiṃśca svaparapratisandhānaṃ tāvannaiva yujyata iti pūrvaṃ prasādhitameva /
SA10ksmadhlu:600_2: ye tāvadākāśādīnāṃ trayāṇāmasaṃkṛtānāmekasvabhāvatvaṃ phalapratisandhānābhāvaṃ ca teṣāṃ svīkurvanti,
SA10ksmadhlu:600_5: yato hi pratyekajñānāttajjñeyasvabhāvastāvad bhinna eva syāt /
SA10ksmadhlu:600_6: yadi na syāttadābhinnatvāt pūrvavat tajjñāne jñeyasvabhāvo naivopapannaḥ syādata ekasvabhāvastāvannaiva yujyata iti /
SA10ksmadhlu:601_0: ye tāvannityaikasvabhāvāḥ kālapuruṣapradhānabrahmādayaśca vicitrāyā asyā jagadvyavasthāyā hetutvena parikalpyante,
SA10ksmadhlu:601_1: te yadi satyāsatyādivividhasvabhāvāṃ vastusāmagrīṃ krameṇa yugapad vā gṛhṇantīti svīkriyate tadā tatsāmarthyata ekatvarahita eva svabhāve te niyamena te niyamena svīkṛtāḥ syuḥ,
SA10ksmadhlu:601_2: yato hi vividhasvabhāvasya jagato grahaṇe ekasvabhāvā naiva yujyante /
SA10ksmadhlu:602_0: ye tāvat pudgalāmidhaṃ padārthaṃ nityānityatvenānirvacanīyamiti parikalpayanti te 'uyenam ekānekasvabhāvarahitatvena sākṣāt svīkurvantyeva,
SA10ksmadhlu:602_2: api ca, bhinnabhinnasvabhāvenānubhūyamānasya tāvat kṣaṇikatve 'nirvacanīyatā naiva yujyate /
SA10ksmadhlu:602_3: kāyaḥ bhūmiparvatādayo ye 'nityāḥ sāvayavāḥ pṛthaksvabhāvāstān ekadravyatnena parikalpayanti,
SA10ksmadhlu:602_4: te 'pi tadavayavadravyaṃ bhinnānekaviṣayavyāpakamiti svīkurvantyata ekatvarahitataiva teṣāṃ svīkṛtā syāt yato hi yadi tasya pratyekasminnavayave nāsti bhinnasvabhāvastadā naiva tasmin vyapakatāpyupapadyata iti /
SA10ksmadhlu:603_1: ye tāvad dehādīnāṃ paramāṇusañcayātmakatvāt tān paramāṇūn pṛthakśaḥ parikalpayanti,
SA10ksmadhlu:604_0: svīkṛtaiva syāditi / yato hi niraṃśasvabhāve [vastuni] yatraiva hi saṃyogādayo 'nubhūyante,
SA10ksmadhlu:604_2: yasmin pakṣeṇa kenacit saha saṃyogaḥ sañcayo vā na bhavanti,
SA10ksmadhlu:605_0: paramāṇuṣu cāvayavidravyeṣu cobhayeṣu tāvadanekasvabhāvatvamapi na yujyate,
SA10ksmadhlu:605_1: yato hi sañcitasvabhāvātmakatvātte yadā naivaikasvabhāvatve yujyante tadā tatparatantratayā vyavasthitatvena teṣāmanekasvabhāvatvamapi naiva sidhyati /
SA10ksmadhlu:605_2: itthaṃ yadā kāryaṃ ca kāraṇaṃ cāpi dravyamekānesvabhāvarahitaṃ siddham,
SA10ksmadhlu:605_3: tadā tadādhārena kalpitanāṃ guṇakarmasāmānyaviśeṣāṇāṃ saṃghātasya cāpi siddhiḥ sutarāṃ naiva syāt,
SA10ksmadhlu:606_1: jñānamapi tāvat kāmamekasvabhāvamityupakalpyatāṃ kintu tatsvarūpaṃ vividhasyabhāvagrāhakamiti svīkṛtatvāt tatsāmarthyata ekasvabhāvarahitameva taditi svīkṛtaṃ syāt /
SA10ksmadhlu:606_2: yato hi tajjñānaṃ tāvat sākāramityavaśyaṃ svīkarttavyam,
SA10ksmadhlu:606_3: anyathā viṣayākāreṇa yo nākāritastasya jñānakāyasya viṣayaġ
SA10ksmadhlu:606_5: yadi sākāratvena svīkriyate tadā tasyaikasvabhāvarahitatvamapi spaṣṭatayā svīkṛtameva syāt,
SA10ksmadhlu:606_8: ataḥ sarvāṇyeva tāvajjñānāni vibhinnānāṃ vastūnāṃ viṣayitvena svīkriyante /
SA10ksmadhlu:606_9: ata eva svayūthyāḥ 'sañcitālambanāḥ paścavijñānakāyāḥ' iti svīkurvanti /
SA10ksmadhlu:607_2: tatra vividhatāyāṃ [vicitratāyāṃ] svamatasthāpanārtha tāvadanekajñānotpattikalpanamapi nāsti samīcīnam,
SA10ksmadhlu:607_5: guṇakarmasamavetānāṃ dravyādīnāṃ tāvajjñānena yugapadgrahaṇasvīkārād apare 'pi [siddhāntavādinaḥ] jñānaṃ citrākāratvenaiva svīkurvanti /
SA10ksmadhlu:607_6: ye hi dravyaparyāyādiviśeṣaṇaiḥ sarvaṃ vastu tāvanmecakamaṇivadityāmananti,
SA10ksmadhlu:608_3: svapnādijñānānyapi nīlādivibhinnākārān anubhavantīti tanyekasvabhāvānīti naiva yuktāni /
SA10ksmadhlu:608_5: te bāhyapadārthānāmaviṣayibhūtatvāttat svasaṃvedanasvarūpaṃ paryantaṃ ca jñānamiti svīkurvanti,
SA10ksmadhlu:608_6: te 'pyanādikālīnabhrāntavāsānāparipākavaśād rūpādivibhinnaviparītāvabhāsānāṃ sarveṣāṃ vijñānānāmutpattiṃ svīkurvantyato vijñānamekasvabhāvamiti naivābhyupagacchanti /
SA10ksmadhlu:608_7: phalato darśaneṣu kasminnapi vijñānaṃ naikasvabhāvamiti sidhyati /
SA10ksmadhlu:608_8: yadi tathā na sidhyati, tadā anekasvabhāvo 'pi na sidhyatīti bahuśaḥ pūrvamāveditam /
SA10ksmadhlu:609_0: ata eva svātantryeṇa sādhako hetirapyayaṃ nāsiddha iti yathoktanayena vādiprativādyubhyeṣu sarve dharma ekānekasvabhāvarahitā eva siddhāḥ /
SA10ksmadhlu:609_1: ye va vyavacchedamātrātmakāsteṣu sādhyasādhanānugato dharmeyeva avastubhūtaḥ sidhyatīti pūrvamanekadhā nirdiṣṭam /
SA10ksmadhlu:610_0: punaśca, heturapyayaṃ kathaṃ sidhyati? yadyunupalabdhyeti cet? sāpyaparayānupalabdhyā sidhyatītyanavasthāprasaṅgaḥ syāt /
SA10ksmadhlu:610_3: yato hi yathoktanayenaiva te hetuṃ sādhayantīti /
SA10ksmadhlu:611_0: ityevaṃ ye kecidindriyairagamyā ātmādayaste tadvyāptakramikakāryayogādidharmāṇāṃ svīkṛtyā ekānekasvabhāvarahitatvenaiva prasiddhāḥ /
SA10ksmadhlu:611_2: tādṛśānāṃ vastūnāṃ pratiṣedhāya dharmiṇaḥ parīkṣāyāḥ sarvatrānivāryatvāt /
SA10ksmadhlu:611_4: anyathā [yadyevaṃ na syāt] tadā tanniṣedhāya bhavatāmapi arthakriyāsāmarthyaviyogalakṣaṇo hetustāvat kathaṃ siddho bhaviṣyatīti codanā kathaṃ na syāt /
SA10ksmadhlu:611_5: paraparikalpite dharmiṇi tathāvidhakramikakāryāṇāṃ svīkṛtyaiva tadvyāptadharmāṇāṃ niṣpattestanmatamātrāśritatvād dharmiṇastasya tāvat parikalpitatvameva /
SA10ksmadhlu:611_7: svataḥ pramāṇatvāttasya / vyavahāreṇāpi tāvat sādhyavyāptasādhanasya siddhatvāditi pūrvameva samyaguktatvāt /
SA10ksmadhlu:612_0: rūpādayastāvad dhārmiṇaḥ, ye khalvaparokṣāste 'pi pratyakṣata ekasvabhāvarahitā eva,
SA10ksmadhlu:612_2: ekasvabhāvahitatvena siddhe satyanekasvabhāvarāhityamapi sutarāṃ pratyakṣataḥ siddhameva,
SA10ksmadhlu:613_4: so 'pi tathaiva jñeyaḥ, kintu naiva sa paramārthato 'san,
SA10ksmadhlu:614_0: āropasvabhāvātmakatvāt sarvapratyakṣāṇāṃ kathaṃ hi tairekānekasvabhāvayuktatvaṃ jñātuṃ śakyata iti cintāyāṃ heturyamatra māyākārāpratyakṣānumānābhyāmanaikāntika eva /
SA10ksmadhlu:614_1: yato hi māyākārajñāne tāvad yo 'yaṃ gajādyākārāropastasmin svabhāve paramārthato nabhiniveśo jāyate /
SA10ksmadhlu:614_3: evaṃ prekṣāvatāṃ pratyakṣasya nirākṛte 'pi bhāntikāraṇe kadācidanyāropākārasvabhāvavataḥ [jñānasya] utpattirbhavatīti paramārthatastatsvabhāve 'nabhiniveśena hetunā niyatena tāvattadviviktaviṣayitvena vyavasthāpyate /
SA10ksmadhlu:614_4: tathaivānumānajñānamapi yaddhi sāmānye tāvad vastulakṣaṇe samāropākāram,
SA10ksmadhlu:614_5: tadapi vastutathatāyā yathāvajjñānasvabhāvatvāt tadviṣayakaṃ bhavatīti pramāṇasadbhāvādanaikāntika eva hetuḥ /
SA10ksmadhlu:614_9: māyādivat pratyakṣatvāt / gṛhīte 'pyekānekasvabhāvarāhitye 'nāptapuruṣaśāstraśravaṇenotpannāropairanirdhāryāpareṇa [prakāreṇa] nirdhārayatāmekānekasvabhāvaviyuktavamanupalabdhyā tāvat kathaṃ setsyati? vividhaprakārādiliṅgaiḥ sarve yadyekasvabhāvarahitatvena sādhyante tadā te 'nekatvasvabhāvarahitā api sidhyanyeva,
SA10ksmadhlu:614_13: vyavahāre ghaṭādiviṣayaparicchedena puruṣā atulyasambaddhān vyavahārayogyānatyantaṃ paricchedayanti /
SA10ksmadhlu:614_16: paricchedo yadi naiva viccinnastadā sa nāstyeva,
SA10ksmadhlu:615_0: ekānekatve api tathaiva / vyāpakanivṛttyā vyāpyanivṛtterniyatatvānnāsti tāvad heturapi sadigdhavipakṣavyāvṛttikaḥ,
SA10ksmadhlu:615_1: apareṣāṃ skandhānāmabhāvāt / vyāpyasya vyāpakasya vā vastunaḥ svato 'siddhatvādasiddha eva sa heturiti kecana /
SA10ksmadhlu:615_2: tathaiva dharmiṇyeva kevale vyāpyasadbhāvasidhyarthaṃ vyāpakanivṛtyā vyāpyanivṛttirasiddhaivetyapare /
SA10ksmadhlu:616_0: evaṃ vyāpyavyāpakādisarvavastūnāṃ pūrvaṃ saṃvṛttyāśritatvaṃ prasādhya paścād vyavasthā kṛtetyapi pūrvamāveditameva /
SA10ksmadhlu:616_1: atyantaṃ samīpavartini vyāpake niyataṃ vyāpyaviśeṣajñānaṃ naiva bhavatītyapi pūrvameva nirdiṣṭam /
SA10ksmadhlu:617_2: ato vivādāspadībhūteṣu sarvadharmiṣu sāmānyena sādhayitumiṣyamāṇatvāt kathamimau dvau [vyāpyavyāpakau] ekasmin dharmiṇyāśritāviti cet? ekasmin dharmiṇyāśritatve 'pi [mithaḥ] sāpekṣatvād bhinnāveveti nāsti doṣaḥ /
SA10ksmadhlu:618_1: [36-37] yaḥ khalu sādhyaḥ, sādhako vā tau prasajyapratiṣedhasvabhāvau,
SA10ksmadhlu:618_2: na vā tathāsvabhāvau? prathame tāvatpakṣe tau naiva bodhyabodhakarupeṇopapannau,
SA10ksmadhlu:618_4: ye sarvābhilāpavigatalakṣaṇāste na kathañcanāpi bodhyā bodhakāśca,
SA10ksmadhlu:620_1: vṛkṣaśākhāvat / sādhyasādhakā apyabhinnāḥ / yadi prasajyapratiṣedhasvabhāvapakṣapātinastadā ekānekasvabhāvarahitāstāvad vastusvabhāvabhūtārthakriyāyogyatvasvīkārādapi na svīkriyanta ityapyayuktīyuktam,
SA10ksmadhlu:620_5: atastasmin kathaṃ na sarva vivādā āpateyuriti /
SA10ksmadhlu:621_0: na tadekaṃ na cānekaṃ viṣayaḥ paramāṇuśaḥ /
SA10ksmadhlu:623_0: bhāvā yatra vicāryante na te santi savabhāvataḥ /
SA10ksmadhlu:624_2: yadi niḥsvabhāvatā tatra naiva bodhyata iti cettadā aśvaśṛṅgasyāpi bodhābhāvaḥ kathaṃ nollikhyate /
SA10ksmadhlu:624_3: bhavatāmabhilāpalakṣaṇarahitāḥ sarva bhāvā na manāgapi bodhyanta ityādiprayogeṣu vidyata eva sādhyasādhakayorniṣedhasvabhāvaḥ,
SA10ksmadhlu:624_6: ato nāsti prayogakauśalamapi sarvesāṃ vastunāṃ niścetavyaprasaṅgālliṅgasyaiva vastuno bodho na kenāpi svīkriyate,
SA10ksmadhlu:625_0: liṅgaṃ tāvat kalpanayā bodhakatvena vyavasthitamiti yuktam /
SA10ksmadhlu:625_1: ato niḥ svabhāvatve 'pi niayatatadākārasya sādhyakāraniścayotpattau hetutvād bodhakatvena kalpanāyāṃ nāsti kaścana doṣaḥ /
SA10ksmadhlu:625_3: ākāśaniṣedhakasya liṅgasya nitarāṃ kalpitatvādeveti pūrvaṃ nirdiṣṭam /
SA10ksmadhlu:625_5: tatrāpi yadi vastubhūtaḥ sambandha evaiko hetutvena kathayitumiṣyate,
SA10ksmadhlu:625_12: tacca viruddhameva / ekatve sati naiva dvayāśritvaṃ tāvad yuktam /
SA10ksmadhlu:626_0: yadi sa sambandhibhyo 'rthāntara iti tadā svasvabhāvavyavasthitatvāt kathaṃ nāma sambaddhasvabhāvaḥ syāt /
SA10ksmadhlu:626_1: yadi nāstyarthāntara iti tadā kevalaṃ sambandhināveva syātām /
SA10ksmadhlu:626_3: na tu vastvātmaka iti / yāni hi sambandhodbhūtāni lakṣaṇāni tānyapi kalpanātmakānyeva,
SA10ksmadhlu:627_0: api ca, yadā kāryasvabhāvaḥ pariniṣpannaḥ tadā apekṣāvirahānnaiva tasya kūtracinnirbharatvam /
SA10ksmadhlu:627_1: ato nāsti tasya kenāpi saha sambandhaḥ /
SA10ksmadhlu:627_2: apariniṣpanne 'pi tasmin kāraṇena saha sambandhakāle vidūre sthitatvādasambaddhameva tat syāditi /
SA10ksmadhlu:628_2: hetuṃ badhnāti kāryeṇa kāryaṃ na, tacca kīdṛśam //
SA10ksmadhlu:629_5: asambaddhatve sati abhedābhāvāt kathaṃ tādṛśī yaktiḥ,
SA10ksmadhlu:629_6: prayujyate / abhede sati tadātmaka eva sambandha iti nirdeśaḥ syāt /
SA10ksmadhlu:630_4: yadyevaṃ na syāttadā 'abhinnatvād' ityapi vaktuṃ na paryeta /
SA10ksmadhlu:630_5: tatra 'abhinnatvad' ityayaṃ heturyadi paramārthādhikāreṇocyeta tadā anekāntika eva,
SA10ksmadhlu:630_6: yato hi kṛtakatvānityatve yadyapi paramārthato naiva bhinne tathāpi bodhyabodhakavastuṣu tāvat te dṛśyete /
SA10ksmadhlu:631_0: yadi vyavahāre 'pi tayornāsti bhinnatvamityucyeta tadā asiddhameva,
SA10ksmadhlu:631_2: evameva śabdādidharmiṇi yadā akṛtakatvādito nivṛttirniścīyate tadā nityādito 'pi nirvṛtterniścayanāt paramārthato bhinnatāyā abhāve 'pi nivṛttiviśeṣāpekṣayā kṛtakatvānityatvādīnāṃ bhinnavyavasthāyā upakalpanād bodhyabodhakavastuvyavasthā tāvat kriyata eva /
SA10ksmadhlu:631_3: itthaṃ yadā vastūni sāmarthyataḥ pratimbivad ekānekasvabhāvavinivṛttāni bhavanti tadā paramārthasvabhāvato 'pi teṣāṃ nivṛttirniyataiva /
SA10ksmadhlu:631_5: ata eva ca tatra bodhyabodhakabhāvo 'pi sambhavatyeva /
SA10ksmadhlu:631_6: punaśca, yathā nityaṃ tāvd vastu arthakriyāsāmarthyavirahād vastusvabhāvena rahitaṃ sādhyate,
SA10ksmadhlu:632_0: [41] yadapi atadvyāvṛttiviśeṣeṇānayoḥ kṛtakatvaṃ tad vastu syāt nīlapītādivattasvabhāvatvāditi kathanaṃ tāvadasambaddhameva,
SA10ksmadhlu:632_3: kintvetāvatā na tad vastu / yathā nityavastuniṣedhāya arthakriyāsāmārthyarahitatvaṃ niḥsvabhāvatvaṃ ca vyāvṛttikṛtaviśeṣe satyapi naiva vastu,
SA10ksmadhlu:632_5: ato gauṇamevedam / yatkhalu nīlātmakaṃ pītātmakamiti nidarśanaṃ tadapi paramārthe tāvad vastunyasiddhatvādayuktam /
SA10ksmadhlu:632_7: tadapi naiva yuktiyuktam / yato hi nayo 'yamasanniti kathanamātreṇa tāvat paramārthe vastuni na kimapi siddhaṃ bhāvati,
SA10ksmadhlu:633_0: tatra buddhau pratibhāsamāno yo hi pūrvodito dharmī,
SA10ksmadhlu:633_2: kintu paramārthe vastuni sa naiva yuktarūpaḥ /
SA10ksmadhlu:633_4: ekānekasvabhāvarahitaṃ khalu paramārthaṃ vastu naiva kiñcit,
SA10ksmadhlu:633_6: sarve khalu padārthāḥ ekānekasvabhāvābhyāṃ vyāptā iti tu pūrvameva prasādhitam /
SA10ksmadhlu:633_7: māyādibhiravyatiriktāḥ paramārthato niḥsvabhāvā hi bhāvāste yadi 'vastu' nāmnā vyavahriyeran,
SA10ksmadhlu:633_8: tadā nāsti kaścanāpi doṣaḥ, bhavatkalpitapakṣahānyā tāvattasya dūṣitatvāt /
SA10ksmadhlu:633_14: [42] evaṃ yathā ekānekasvabhāvalakṣaṇo hetustāvannairātmyaṃ sādhayati tadvadabhāvadharmini dharmivyāvṛttisādhakatvād viruddho 'yaṃ heturiti yaduktaṃ tattu atyantaṃ pramāṇānabhijñatāmātrameva /
SA10ksmadhlu:633_17: kintu yadā sa [dharmī] niḥsvabhāvatvena sādhyate tadā siddhe 'pi vādino mate kathaṃ tāvad viruddho heturbhaviṣyati /
SA10ksmadhlu:633_18: niḥsvabhāvatāyāṃ hi sādhayitumiṣṭāyāṃ vastusvabhāvo dharmī naiva sambhavati,
SA10ksmadhlu:633_20: ataḥ sādhyasādhanābhyāṃ yathokto dharmī avastubhūta eva sammat ityasmāt kāraṇāt tena hetunā tāvad vyāvṛttireva sādhayate /
SA10ksmadhlu:634_0: yathāyaṃ heturnairātmyaṃ sādhayati tathaiva abhāvadharmyapīti keṣāñcit kathanamasambaddhameva /
SA10ksmadhlu:634_1: yato hi yena kāraṇena tāvannairātmyasya abhāvasya ca dvayordharmayorviruddhahetubhyāṃ siddhirucyate,
SA10ksmadhlu:634_3: paryāyasvabhāvatvāttayoḥ / phalato nirātmakamidaṃ nairātmyāditi kathanamiva syāt /
SA10ksmadhlu:635_1: dṛśayate na ca tannāsti tathā cotpādalakṣaṇam //
SA10ksmadhlu:636_0: phalato niḥsvabhāvatāsādhanārthaṃ na ko 'pi heturiti yatkathanam, tasyāpyuttaraṃ dattapūrvameva /
SA10ksmadhlu:637_0: [43-44] yadi vijñānamapi itaradharmāṇāmiva niḥsvabhāvameva syāttadā mithyātvād yogibhiranyadharmāṇāmiva tasyāpi parityāgaḥ kariṣyata eva /
SA10ksmadhlu:637_1: yadyevaṃ kariṣyate tadā na ko 'pi yogino bhaviṣyanti,
SA10ksmadhlu:637_3: nāpi bhagavatāṃ buddhānāmapratiṣṭhitanirvāṇaṃ naiva ca teṣāṃ tattvajñānaṃ bhaviṣyati /
SA10ksmadhlu:637_4: anena khalu hetunā sarvāsāṃ vyavasthānāṃ vilopa eva syāditi yatkathanaṃ tadapi naiva yuktam,
SA10ksmadhlu:637_5: yato hi prasaṅgastāvadayaṃ yadi satyābhiniveśaparityāgārthamucyate tadā saharṣamucyatām,
SA10ksmadhlu:637_10: yanmithyā tat sarvathā parityājyamityetasya naiva kimapi kāraṇamupalabhāmahe,
SA10ksmadhlu:637_13: te yogibhiḥ parityājyā iti kathanaṃ tu yujyate,
SA10ksmadhlu:637_14: parantu ye tavat sākṣāt paramparayā vā svaparaprayojanaprasādhakāḥ,
SA10ksmadhlu:637_15: kṛpālūnāṃ parahitakaraṇopāyabhūtāsteṣāṃ kathaṃ sarvadā parityāgaḥ kartum śakyate /
SA10ksmadhlu:638_1: te sarve viparītaparihāradvārā parityājyā api yāvatsaṃsāramaparityājyā eva /
SA10ksmadhlu:638_2: te yadyapi māyākāra iva sarvān mithyābhūtān jānanti,
SA10ksmadhlu:639_1: na cāsya nirmite saṅgo jñātapūrvo yato 'sya saḥ //
SA10ksmadhlu:640_0: bhāvo 'pi tāvanna grāhyo na cābhāvo 'pi parityājyaḥ,
SA10ksmadhlu:640_1: yato hi śrāvakā api, ye vastusaṃjñinaste 'pio ādimaṃ satyadvayaṃ vivarjayanti,
SA10ksmadhlu:640_3: kṛpāparādhīnacetaso yogino 'pi parahitārthaṃ vividharūpeṇa gajādimithyānirmāṇādikaṃ sādhayanti /
SA10ksmadhlu:641_0: tatra mahākaruṇāparādhīnatayā ye pareṣām aśeṣahitasukhopāyaśālinaḥ prajñālokena vidhvastasakalakleśāndhakārāḥ parahitābhilāṣiṇo matimantaste prahīṇeṣvapi sakalaviparyāseṣu pūrvapraṇidhānavaśatayā yāvat sattvakarmakleśāstāvadākāśaparyantaṃ sthātumevābhilaṣante /
SA10ksmadhlu:641_1: itthaṃ sameṣāṃ vastūnāṃ paramārthato niḥsvabhāvatve 'pi hetupratyayasāmagrīpāratantryena māyāvat sambhavantyeva /
SA10ksmadhlu:642_1: saṃkṣepato bhagavatām apratisṭhitanirvāṇahetustu karunā prajñā ca /
SA10ksmadhlu:642_2: kṛpayā hi tannirvāṇāvabodhe 'pi te naiva tasya sākṣātkāraṃ kurvanti /
SA10ksmadhlu:642_3: prajñayā tāvat sarvasaṃkleśahetoḥ sammohasyānavakāśāt saṃsāradoṣagandhenāpyaliptāḥ santo naiva saṃsāre patanti /
SA10ksmadhlu:642_6: ata eva ca sā bodhasattvānāṃ mārga ucyate /
SA10ksmadhlu:643_0: "api ca, śāriputra, śūnyatānimittaṃ ca bodhisattvānāṃ mārgaḥ /
SA10ksmadhlu:643_3: tadā nūnaṃ śrāvakāḥ pratyekabuddhā eva bhavanti /
SA10ksmadhlu:644_1: tadyathā - acintyasāmarthyavattvād yogino yathā vastūnyavabhāsante tathā karatalāmalakavat saṃvṛtiparamārthākārābhyāṃ sarvākāraṃ
SA10ksmadhlu:645_0: pratyakṣatayā avabudhyanti / ata eva bhagavān sarvākārajñānatvena vyavasthāpayāmāsa /
SA10ksmadhlu:645_1: sarvaprapañcarahitaṃ niruttaraṃ lokottaramaśesadharmanirābhāsaṃ jñānaṃ bhūtārthabhāvanāprakarṣaparyantajaṃ tattvāvabodhakaṃ bhavati,
SA10ksmadhlu:645_4: sā na praṇaśyati, paramārthe 'bhāvāt / ata eva bhagavatyāmuttam - 'yadi bhagavan,
SA10ksmadhlu:645_5: sarve dharmā nirmāṇaniva bhavanti tadā bhagavati nirvāṇe ca kimantaram? bhagavān āha - na kimapīti /
SA10ksmadhlu:645_6: katham? bhagavataḥ sarvāṇi karmāṇi nirmāṇavad bhavanti /
SA10ksmadhlu:645_8: nirmaṇasya tāvannodbhavo nāpi parinirvāṇaṃ kimapi bhavati /
SA10ksmadhlu:645_9: itthaṃ bodhisattvaiḥ sarvadharmeṣu nirmāṇamivādhimuktiṃ vidhāya prajñāpāramitāyāmācaritavyam /
SA10ksmadhlu:646_0: [45] ye hi rūpādayo bhinnadeśakālāvasthāsu spaṣṭaṃ pratyakṣeṇāvabhāsante te niścayena svabhāvena yuktā ityataḥ pratijñā tāvat pratyakṣeṇa bādhiteti yat pūrvamuktam,
SA10ksmadhlu:646_5: kintu naiva svabhāvaḥ paramārthatayā siddha iti pūrvamāveditam /
SA10ksmadhlu:647_0: api ca, yadi bhrāntapratyakṣe 'vabhāsitatvat pratyakṣe 'vabhāsitatvamabhyuopagamyate tadā naiva tena bādhā yujyate,
SA10ksmadhlu:647_1: timirādyupahatalocaneṣu vidyamāne 'pi dvicandre na tena ekacandrādibādhā yuktimatī /

SA10ksmadhlu:716_17: yadi paramārthataḥ paramārthasatyaṃ kāyavākcittaniṣedhamātrasvabhāvaḥ syāttadā sa paramārthasatyamiti saṃkhyāṃ na gacchet,
SA10ksmadhlu:716_18: tadā sa saṃvṛtireva syāt / api ca, devaputra, paramārthataḥ paramarthasatyaṃ sarvavyavahārātītamiti" /
SA10ksmadhlu:717_0: teṣu vastuvāsanāyā api pūrvaṃ kṛtaniṣedhāt kevalaṃ saṃvṛtyantargatābyeva tānyoto 'nyataḥ pūrtirnaivāvaśyakī /
SA10ksmadhlu:717_1: yadi pramāṇairabhāvo naiva māyādibhirbhinnastathāpi paramārthataḥ svataḥ saditi nāma kriyate tadā saharṣaṃ kriyatāṃ svairamutsavo 'pyanubhūyatām,
SA10ksmadhlu:717_2: kintu svamatānakūlyena kṛtāṃ vyavasthāṃ vastūni naivānuvidadhate /
SA10ksmadhlu:717_3: pratītyasamutpannatā svasaṃvedyatā ca naiva vastūno heturbhavati,
SA10ksmadhlu:717_5: yadyapratītyasamutpannatve vastūni naiva dṛśyate tadā tadadarśanamanyatrāpi tathaiva syāditi kathanasambaddhameva,
SA10ksmadhlu:718_2: vastūnāṃ yadi samyaktvaṃ tadā sthitatvāsthitatvatoḥ parasparavirodho 'pyanupapanna eveti pūrvaṃ kṛtanirdeśāditi /
SA10ksmadhlu:719_1: tāni sarvāṇi calasvabhāvāni vastūni māyādivat prakṛtyā niḥsvabhāvalakṣaṇarahitāni,
SA10ksmadhlu:719_2: paramārthasvabhāvāni ceti / so 'pi [svabhāva] tathāgataḥ syānnavā syāt sarvadā sthitatvānnityaḥ,
SA10ksmadhlu:720_4: satya iva prasiddhatvāt taccintanādhikareṇa satyeti nāmnā vyavahriyate /
SA10ksmadhlu:720_7: na tu samyagjñānādhikāreṇa, śabdamātrasya apekṣāviśeṣavaśena prayuktatvāt satyāsatyayoḥ parasparavirodhābhāvāt /
SA10ksmadhlu:721_2: tayā vyavasthitaṃ jagat tadadhikāreṇa yataḥ satyamityucyate,
SA10ksmadhlu:721_3: ataḥ saṃvṛtiravaśyaṃ vastutayā svīkartavyeti yaduktaṃ tasyāpyayuktatvāt pratijñā naiva hāpayituṃ śakyā /
SA10ksmadhlu:722_0: [71] saṃvṛtiḥ pramāṇam apramāṇaṃ vā? yadi pramāṇaṃ tadā kathaṃ sā saṃvṛtiḥ? yadyapramāṇaṃ tadā kathaṃ tayā nairātmyaṃ sādhayituṃ śakyam? - iti yaduktaṃ tadapi naiva yuktam /
SA10ksmadhlu:722_1: yato hi yathā anumānajñānasya mithyākāragrahaṇapravṛtatvāt saṃvṛtisvabhāvatve 'pi abhīṣṭarthakriyāprāpakatvāt pramāṇatvamabhyupaganyate tathaiva saṃvṛtisvabhāvasya mithyātve 'pi yathānurūpaśravaṇamananādihetuparamparāgatatvāllokikalokottarāthaiḥ sahāvisaṃvādāt pramāṇatvamabhīdhīyate,
SA10ksmadhlu:722_2: tadviparītatve tvapramāṇam / pramāṇādisarvavyāvasthāstavad vyavahāreṇaiveti pūrvaṃ prasādhitameva,
SA10ksmadhlu:723_0: [72] yāni vijñānādīni saṃvṛtibījāni tāni paramārthato 'ṅgīkarttavyānīti yaduktaṃ tanna yaktiyuktam /
SA10ksmadhlu:723_2: yato hyeteṣāṃ svānurūpahetavastāvadanādisaṃvṛtirūpā iti svīkriyanta eva,
SA10ksmadhlu:724_0: yadi tad bījaṃ paramārthasiddhamekaṃ ceti tadā kutrāpi tadanvayābhāvādanaikāntikameva /
SA10ksmadhlu:724_1: vṛkṣādyaśeṣasaṃvṛtioināṃ yadyuttaropādānahetvānukūlyaṃ na parikṣiṣyante tadā ramaṇīyatāmātrameva dṛṣṭaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ syāt /
SA10ksmadhlu:724_2: nāpi viruddho hetuḥ, yakṣānurūpabaleḥ sadbhāvāt sarvāstāḥ saṃvṛtayo 'satsvabhāvāḥ prasādhitā eva /
SA10ksmadhlu:724_3: anyathā [yadyevaṃ na syāt] katha tāḥ saṃvṛtaya iti /
SA10ksmadhlu:724_5: na te vastubhūtāni, tadviruddhatvād asiddhatvāt pramāṇabādhitatvācceti tā gauṇā eva /
SA10ksmadhlu:725_0: [73] vastusvabhāvastāvat svīkriyata iti yaduktaṃ tattu yena kāraṇena vastusvabhāvaḥ svīkriyate tena satyadvayabhedānudhānaṃ kutrāpi naiva sidhyati /
SA10ksmadhlu:725_2: teṣu ye utpādādayaḥ samāropyante te saṃvṛtisatyatvena vyāvasthāpyante /
SA10ksmadhlu:725_3: pramāṇaiḥ samyaṅ nirupya anāropitā ye tāvadanutpādādayaste paramārthasatyatayā vyāhriyante /
SA10ksmadhlu:725_4: ataḥ paramārthato 'satyapi vastusvabhāve satyadvayaṃ vyāvasthāpyata eveti gauṇā eva /
SA10ksmadhlu:726_3: aviparītasya jñānasya artha iti viṣaya iti kṛtvā sā paramārtha ityucyate /
SA10ksmadhlu:726_4: yatkhalu viṣayi lokottaraṃ jñānaṃ tadanyaśbdārthaprayogairapi vyavahriyate /
SA10ksmadhlu:726_5: śravaṇamananabhāvanopajātāyāḥ prajñāyā anukūlatvād vyavahāreṇaiva sā evamabhidhīyate /
SA10ksmadhlu:727_0: tatra yena kāraṇena paramārthatattvalakṣaṇabhāvanayā yogibhiraśeṣasaṃkleśān parihatya uttarottaraprajñādiviśeguṇāṃścadhigamya mahārthatvaṃ prasādhyate,
SA10ksmadhlu:727_2: tadapi lokottaraṃ paramaṃ jñānaṃ sarvakalpanāvigatatvāt sarvadharmanirābhāsatvācca svasaṃvedyamanupalambhātmakaṃ ca,
SA10ksmadhlu:729_0: anena vastuviṣayataḥ samyagatītatvena nirdeśādālambanadarśanasya niṣedha eva kṛtaḥ /
SA10ksmadhlu:730_0: api ca, yadyasti tāvadekaḥ tāvadekaḥ kaścana gauṇaḥ paramārthastadā nirvāṇaṃ tāvat kīdṛśaḥ paramārthaḥ? tatra kasyāpi vastunaḥ samyaktayā arthasvabhāvasambhavābhāvāt tadapi kathamebhiścodyairanavamardanīyaṃ syāt /
SA10ksmadhlu:730_2: paramārthe vastūni tāvanna santīti yaduktaṃ tadapi paramārthamadhikṛtya jñānātmakatvaṃ samyagaviparītatvenāsadevetyuktam /
SA10ksmadhlu:730_3: ekena khalu prakāreṇa paramārthastāvadasanniti yaduktaṃ tattattvato vicāreṇāsadevetyarthaḥ /
SA10ksmadhlu:731_0: [75] saṃvṛtiparamārthayorekatvamiti yaduktaṃ tatra bhagavān paramārthalakṣaṇaṃ saṃskāralakṣaṇena saha tattvato nānyaṃ nānanyamiti svayamevoktavān /
SA10ksmadhlu:732_0: "yaduta yadi paramārthalakṣaṇam saṃskārebhyo nānyaṃ [abhinna] syāttadā sarve bālapṛthagjanāḥ satyadarśinaḥ syuḥ /
SA10ksmadhlu:732_2: yathā ca saṃskārāḥ saṃkleśalakṣaṇāstathaiva paramārtho 'pi saṃkleśalakṣaṇaḥ syāt /
SA10ksmadhlu:732_3: tathā ca yathā paramārthaḥ sarvasaṃskāreṣvabhinnastathā saṃskāralakṣaṇanyapi[abhinnāni] syuḥ,
SA10ksmadhlu:732_6: bhūtārthaprāpteranantaraṃ yogibhiḥ paramārthagaveṣaṇaṃ naiva yujyata iti paramārthastāvat saṃskārebhyo nāstyanyo nānyo 'pīti /
SA10ksmadhlu:732_9: nimittabandhanairamuktatvānna ca te doṣṭhulyabandhanādapi muktāḥ syuḥ /
SA10ksmadhlu:732_11: api ca, paramārthalakṣaṇaṃ yadi saṃskāralakṣaṇebhyo bhinnaṃ syāttadā na syāt paramārthaḥ saṃskārāṇāṃ sāmānyalakṣaṇam na ca paramārthalakṣaṇaṃ saṃskārāṇāṃ nairātmyaṃ niḥsvabhāvatā vā syāt,
SA10ksmadhlu:733_1: paramārthalakṣaṇe tu niḥsvabhāvatvena tattvānyatvābhyaṃ vastu nābhidhātuṃ śakyate /
SA10ksmadhlu:733_2: vastusattve hi tattvānyatvabodhasya sambhavānna tu niḥsvabhāve vastuni tatsambhavaḥ,
SA10ksmadhlu:733_3: ato nāsti virodhaḥ / jñānātmakaparamartho 'pi saṃvṛtyā saha tathatālakṣaṇe paramārthākāre ekatvena svīkriyata eva /
SA10ksmadhlu:734_1: naiva lokasaṃvṛtiranyā, paramārtho 'pyanyaḥ / yattāvallokasaṃvṛtestattvaṃ tadeva paramārthasyāpi tattvamiti" /
SA10ksmadhlu:734_2: jñānātmakastu paramārtho māyādibhirabhinnatvāt samyaksaṃvṛtisvabhāvaśca tattvāvabodhānukūlatvāt paramārthasvabhāvaśca /
SA10ksmadhlu:735_2: itthaṃ samyagdṛṣṭisamutthitā eva dānādayaḥ parisuddahetusamutthitatvādiṣṭaphalaṃ viśeṣaphalaṃ cābhinirharanti,
SA10ksmadhlu:736_2: atastatsamutthitapāramitānaṃ sarvo 'pi prayāso mithyātmātmīyasamutthitadānādivad aviśuddhahetusamutthitatvenātyantaṃ nirbala eva /
SA10ksmadhlu:736_7: na tvanyeṣu / yena kāraṇena dānādiṣvapravṛteḥ puṇyābhāvastāni dātavyādīni naivātyantamasadbhūtāni,
SA10ksmadhlu:736_8: saṃvṛtau teṣāṃ sadbhāvāt / naiva ca sarvadānupalambha eva,
SA10ksmadhlu:737_0: kathaṃ bhagavan, upākuśalā bodhisattvā mahāsattvā dānaṃ datvā prajñāpāramitāṃ parisampadayanti? bhagavānāha - subhūte,
SA10ksmadhlu:737_1: bodhisattvā mahāsattvā dānaṃ datvā parityajanti tadā māyābuddhireva ṭeṣāṃ dāne sūpatiṣṭhatīti" vistaraḥ /
SA10ksmadhlu:738_0: ata eva bhagavan ye bodhisattvā bhavanti,
SA10ksmadhlu:738_5: kintu pṛṣṭhalabdhāvasthāyāṃ tāvat te pravartanta eva /
SA10ksmadhlu:740_0: ata eva prajñāpāramitādiṣvapi śūnyatādhimuktasya anupalambhāśritāni dānādīni bṛhatphalāni paripūrṇāni cetyuktāni /
SA10ksmadhlu:741_0: "tatkiṃ manyate subhūte, sukaraṃ pūrvasyāṃ diśi ākāśasya pramāṇamudgṛhītum? subhūtirāha no hīdaṃ bhagavan /
SA10ksmadhlu:741_1: evameva subhūte, yo bodhisattvo 'pratiṣṭhito dānaṃ dadāti,
SA10ksmadhlu:741_2: tasya subhūte, puṇyaskandhasya na sukaraṃ pramāṇamudgṛhītum /
SA10ksmadhlu:742_9: yadarthaṃ hi pariṇāmanā vidhīyate tadapi niḥsvabhāvatvenaiva jñeyam /
SA10ksmadhlu:742_10: tat kimartham? dānaṃ tāvad dānasvabhāvena śūnyam /
SA10ksmadhlu:742_11: tathaiva upādātā deyaṃ dānaphalaṃ pariṇāmanā bodhiśceti tattasvabhāvena śūnyā iti yogaḥ karaṇīyaḥ /
SA10ksmadhlu:742_13: tad dānaṃ ca dānapāramiteti saṃjñāṃ pratilabhate,
SA10ksmadhlu:742_14: na tu kadāpi malinā bhaviṣyati" iti vistaraḥ /
SA10ksmadhlu:743_0: ityevamanupalambhasamāśritāni dānādīni bṛhatphalāni viśuddhāni ca bhānti /
SA10ksmadhlu:744_1: tasya tāvatko 'rthaḥ? yadyātmanāsattvānniḥsvabhāvāstadā siddhasādhanameveti yaduktaṃ tadapi yadyātmanā 'sattvānni' svabhāvatvena vyavastāpyate tadā na ca viruddhatvaṃ nāpi siddhasādhanamiti /
SA10ksmadhlu:744_2: yato hi yadi vastunaḥ svabhāvo 'vipoarītatadā parāpekṣayā tatsattvam tatsattvam āditaścāsattvaṃ naivopapadyate,
SA10ksmadhlu:744_4: phalatastāvadimāni vastūni paramārthataḥ svabhāvena parāpekṣitānītyato niḥsvabhāvanyeva /
SA10ksmadhlu:744_5: na hi svabhāvasya kṛtakatvaṃ nāma yujyata iti pūrvaṃ kṛtanirdeśāt /
SA10ksmadhlu:744_6: na caisāṃ paramārthataḥ parāpekṣayāpi sattvamiti pūrvameva prasādhitam /
SA10ksmadhlu:744_10: evameva yadi vastvādīni prakṛtitaḥ sasvabhāvāni tadā svātmanāsattvaṃ svabhāvena ca sattvaṃ naivopapadyate,
SA10ksmadhlu:744_11: viruddhatvāt / ekasmin vatūni sattvāsattvasthitāsthiotatvādayaḥ parasparaviruddhadharmā naiva yujyate /
SA10ksmadhlu:744_14: parikalpitātmanā svabhāvato 'sattvaṃ tadā naiva siddhasādhanamiti pūrvameva prasādhitam,
SA10ksmadhlu:745_1: sā ca saṃvṛtya yujyate, na tu grahyagrāhakasvabhāvatayā /
SA10ksmadhlu:745_2: yaccāryāṇāṃ paramajñānagocaraṃ vastūnāmaviparītaṃ svalakṣaṇaṃ tadapi naiva saditi yuktyagamābhyāṃ pūrvaṃ pratipaditameva /
SA10ksmadhlu:746_0: [78] sarvāṇi tāvad vastūnyādita ev notpannānityato 'nupannānīti yaduktaṃ tatra naiva siddhasādhanādayo doṣāḥ pravartante,
SA10ksmadhlu:746_1: yato hi sarve dharmāḥ paramārthato 'nādikāladeva praśāntatvādanutpannā ityabhyupagamyante,
SA10ksmadhlu:746_4: api ca, bhagavatā bālapṛthagjanānāṃ santrāsaparivarjanārthamebhirapi prakārairvastūnāmanutpattiḥ sandarśitā,
SA10ksmadhlu:747_0: parikalpitātmanā svātmanā vanutpāde 'pi naiva siddhasādhanamiti nirdiśyate /
SA10ksmadhlu:747_4: sarve tāvad dharmā dharmadhātulakṣaṇāyāṃ niḥsvabhāvatāyāṃ samarasatvena tathātākāratayā naiva viśeṣotpattirityato 'nutpattirabhyupagamyate,
SA10ksmadhlu:748_0: [triyānasādhanam] yadapi sādhanaviśeṇa yānatrayasiddhayanumānaṃ śraddhāviśeṣeṇa ca gotraviśeṣānumānaṃ nirdiṣṭaṃ tenāpi yanatrayaṃ sādhayituṃ na śakyate /
SA10ksmadhlu:748_2: punaścanena yānatrayasādhanānumitasya gotratrayasyāpi niścitāvabodho naiva kartuṃ śakyaḥ,
SA10ksmadhlu:748_4: sūtre 'pi - "evaṃ hi sati aparimitasya yānabhedasya yanabhedasyaprasaṅgaḥ syāt" - ityukyam /
SA10ksmadhlu:749_0: yena khalu kāraṇena sattveṣu gotrabhedānumānasya niyatā siddhiḥ niyataśca śraddhabhedābodhaḥ pratīyate,
SA10ksmadhlu:749_3: te 'pi kalyāṇamitrasamparkādinā kevalaṃ parahitacintane pravartamānā avalokyante /
SA10ksmadhlu:749_4: ye kalyāṇamitrasamparkādinā kevalaṃ parahitacintane pravartamānā avalokyante /
SA10ksmadhlu:749_5: ye khalvalpamātrake svasukhe hite cāsajyamānāḥ pareṣu daurmanasyaṃ dhārayanti,
SA10ksmadhlu:749_11: ato gotrabhedasyāpyaniyatatayā kathaṃ tāvad yānatrayaniścayaḥ sādhayituṃ śakyaḥ /
SA10ksmadhlu:750_0: sattvanāṃ vivuidhāśayavaśenāpi gotrabhedo niścetuṃ na śakyate /
SA10ksmadhlu:750_1: yāni tāvat pañcābhisamayagotrāṇi tānyapi ekaniścayābhiprāyeṇaiva nirdiṣṭāni,
SA10ksmadhlu:750_2: na tvātyantikatāyā / tasminneva hi sūtre gotrāṇyanātyantikatayaiva nirdiṣṭāni /
SA10ksmadhlu:751_1: punarapi tathāgatādhiṣṭhānāt kadācit karhicit kuśalamūlān vyutthāpayati /
SA10ksmadhlu:751_2: tatkasya hetoḥ? yaduta aparityaktā hi mahāmate,
SA10ksmadhlu:752_2: so 'pi naivādhārabhūtaḥ, yato hi tathāgatā lokasya vividhāśayavaśena vividhāni yānāni nirdiśanto dharmopadeśe pravartante,
SA10ksmadhlu:753_1: tadanantadameva tena aprameyāḥ sattvāḥ śrāvakabhūmau pratiṣṭhāpitāḥ /
SA10ksmadhlu:753_12: aprameyāḥ sattvāḥ bodhisattvamārge pratiṣṭhāpitāḥ" iti vistaraḥ /
SA10ksmadhlu:755_2: yānānāṃ nāsti vai niṣṭhā yāvaccittaṃ pravartate /
SA10ksmadhlu:755_3: citte tu vai parāvṛtte na yānaṃ na ca yāninaḥ /
SA10ksmadhlu:756_0: ata eva āryasaddharmapuṇḍarīkasūtrādau ekayānanirdeśo naiva neyārtha iti pratipāditam tathā hi -
SA10ksmadhlu:757_0: "evaṃ rūpeṣu śāriputra, kalpasaṃkṣobhakaṣāyeṣu bahusattveṣu lubdheṣvalpakuśalamūleṣu tadā śāriputar,
SA10ksmadhlu:757_1: tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhāṃ upāyajauśalyena tadaivaikaṃ buddhayanaṃ triyānanirdeśena nirdiśanti" /
SA10ksmadhlu:759_1: pattīyatāvakalpayata / na hi śāriputra, tathāgatānāṃ mṛṣāvādaḥ saṃvidyate /
SA10ksmadhlu:761_0: ye bhunti hīnābhiratā avidvasū acīrṇacaryā bahubuddhakoṭiṣu /
SA10ksmadhlu:761_2: upāyametaṃ kurute svayambhū bauddhasya jñānasya prabodhanārtham /
SA10ksmadhlu:761_3: na cāpi teṣāṃ pravade kadācid yuṣme 'pi buddhā iha loki bheṣyatha //
SA10ksmadhlu:761_4: kiṃ kāraṇaṃ kālamavekṣya tāyī kṣaṇaṃ ca dṛṣṭvā tatu paśca bhāṣate /
SA10ksmadhlu:761_5: so 'yaṃ kṣaṇo adya kathañci labdho vadāmi yeneha ca bhūtaścayam //
SA10ksmadhlu:761_6: bauddhasya jñānasya prakāśanārthaṃ loke samutpadyati lokanāthaḥ /
SA10ksmadhlu:761_7: ekaṃ hi yānaṃ dvitiyaṃ na vidyate na hīnayānena nayanti buddhāḥ //
SA10ksmadhlu:761_8: pratoṣṭhito yatra svayaṃ svayambhūryaccaiva buddhaṃ yatha yādṛśaṃ ca /
SA10ksmadhlu:761_9: balāśca ye dhyānavimokṣa indriyāstatraiva sattvā pi pratiṣṭhāpeti //
SA10ksmadhlu:761_10: mārtsaryadoṣo hi bhaveta mahyaṃ spṛśitva bodhiṃ virajāṃ viśiṣṭām /
SA10ksmadhlu:762_0: yadi hīnayānasmi pratiṣṭhapeyamekaṃ pi sattva na mametu sādhu //
SA10ksmadhlu:762_1: ekaṃ hi yānaṃ dvitiyaṃ na vidyate tṛtīyaṃ hi naivāsti kadāci loke /
SA10ksmadhlu:763_0: tatra prajvalitagṛhāntaḥsthitān bālajanān bahirniṣkāsayitumupāyabhūtasya vāhanaviśeṣasya dṛṣṭāntadvārā,
SA10ksmadhlu:763_1: tadvadeva ratnadvīpasthitaṃ nāyakapuruṣaṃ nivartayitumupāyabhūtasya madhye 'raṇyaṃ nagaranirmāṇasya ca dṛṣṭāntadvārā bhagavān upāyabhūtāni yāni trīṇi yānānyupadiṣṭavān,
SA10ksmadhlu:764_0: "mañjuśrīḥ, tasmin buddhakṣetre yānenaikena niryāstīti tad yānaṃ tāvat sāravat syāditi /
SA10ksmadhlu:764_2: kathamiti cet? tathāgatā hi nānātvasaṃjñāvirāhitā iti hetoḥ /
SA10ksmadhlu:765_2: kasmaicicca śrāvakayānaṃ nirdiśeyustadā tathāgatasya tāvaccittam apariśuddhamabhiniveśajuṣṭaṃ ca syāt /
SA10ksmadhlu:765_3: prādeśikī ca tasya mahākaruṇā syānnānātvasaṃjñā ca /
SA10ksmadhlu:765_5: api ca, mañjuśīḥ, yebhyaśca sattvebhyo 'haṃ dharmamupadiśāmi te sarve bodhiniyatā mahāyānaparāyaṇāḥ sarvajñatābhinirhatāḥ pakṣaikaniṣṭhāśca bhavanti /
SA10ksmadhlu:765_10: pudgalānāṃ vyavasthā kṛtā, alpasattvasamūhasya aprameyasattvasamūhasya ca vyavasthā kṛtā /
SA10ksmadhlu:767_0: "yacca parinirvāṇaṃ yāni ca trīṇi yānānyupadiṣṭāni tatsarvaṃ tathāgatānāmupāyamātram,
SA10ksmadhlu:767_2: " ata eva ekayānanirdeśastāvadābhiprāyika iti vacanasya dharmadhātulakṣaṇe sarvayānānāṃ samatvādekayānamiti kathanaṃ tāvannāstyāryasaddharmapuṇḍarīkādyanukūlamiti niyataṃ vidvadbhiravadhāryam,
SA10ksmadhlu:767_4: āryadaśadharmādau yānatrayanirdeśastu upāyasvarūpatvād vineyajanebhyaḥ sa ekayānanirdeśābhiprāyeṇaiva vihita ityeva niśceyam /
SA10ksmadhlu:767_6: na tu vāstavika ityato vineyajanā naiva teṣu pravartante /
SA10ksmadhlu:767_7: mahāyānasūtrākaṅkāre hi - ekasya yānasya ca yā hi deśanā tadānukūlyena prayojanena sā /
SA10ksmadhlu:767_8: iti yaduktaṃ tacchrāvakāṇāṃ yadyanuśayasamucchedo jāyeta tadā jāterapi sarvathopacchedād anekajanmaparamparāsamudāgataṃ buddhātvaṃ kathaṃ nāma sādhyaṃ syāditi kathanaṃ tu teṣāṃ jāteḥ sarvathopacchedasyāsiddhatvānnaiva yuktam /
SA10ksmadhlu:768_0: "arhato 'pi vināśasadbhāvāttatsaṃtrāsena tāvadarhantaḥ pratyekabuddhā api bhagavataḥ śaraṇaṃ pratipadyante,
SA10ksmadhlu:768_2: janmakṣayābhāvācca bhagavan, teṣām / ato bhavatyeva teṣāṃ janma / bhavantyeva te sopadhipeṣāḥ, naiva janmatā, apitu karmaṇāṃ pāripūrerabhāvād bahukaraṇīyāvaśeṣācca /
SA10ksmadhlu:768_3: yadi naiva te teṣāṃ parihāraṃ kurvīran tadā santyaneke nirvāṇadhātorapasārakāsteṣu prahātavyadharmā.
SA10ksmadhlu:769_0: yaśca jātikṣaya ityādinā kṣayānutpādajñānayoḥ samudbhavastasya neyārthatvaṃ tu taminneva sūtre nirdiṣṭam /
SA10ksmadhlu:770_0: "bhagavan, arhantāṃ pratyekabuddhānāṃ vimuktiṃ yāvad yat pratyekṣaṇājñānaṃ yāścāśvāsādhāyikāścatastro 'nusmṛtayastat sarvamābhiprāyikam,
SA10ksmadhlu:770_2: bhagavat, tatkimarthamiti cet? dvidhā bhavati cyutiḥsamucchedikā ca acityapariṇāminī ceti /
SA10ksmadhlu:770_5: bhagavan, arhatāṃ pratyekabuddhānāṃ vaśitāprāptabodhisattvānāṃ ca manomayakāyasya cyutistu bodhimaṇḍaparyantam acintyapariṇāminyeva bhavati /
SA10ksmadhlu:770_6: bhagavan, anayordayoścyutyoḥ samucchedacyuteradhikāre tāvadarhatāṃ pratyekabuddhānāṃ jātikṣayo jāyata iti pratīyate.
SA10ksmadhlu:772_1: evameva bhagavan, avidyāvāsabhūmipratyayā anāstravakarmahetukā arhatāṃ pratyekabuddhānāṃ vaśitāprāptānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ ca manomayāstrayaḥ kāyāḥ sambhavanti.
SA10ksmadhlu:773_0: āryalaṅkāvatārasūtre cāpi nirdiṣṭaṃ yad dhātutrayātikrānta api te 'nāstravadhātau avasthitā bhavanti /
SA10ksmadhlu:773_1: atastathāgatādhiṣṭhānena jātivaśitāṃ prāpya sambhāradvayaṃ ca paripūrya te buddhatvamavāpnuvantīti /
SA10ksmadhlu:774_2: punarapi lokottarānāstravadhātuparyāpannān sambhārān paripūrya acintyadharmakāyavaśavartītāṃ pratilapsyante /
SA10ksmadhlu:775_1: tathā hi śravako mūḍho lakṣaṇena pravāhyate //
SA10ksmadhlu:775_4: niṣṭhāgatirna tasyāsti na ca bhūyo nirvartate /
SA10ksmadhlu:775_7: tathā te buddhadharmākhyaṃ kāyaṃ prāpsyanti māmakam //
SA10ksmadhlu:776_0: atra khalu kāṣṭhodadhyupamayā bhavasāgare pravahamānatvaṃ nirdiṣṭam /
SA10ksmadhlu:776_1: taraṅgopamayā tāvad dharmalakṣaṇaṃ prati abhiniveśavaśāt parinirvāṇaṃ na prāpyata iti saṅketitam /
SA10ksmadhlu:776_4: 'niṣṭhāgatirna tasyāsti' ityādinā tāvannirvāṇanagare 'praviṣṭāstathā bhavasāgare 'pi na bhramantīti /
SA10ksmadhlu:776_6: tadantaraṃ tato vyatthāya sambhārān paripūrya buddhatvāvāptirityādikaṃ spaṣṭatayā nirdiṣṭam /
SA10ksmadhlu:777_0: yaccāpyāryalaṅkāvatārādisūtreṣu nirmitaśrāvakānadhikṛtya śrāvakavyākaranaṃ kṛtaṃ taddhīnādhimuktasattvānāṃ bhayaparihārārthaṃ yānatrayanirdeśopāyapradarśanārthaṃ ceti jñātavyam /
SA10ksmadhlu:778_3: na ca tasminnadhimucyante / ato 'nayā yuktyā te sattvā buddhatvaṃ pratyabhimukhīkriyanta iti /
SA10ksmadhlu:779_1: ato 'nekajanmaparamaparāsādhyaṃ buddhatvaṃ na pratilabhanta iti tadā bodhipariṇāmitānāmapyarhatāṃ na pratisandhirna ca teṣu buddhātvādhigama iti /
SA10ksmadhlu:779_2: yadi praṇidhānabalena tathāgatādhiṣṭhānena ca teṣāṃ pratisandhirabhyupagamyate,
SA10ksmadhlu:780_1: tadā anumodayiṣyāmi, nāhaṃ teṣāṃ kuśalamūlanāṃ vighnaṃ kariṣyāmi /
SA10ksmadhlu:781_0: yadi te sarveṇa sarvamanuttarasamyaksaṃbodheye abhavyā iti tadā kathaṃ nāhaṃ teṣāṃ kuśalamūlānāṃ vighnaṃ na kariṣyāmītyuktam /
SA10ksmadhlu:782_0: "bhikṣurvā bhikṣuṇī vārhattvaṃ pratijānīyādanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau praṇidhānaṃ parigṛhyocchinno 'smi buddhāyānāditi vadedetāvanme samucchrayasya paścimakaṃ parinirvāṇaṃ vadedābhimānikaṃ taṃ śāriputra,
SA10ksmadhlu:783_2: ye ca kāmadhāturāgarahitā anāgāminaste buddhagotrakā iti /
SA10ksmadhlu:783_3: dvividhā api te 'nuttarasamyaksaṃbodhau vyākṛtāḥ acintyapariṇāminyā jātyā yuktatvātteṣāmiti yat kathanaṃ tadapyāryaśrīmālāsiṃhanādaāryaprajñāpārimitāāryadaśadharmakasūtrādiviruddham /
SA10ksmadhlu:784_0: "arhattvaṃ samadhigamya yadi sa samyaksaṃbodhimabhilaṣate tadā kathaṃ nāma ajātiṃ labdhuṃ śaknoti,
SA10ksmadhlu:784_3: apitu acityaparinirvāṇe pariṇāmanayā tasya jātiṃ prajñapayāmiti" /
SA10ksmadhlu:786_0: "bhagavan, śrāvakāḥ kṣīṇāstravāḥ, parikṣīṇabhavasaṃyojanagotrakāstathāpi kathaṃ te 'nuttarasamyaksambodhimabhisamboddhuṃ śakṣyante? bhagavānaha - śṛṇu kulaputra,
SA10ksmadhlu:786_2: kṣatriyakule 'bhiṣikaḥ kaścana rājakumāro yadi sarvāsāṃ śilpavidyānāmadhyayanaṃ karoti /
SA10ksmadhlu:786_3: sa nāsti tīkṣṇendriyo 'pi tu mandendriyaḥ san paścādadhyeyasya pāṭhayasya prathamam,
SA10ksmadhlu:786_6: kimetāvatā sa nāsti rājakumāra iti kathayiṣyate? avocat - naiva bhagavan,
SA10ksmadhlu:786_7: naiva sugata, rājakumāra eva sa kathayiṣyate /
SA10ksmadhlu:786_8: bhagavānāhakulaputra, tathaiva bodhisattvagotrakā api ye mandendriyāste pūrvaṃ bhāvanāmārgeṇa kleśakṣayaṃ kṛtvā paścādanuttarasamyaksaṃbodhau abhisambuddhā bhaviṣyantīti /
SA10ksmadhlu:787_1: tadarthastāvat sarveṣāṃ buddhatvasāmīpyāpekṣābhiprāyeṇeti - yaduktaṃ tadapi svecchāmātropakalpitatvādayuktameva /
SA10ksmadhlu:787_2: sārvagatikānāṃ bhavyatāṃ dṛṣṭvā tathoktamityatra ko virodhaḥ /
SA10ksmadhlu:787_3: tathaiva cāryaratnameghādisūtreṣvapi bhagavataḥ śākyamunernāmaśravaṇamātreṇa avaivartikabījāropaṇād abhedena sarve sattvā avaivartikatve vyākriyante,
SA10ksmadhlu:787_4: na tu sāmīpyāpekṣayā / ato yena śrāvaṇaṃ yena vā śravaṇaṃ yaśca śrotā teṣavapi avaivartikabījāni vidyanta eva,
SA10ksmadhlu:787_5: yato hi bhavatāṃ mate 'pi malānāmāgantukatvāccittaṃ prakṛtyā prabhāsvaramabhyupagamyate /
SA10ksmadhlu:788_0: sarve sattvāstathāgatagarbhā iti yaduktaṃ tena sarve 'pyanuttarasamyaksaṃbodhipadaprāptiyogyā evopadarśitāḥ,
SA10ksmadhlu:788_1: yato hi tathāgataśbdo dharmadhātuḥ pudgaladharmanairātmyalakṣaṇaḥ prakṛtyā prabhāsvaraścetyeteṣvartheṣvabhyupagamyate /
SA10ksmadhlu:788_2: tathā ca nirdeśena sarve 'nuttarasamyaksaṃbodhisvabhāvā eva nirdiṣṭāḥ /
SA10ksmadhlu:789_0: api ca, 'yānam' iti yaduktaṃ tadapi nirvāṇagaraprāpako jñānātmako mārga evetyuktam,
SA10ksmadhlu:789_1: yāyate 'neneti kṛtvā / tattvajñānādeva hi mokṣamadhigantuṃ śakyate,
SA10ksmadhlu:789_2: nānyasmāt / tattvamapyekameva, anyathānavasthāprasaṅgaḥ / dṛṣṭibhede 'pi vastutattvaṃ nānekarūpeṣu vibhājayituṃ śakyate /
SA10ksmadhlu:789_8: ato yattāvat pudgaladharmanairātmyatattvasākṣātkāri jñānaṃ tadeva nirvāṇaprāpakaḥ samyaṅ mārgo nānyaḥ /
SA10ksmadhlu:790_0: eta eva bhagavatā nānyena tāvanmārgeṇa mokṣa iti nirdiṣṭam / āryalaṅkāvatārasūtre coktam -
SA10ksmadhlu:791_0: "yaduta anye punarmahāmate, kāraṇādhinān sarvadharmān dṛṣṭvā nirvāṇagatibuddhayo bhavanti,
SA10ksmadhlu:791_3: atra te mahāmate, kudṛṣṭivyāvṛttyarthaṃ yogaḥ karaṇīyaḥ" iti /
SA10ksmadhlu:793_0: "yad dvayaṃ tad vastu, advayaṃ tu avastu / avocat - bhagavan, kiṃ tāvad dvayam? bhagavānāha - sūbhūte,
SA10ksmadhlu:794_1: yāvad dvayaṃ tāvad vastu / yāvad vastu tāvat saṃsāraḥ / yavācca saṃsārastāvannāsti sattvānāṃ mokṣaḥ" iti /
SA10ksmadhlu:795_0: ityanena prakrāreṇa dvayasaṃjñānukūlā kṣāntirapi tāvadasattvena jñānavyeti prakaṭitam /
SA10ksmadhlu:795_1: āryasatyadvayāvatārasūtre 'pi prajñaptaṃ yat sarvakleśānāṃ mūlaṃ bhāvābhiniveśa eva /
SA10ksmadhlu:795_2: ata eva sarvadharmaniḥsvabhāvabhāvanayaiva tāvat kleśāḥ parihartuṃ śakyante,
SA10ksmadhlu:796_0: "kathaṃ mañjuśrīḥ, kleśā vinayaṃ gacchanti, kathaṃ kleśāḥ parijñātā bhavanti? mañjuśrīrāhaparamārthato 'tyāntājātānutpannābhāveṣu sarvadharmeṣu saṃvṛtyāsadviparyāsaḥ /
SA10ksmadhlu:796_9: yaśca yoniśaḥ prayuktaḥ, tasyātmasamāropo na bhavati /
SA10ksmadhlu:796_10: yasyātmasamāropo na bhavati tasya dṛṣṭiparyutthānaṃ na bhavanti /
SA10ksmadhlu:796_12: tasyaivam anutpādavihāriṇaḥ kleśā atyantaṃṃ vinītā draṣṭavyā /
SA10ksmadhlu:796_13: ayamucyate kleśavinayaḥ / yadā devaputra, kleśān nirābhāsena jñānena paramārthato 'tyantaśūnyān atyantābhāvān atyantanirnimittān prajānāti,
SA10ksmadhlu:796_14: tadā devaputra, kleśāḥ parijñātā bhavanti / tatra yathāpi nāma devaputra,
SA10ksmadhlu:796_17: evameva devaputra, yaḥ kleśānāṃ gotraṃ prajānāti,
SA10ksmadhlu:796_18: tasya kleśāḥ praśāmyanti / devaputra āhakataman mañjuśrīḥ,
SA10ksmadhlu:796_19: kleśānāṃ gotram? āha - yāvadeṣā paramārthato 'tyantājātānutpannābhāveṣu sarvadharmeṣu kalpanā,
SA10ksmadhlu:797_2: taiḥ kumārgavicārān dūrata eva parityajya mahātmabhiryo hi yuktyāgamapradīpaḥ prakāśīkṛtaḥ sadbhiśca puruṣaiḥ [yaḥ] muhurmuhurāveditaḥ sa sādaraṃ nirantaraṃ ca sadā sevanīyaḥ /
SA10ksmadhlu:797_3: ataśca ekameva yānam, sarve ca dharmāḥ paramārthato niḥ svābhāvā iti sidhyati /
SA10ksmadhlu:799_0: bhāratīyopādhyāśīlendrabodhinā bhoṭadeśīyānuvādakena dpala brcegas mahābhāgena cānūditam /
